Mua mua yekpe mahugbeema vulii aako maa pie numu gbi i gbonyɛ a mue pelei na va mu navoo gbotoi ji yayengema.
Na mu kɔima tamia a pɔɔna wiela Ndemɔi yaama kɛɛ nuuvungaa bɛɛ.

Faale mua gbɔma mu mbaa Kristimɔ weka yoyoma. Mu ngi hugɔnga kpoto tawao mu tɔnga kɛ watii gbi ngi magbɛlingɔe kpɔma wieva. Tawao kia na i langa waa hii a wue, ngi magbɛlingɔe tewengɔ yeengovei ma gbɔva wu ma.

Taitɔs ta, nya mbaa mia tawao mua tamia ma yenge gbɔva wu ma; mu mbaa Kristimablei felei nasia taa tieni ti lima tia lɔ Kristimablei nasia kpɛlɛɛ ti yaamɛi a tie tawao ti yengei a walɔ a ngɔlɔya Kristi ma.
A ndoma gɛ a tie aako Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ ti mɛni ti la la kɛ muii ndawoo gbama wieni a wue.
Maa ii houni bɛɛ ngi yɛ a kɔlɔ nyɛi wu gama kɔloongɔ kpɔmɛi ji ma wa njoyo mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia wɛ ti Judia lɔlei hu.

Ajifa ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ wu lumangɔe kpɔma wieva tawao ngi lawonga a wue Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ gama ti Masidonia ngɛɛ, “Mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ti Akaya lɔlei hu ti magbatɛngɔe kpɔma wieva i hiye voonu ma.” Kpɔma lii na i wu goohu i ti gbi lii wɔlɔnga nyɔkɔ wieva.

Faale nyaa na mu mbaa Kristimablei jisia looma wu gama aako ndawoei kpɛlɛɛ mu pieni a wue yeehindei ji hu aa yɛ a njɛpɛ gbama. Kɛɛ kia lɔɔ ngi ndeni la Kristimableisia ma Masidonia, wu magbatɛngɔ a yɛla a kpɔma navoo.
Na hu gbi, ina mua Masidoniableisia mu wailɔ wu gama kɛɛ muii maleni kpɔma navoo aa yɛ wu yeya, maa a wufe kpa, wu nda wufei va lee yana, kɛ mua bɛ va, jifa mu lani a wue.

Faale ngi tɔilɔ kɛ mahoungɔe ngi mu mbaa Kristimablei jisia manɛnɛ liva wu gama nya gulɔ aako wu kpɔma navoei na lɛma wu yɛ Lahei wumbuni feva; aako wu tɛma pɛiŋ mu yaa foo. Wa fe a wu nyɛkɛ lɔ, tɛɛ kpua wu yeya a kpaya.
I hitɛ wu wɛ kɛ numui na a tuhani hii kulo hii, a tewe kulo hii; kɛɛ numui na a tuhani hii kpotongɔ, a tewelɔ kpotongɔ waa.
Numu gbi i na ve hɔɔ a wu ngi lii hu feva; aa fe a ndiinyani ɔɔ bi tɔaa bɛɛ ngi magba le, gbamaile Ngewɔ longɔ a numui na lɔ a hani ve a kohunɛ.
Ngewɔ a gulɔ a wu gɔla a na wu gbewengɔ fa yeemaalema aako na wa gbewe fa wua yekpe va a yɛlɔ wu yeya kpele gbi kɛɛ yeemɔnu gboto hinda yekpe gbi wieva la.
Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “A hani velɔ kpotongɔ waa nyanibleisia ti wɛ; ngi hindawanda wielei ɛɛ gɛlɛ kunafɔ.”

Ngewɔ lɔ a tuhani galɛi ve numu wɛ hiiva, i ngi gɔ a mɛhɛɛ mɛva. Faale Ngewɔ a tuhani galɛi na kpɛlɛɛ velɔ wu wɛ wa gu a hiila tawao a pielɔ yeetuhani i yekpe, i wua. Ji wiengaa kɛ kpɔma-hani na wa fe i gbotonga kia tuhani a wua.
Ngewɔ a pielɔ wu gbatɛngɔ i yɛla kpele gbi kpɔma-hani waawaa veva watii gbi aako numu gboto ti siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma wu gbɔma-hani va ma li la ti wɛ.
Gbamaile ngengei ji wu piema ɛɛ haani lekee gbua wu mbaa Kristimableisia ma kɛɛ a pielɔ numu gboto ti siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma kaka.

Gbamaile ngengei ji wu piema a kɛlɔ ina yeelɔ a wue, tawao a pielɔ ti Ngewɔ lato, wu goloyii va Kristi Wowili Yekpei na bu wu langɔ la. Ta gbɔma Ngewɔ latolɔ wu gbekpeyei va ti gama kɛɛ mu mbaa Kristimablaa wekeisia.
A ndomɛi ti pieni, ta Ngewɔ vɛlilɔ wu va, jifa Ngewɔ i ngauwanda wai na gɛngɔ a wue.
A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma ngi gbekpeyei na va mue gu a hugɛla.

Nya, nya Pɔɔl nya vulii lɔ naa wu manɛnɛma. Nungaa lɛɛnga lɔ ndema tɛ ngi yɛngaa wu lia nya luwangɔ a yɛla a yɛpɛla, kɛɛ nya maa i guhangaa kɛ ngi ndiiloi wienga. Nya longɔ nya mayeingɔ i yɛla tawao nya hindawandangɔ kia Kristi i yɛ na.

Faale nyaa wu manɛnɛma, waa pie ngaa yaa wu gbalɛ ji nga foo wu ma! Ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ nga gulɔ a ngagbalɛ hinda wiela a nungei nasia ti ndema tɛɛ nya layieisia kɛɛ nya wiehindeisia ti yɛni a dunyamamɔ gbama nda lɔ.
Tɔnya le kɛ mua dunyei ji hu kɛɛ muii jiama a dunyama nɛmahulewe mu gɔisia vayava.
Kɔhakei nasia ma lapi la tii yɛni a dunyei nda gbatɛngɔisia, ti yɛni a Ngewɔ gɔ-hani gbayangɔi nasia lɔ ma gɔlɔ gbayangɔngaa wongoo la.

Mamani mawali gbi nungaa ta hou kɛɛ gbani gbi ta ngili aako nungaa taa Ngewɔ gɔɔ, yeekɔ-haakei jisia ta gulɔ a hunyanila. Nasia ti gangangɔ a Ngewɔ, ma ti giliyii houlɔ a yeekɔ-haakɛi jisia, mu yama a tie Ngewɔ gama mu ti yɛ a nungei nasia ti liima a yɛ a golola Kristi lɔ wɛ.
Ma yeekɔ-haakɛi jisia yayengelɔ kangamɔ gbi ma a lo, ji wua yese vulii wa kpɔyɔ a golola pandawanda.

Na i wu mɔnɛngɔ tamia a ji wu hindeisia gbema a mahu we kɛɛ wuii mbu gɔɔ. Ina numu gbi ngi gilingɔe la kɛ Kristi woo lɔ a ngie, i gili gbɔma a ta yekpe ajifa Kristi woo lɔ a nge kia lɔɔ yeenumui na i na.
Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi i kpaya venga mu wɛ wu maahu kɛɛ wu nyaniva ii le; wu gbekpeva le, tawao kiaa bɛɛ nga lawolɔ a yeekpayei ngi pili kulo kaalɛ wooma, ngɛɛ wufe.
Ngii loni wu gili la kɛ nyaa lapima wu huluwava a nya gɔlɛisia.
Ajifa nungaa lɔ ndema tɛɛ, “Pɔɔl maguhangɔ yɛla a njɛpɛ yagbalɛngɔ lekee lɔ le mu ma ngi gɔlɛisia hu, kɛɛ i fonga mu ma baagɔma yekpe gbi ii ngi ma tawao gbɛogbɛ ii ngi layie hu.”
Mahoungɔe nungaa bondɛi nasia ti kɔɔ kɛ na lɔɔ ma nyɛi kɔlɛi nasia hu nga nyɛi wu gama, ta lɔ nga pie ji nga wa wu gama.
Ɛɛ hitɛ mu wɛ kulo bɛɛ ndeva muɛɛ mu mahɔngɔe mua nungei nasia ta tia yekpe lɛ ɔɔ mu huma ti ma. Ti gbowani kpa! Ta tia yekpe huma ti nyɔunyɔ lɔ ma tawao tia yekpe lɔ ta ti gɛlɛmɛi na gɛ a bɛ ti ma.
Na hu gbi muɛɛ lawo maa pili kaalɛ wooma; ma gɛlɛ kaalɛi na goohu lɔ Ngewɔ i na venga mu wɛ yengeva na tawao wu yeekaalɛi goohu lɔ.
Jifa wu yeekaalɛi ji goohu lɔ, muii windɛni kaalɛ wooma ji mu wani wu gama a Ngowili Yekpei ndalongɔ Kristi ma.

Faale muɛɛ lawo a ngengei na nungaa wekangaa ti pienga kaalɛi nasia wooma Ngewɔ i feni mu wɛ. Na mu lii i ma ta lɔ a ji wu lalei a Kristi a gbaya aako mu gu a ngenge jɛmbɛ wiela wu lia tewengɔ yeengovei ma, watii gbi mu kaalɛi na goohu Ngewɔ a kɛ a mue.
Na wiengaa ma gulɔ a Ngowili Yekpei lelaa ndɔlɔ wekangaa hu ti ma guhangɔ tawao muɛɛ lawo a ngengei na ti wilanga a piela numu weka nda gakamɛi.
Kɛɛ kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ i lawo, i laawo a na Ndemɔi i pienga.”
Ajifa ɛɛ nasia gulu ta tia yekpe lato, Ndemɔi a nasia lɔ gulu ta vulii a ti lato.
Nyaa wu manɛnɛma ngɛɛ nya luvayii i gu wu hu, ngi kpowa hinda wulo bɛɛ wie. Kɔnɛɛ bɛɛ le!
Nyaa wu malolo gbuama kia lɔɔ Ngewɔ i piema; wu wiengɔe kia mbɛlɛhu-nyahɛi na i na, ngi Lahei wumbunga feva hindo yekpe wɛ a ngi nyaha, yeehindoi lɔ a Kristi vulii.
Kɛɛ nya liihɛlɛngɔe ngɛɛ na wɔɔ i Iiv wieni aa wu wie. Kali gasongɔ yɛla tawao i pielɔ Iiv i jumbu hinda wie. Wua bɛɛ ta wu wuhu nyanilɔ hii, wu gbe a lola a Kristi yakpe.

Ajifa numu gbi lekee a wa wu gama a Yesu weka hinda hugɛ i gba na ma mu ngi hinda hugɛma, wa loko heilɔ ngi bu a kohunɛ; tawao wa ngafa kɛɛ ngowili gululɔ ti gba polouŋ Ngewɔ Yafei kɛɛ Ngowili Yekpei na ma, wu majɔɔni a mue!
Kɛɛ nungei nasia wu ti wumbungɔ a Ngewɔ lutu waawangaa tii leweni nya ma kulo bɛɛ.
Kia bɛɛ nya laahu ii leweni a yɛpɛla, ngi Wowili Yekpei na gɔɔlɔ pandawanda nga nde wu ma tawao nya langɔ la wu ji gɔɔlɔ na ajifa mu pienga leiŋ wu gama kaka a pelei gbi.
Ngii hani gbi gbuani wu yeya ji ngi Ngewɔ Ngowili Yekpei leni wu ma; ngi nya yekpe mayeilɔ kɔɔ baagɔma i yɛ wu ma.
Watii na ngi yɛ yengema wu lia Kristimablaa wekangaa lɔ ti yɛ nya pawa. Nga gulɔ a ndela kɛ ngi ti humɛilɔ aako ngi gbɔ wu ma.

Tawao watii na ngi yɛ wu gama ngi gbeweilɔ navoo va kɛɛ ngii wɛlɛni wu ma gbɔva nya ma; mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ti gbuani Masidonia lɔlei hu ti wailɔ a hani kpɛlɛɛ nya gbewengɔ yɛla fa. Kia lɔɔ wɔɔ nga pie, hii ngi loma piema; ngɛɛ kaha gbi la wu wumba.
Kristi a tɔnyɛi lɔ wɔɔ le watii gbi tawao yeehinda yakpei mia ngi piema ji ngi ndema ngɛɛ matɛi ji ngi kpuama a wue navoo hindei va, numu gbi ɛɛ gu aa pie ngi gbe a kpuala Akaya lɔlei hu gbi.
Ngi ji lemaa jifa ngii loni a wue? Ngewɔ kɔɔlɔ kɛ nya lɔnyangɔe a wue.
Na ngi piema kiahuna nga yɛlɔ a pie, tawao ngɛɛ hani gbi hou wu yeya fa, ngii loni nasia wu ti wumbungɔ a Ngewɔ lutu waawangaa ti sabu gbi jɔɔ lawova tɛɛ ti yengema a pelei na lɔ nga pie la.
Gbamaile ndɛɛ lutungaa lɔ a numu bondɛi nasia, ta ndɛi guala kɔlooni ti yengei ma, ta tia yekpe maluve aako ti gbua a Kristi loblaa yekpeisia.
Na ɛɛ gɔla numu gbi ma! Jifa Seitana vulii bɛɛ a ta yekpe maluvelɔ a malikei na a voo.
Faale ɛɛ gɔla numu ma ina ngi yengebleisia ti tia yekpe maluveilɔ ti gbua a pɔɔnamɔi yengebleisia. Kɛlɛmɛi, Ngewɔ a ti hinda nyamuisia yeekpalɛi lɔ la ti ma.
Nyaa wu manɛnɛma gbɔma: waa gili la kɛ ngi gbowangalɔ ji ngi yɛpɛma hii. Kɛɛ wu gili bɛɛ hii, mahoungɔe ngi lo kpowɛi hu wu woolo nya ma aako hinda wulo i yɛ na nya bɛɛ nga lawo la kia ti piema.
A tɔnya ndawoei ji nyɔkɔ ii le Ndemɔi aa nya lo piema ajifa nyaa hindei wiema kia kpowamɔ vulii.
Kɛɛ jifa numu gboto lɔ miando ta lawo wu gama tɛɛ ti gabandengɔ waa le a dunyama hanisia, gbɛɛ nya bɛɛ ngi laawo:
wua vulii wuɛɛ wu nɛmahulewengɔ, famia wa woolo kpowablaa ma a kohunɛ!
Ajifa a gulɔ wu hu ji nungaa ta wu wote a ti luwɔngaa ɔɔ ta wu yeyahani kpɛlɛɛ mɛ ɔɔ ta wu gava ɔɔ ta lɛɛ wu hu ɔɔ ta wu baama gbolɛ.
Nya wufengɔe lumava ma kɛ kaahu ii yɛ mu ma kɛɛ ndiilo hinda bondɛi nasia wieva! Kɛɛ na gbi lekee ta liilo ti lawo la nyaa gbɔma yɛpɛma kia kpowamɔ nya bɛɛ nga liilolɔ ngi laawo la.
Kia lɔɔ Hibublɛisia a tie, hii ngi na. Kia lɔɔ Isrɛlblaa a tie, hii ngi na. Kia lɔɔ Ebraham bɔɔsɔɛisia a tie, hii ngi na.

Ina Kristi yengeblaa lɔ a tie nya layie gbuangɔe a kpowa yia kɛ Kristi yengemɔ yekpe lɔ a nge i lewe ti ma! Ngi yengenga kpayangɔ tewengɔ ti ma, ti nya wunga kpindi-wɛlei bu kpotongɔ i lewe ti ma, ti nya lewenga kaka i lewe ti ma tawao hee i hɛlɛnga nya maahu pɛɛpɛ i lewe ti ma.
Juubleisia ti mahublɛisia ti ndewe numu gbɔyɔngɔ maahu puu maahu taalui veilɔ mbɛ heima lɔɔlu.

Heima sawa Rom mahangeisia ta nya lewe a nguliisia; heima yila nungaa ta lapi nya waava a ji ti yɛ nya hɔwɔhɔwɔ a kɔtiisia. Njaya-lɛndɛi i lɔmbunga a nge gboyei hu heima sawa, tawao heima yila ngi luveilɔ gboyei hu kpɛiŋ, ngi yii hu kpindi yila kɛɛ folo yila.

Jia kpoto hu ngi kanga, kpundɛngaa ti hɛlɛnga nya maahu njaveisia hu, kɛɛ humablaa yeya, kɛɛ nya mbaa Juubleisia kɛɛ nasia Juublaa yaa tie. Kpundɛngaa ti hɛlɛnga nya maahu taa waawaisia hu kɛɛ ndɔgbɔ lambɛisia ma kɛɛ gboyeisia ya kɛɛ nungei nasia ti yɛ nde tɛɛ Kristimablaa lɔ a tie kɛɛ tii yɛni la.
Ngi yengenga kpayangɔ waa nya gahu i gbɔyɔnga; njii gboto i nyaninga nya ma; ndɔlɛ gboto i nya lɔnga tawao nya bolohu a be; watii gboto ngii yɛ gu mɛhɛɛ ma kɛɛ njiima kɛɛ kula ngiliva.
I baa ji kpɛlɛɛ ma kɛɛ pekangaa, ndiihɛlɛ minimini lɔ nya ma Tuuŋ Kristimablei nasia gbi va ti heiheini hu gbi.
Kristimamɔ yila i yɛngaa nyɔngɛ, nya bɛɛ nga yɛlɔ nyɔngɛ; Kristimamɔ yila i wilingaa jumbu hu, nya lii a nyanilɔ waa.
Ina kpɔndangɔe nya ma lawova, nga laawo a hindei nasia lɔ ta nya vakaleweyii gɛ.
Mu Lemɔi Yesu ngi Yewɔɛi kɛɛ ngi Kɛkɛ na numui gbi ta ngi lato kunafɔ i kɔɔlɔ kɛ ngii ndɛɛ gulama.
Ji ngi yɛ Damaskɔs, gɔvinei na i yɛ yenge Mahɛi Aritas bu i sojeisia loilɔ yee tei lamɛisia gbi aako ti nya hou.
Kɛɛ nya mbaa Kristimableisia ti nya gbuɛilɔ tei hu a gɔlɛi yeefolemɛi wee ti nya yei bɛki hu ngi lɔwu ngi yeya.
Kpɔndangɔe nya ma lawova kia bɛɛ kpekpeya gbi ɛɛ gbua hu. Kɛɛ nga yɛpɛlɔ naa kɔloongɔ ndɔwuma hindei nasia ma Ndemɔi i kɛnga a nge.

Ngi Kristimamɔ yila gɔɔlɔ na Ngewɔ i ngi jogbani i lɛ a ngie Aijɛnɛ yeemahuyei hu kungɔ na a foo puu maahu naani. Nya yekpe vulii mia ngi nya ma, kɛɛ ngii yaa kɔɔ ina ji i wieilɔ vulii ngi foo vulii aijɛnɛ ɔɔ ina hinda mia ngi hulɔni, Ngewɔ lekee lɔ i kɔɔngɔ.
Gbɛɛ ngi nde gbɔma, ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i nya jogbɛilɔ i lɛ a ngie aijɛnɛ. Ngii kɔɔ gbɔma ina i wieilɔ vulii ɔɔ ina hinda mia ngi hulɔni Ngewɔ lekee lɔ i kɔɔngɔ,
tawao i hindangaa humɛniilɔ na numu ɛɛ gu aa hugɛ, hindangaa kpaya ii numu gbi wɛ yɛpɛva la.
Faale nga lawolɔ a yeehindei jisia kɛɛ ngɛɛ lawo a nya yekpe, kɛlee hindei nasia ta nya vakaleweyii gɛ.
Kia bɛɛ nga lolɔ ngi lawo, ngɛ yɛ a kpowamɔ, ajifa tɔnyɛi lɔ nga nde. Kɛɛ ngɛɛ lawo aako numu aa gili a nge tewengɔ na ma i tɔnga nya hu kɛɛ i mɛninga nga nde.

Kɛɛ aako nya yaama aa lɛ kabande hinda gbotoi nasia va ngi hulɔni, Ngewɔ i kpalɛ nyamunyamu wɛlɛnga nya luwui ma. Yee kpalɛi lɔ a Seitana lutui yengei wie a ji a nya lewe aako kunafɔ nya yaama aa lɛ hulewengɔ.
Heima sawa ngi yɛ Ndemɔi manɛnɛ ngɛɛ i kpua nya ma.

Kɛɛ i ndeilɔ nya ma yɛ, “Ngauwanda wai ji ngi piengɔ a bie a gulɔ bi va, ajifa watii na ba yɛ nyɔngɛnyɔngɛ, yeewatii mia nya gbayei na i bi hu a yenge i lewe kpɛlɛɛ ma.” Kiahuna nya goohu nɛngɔ waa le lawova a nya yɛla nyɔngɛnyɔngɛ aako Kristi gbayei i yei nya ma nya mahugbeva.

Faale nya goohu nɛngɔe ji kpalɛ a la nya ma Kristi va. Nya gbewe ii fakalewe hu ɔɔ mbɛlɛnyani ɔɔ hou nyamu ɔɔ hinda gbɔugbɔu ɔɔ fitini hu. Gbamaile watii na nga baa a nya nda gahui kpɛlɛɛ, ta lɔ Kristi gahui a wuaa nya hu.

Nya luvama kia kpowamɔ na, kɛɛ wua mia wu kpɔndanga nya ma pieva. Wua mia mahoungɔ wu nya lato. Gbamaile ngii yɛni bɛɛ a gbɛogbɛ, nasia wu ti wumbunga a Ngewɔ lutu waawangaa tii leweni nya ma a pele gbi.
Kabande hinda waawaa gbotoi nasia ta kɛ kɛ Kristi loomɔ mia a nge, ngi ti wielɔ wu lia a ndiihou wa.
Gbɔɔ ngi pienga sɔsiblaa wekangaa wɛ tamia ngi pieni wu wɛ, kɛlee ji lekee ngii loko heini wu wɛ navoo va nguava nya mahindeisia hu. A manu nya ma nyamui ji va ngi pieni a wue!

Heima yeesawa lɔ na ngi nya magbatɛnga wava wu gama tawao ngɛɛ loko hei wu wɛ hani gbi va ajifa wu yeyahani ii le ngaa lo la kɛ wua vulii. Gbɛva sie ndeengaa ii le mahoungɔ ti ti leblɛisia gɔ, ndebleisia lɔ mahoungɔ ti ti leengeisia gɔ.
Nya goohu a nɛɛlɔ nya yeyahani gbi veva kɛɛ nya gbuhɛi vulii gbɔva wu ma. Wa lolɔ a nge kulo hii jifa nya longɔ a wue hulewengɔ?
Wa lumalɔ ma na kɛ ngii wani a navoo hinda yeekaha gbi wu maahu. Kɛɛ wu lɛɛnga wa ndelɔ wuɛɛ kaasoo mia ngi kulanga wu ma, ngi wu hounga kia mani a ndei.
Kɛɛ nga yee na wie? Tutui nasia ngi ti loni wu gama ti hani gbi gbuɛilɔ wu yeya?

Ji ngi Taitɔs manɛnɛni ngɛɛ i li wu gama, ngi pielɔ taa mu mbaa Kristimamɔ weka ti li, Taitɔs i hani gbi gbuɛilɔ wu yeya ta yekpe va? Mua ta ma yenge ngafa yakpei hu lɔ, mua ta ma jia mu nyɔunyɔ gɔɔwɔi hu, ma hinda gbi wie a pele yakpei.
Tɛnga wuaa wɔɔ gba gilima kɛ mua mu magaoma wu gulɔ. Na ii le kulo bɛɛ. Ma tɔnyɛi lɔ le kia Kristi longɔ mu nde Ngewɔ gulɔ, tawao, nya liima ndiamɔisia, hindei gbi ma pie, mu piema gbɔva lɔ wu ma.

Nya liihɛlɛngɔe tɛnga ji nga wa wu gama nga male wu gba na ma nga lo la, tawao tɛngaa, wuɛɛ lo a na nga pie. Nya liihɛlɛngɔe tɛngaa nga male wa yianjia, wa tolo gbua wu nyɔunyɔ ma, wa liilewe wu nyɔunyɔ ma, wa gbewe wu gbekpeyei lekee va, wa yɛpɛ a wu nyɔunyɔ, wa mamani hindangaa wie, wa hindeisia huwu.

Nya liihɛlɛngɔe vulii kɛ ji gbɔma nga wa, mu Yewɔɛi a nya yawufelɔ wu yaama tawao nga wɔlɔ nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ va ti jumbui nasia wiema lekee ti piema wɔɔ ngovama, tawao tii yaa gbeni ngawufema hindei ma kɛɛ puegbuala hindeisia.
Heima yeesawa lɔ naa ngi wama wu gama. Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Numu gbi i sawei nyaningaa, numu fele ɔɔ sawa ti seli tɛɛ ti tɔilɔ i pie.”

Wu mbaangɛi nasia ti jumbu wieni ngovama kɛɛ yeepekeisia gbi, nya longɔ ngi ti laahii; ngi ti laahilɔ ji ngi pɛi yeefelei wieni wu gama, tawao nyaa ti laahiima gbɔma kiahuna lɛ nya maguhangɔ: kɛɛ watii wekei na nga wa nga kpalɛ lalɔ ti ma, ngɛɛ manu numu gbi ma.
Tɔmaseli kpɛlɛɛ wu longɔ la nga felɔ wu wɛ kɛva kɛ Kristi mia i yɛpɛma nya hu. Kristi vakalewengɔ ii le ji wua tieni wa gbɔ hinda ma, a ngi gbayayii gɛlɔ wu lia.

Tɔnya le kɛ Kristi vakalewengɔ yɛla ti ngi waani Krɔsii ma, kɛɛ Ngewɔ gbayei i pienga ngi vulungɔ kiahuna. Mua bɛɛ, ji mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, mu vakalewengɔe. Kɛɛ kpelei na ma foo wu ma Kɔlinti, mua wueni mu hu i kpɔ, ma yɛlɔ mbɛya hu mua Kristi vulungɔi-ni, kɛ mu Ngewɔ gbayei majɔɔnga hinda wieva.
A wua yekpe wogbɛ pandawanda aako wu tɔ ina wu langɔe vulii a Kristi. A tɔnya vulii wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Yesu Kristi lɔ wu hu, ina ji wu wua yekpe wogbɛni wu tɔilɔ kɛ wu gbahailɔ.
Nya langɔ la wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ ti mu wogbɛnga ti tɔnga kɛ toblaa mia a mue vulii a tɔnya.
Kɛɛ mua Ngewɔ vɛlima kɔɔ waa hinda nyamu wie; kɛva ii le kɛ mu gungɔi, kɛɛ aako wu na wie pɔɔnangɔ, kia bɛɛ piengɔe bɛ kpahabublaa mia a mue.
Jifa hindei nasia lekee ta Ngowili Yekpei lɛ gulɔma tia lɔ ma gu a ti wiela; muɛɛ gu a gbɛogbɛ wiela Ngowili Yekpei yamava wooma.
Gbamaile mu goohu a nɛɛlɔ mua mu vakalewengɔ a yɛla kɛɛ wua wu gbayangɔ. Famia ma Ngewɔ vɛli aako wu li gulɔma a yɛla a Kristimablaa yekpengaa.

Na vamia ngi ji kpɛlɛɛ nyɛima wu gama kia nya maguhangɔ a wue, aako watii na nga foo wu ma, ngaa sabu jɔɔ ngagbalɛ hinda wieva a wue ji nga yɛ kpayei na yayengema Ndemɔi i fenga mbɛ wu loova, wu wolova ii le.

Faale naa, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a mu kpɔkɔ-o. A lapi wu yɛ a Kristimablaa yekpengaa; a nya laahiisia wumbu; wu wo i yɛ yila, wu hei ndiilɛli hu, tawao Ngewɔ na ngi longɔ a ndoma kɛɛ ndiilɛli a yɛlɔ wu lia.
A va wu nyɔunyɔ ma a ndoma lii. Ngewɔbleisia gbi mbei tɛɛ ta va wu ma kaka.
Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yauwandei kɛɛ Ngewɔ lomɛi kɛɛ
Kayema Yafa mbaayɛi ti yɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ ma.
Nya Pɔɔl, tomɔ lɔ a nge, nuuvu ii le aa loko lo nya ma tawao nuuvu sabu hu ii le, kɛ Yesu Kristi taa ngi Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ, na i ngi wumbuni hee hu.
Mua nya mbaa Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ mu mbei mua fama gboto yoyoma Galesia lɔlei yee sɔsiisia gama.
Nyaa mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima kɛɛ Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi ngɛɛ ti wu gɔ a ngauwanda kɛɛ ndiilɛli.
Aako i mu bawo nyamu hinda yeya kiahuna, Kristi i koloya gbatɛilɔ mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ lima hindei wieva i ta yekpe gbua a saa mu gbuava jumbui yeya.
Ngɔlɔyɛi kpɛlɛɛ i yɛ Ngewɔ ma kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ. Amiina.
Wu hinda gualangɔe nya ma ajifa hinda hugutungɔi ji wuaa gbelema Ngewɔ na ma i loko loni wu ma ngauwandei na wooma Kristi i pieni a wue, wa ngowili weka gulu.
A tɔnya vulii, “Ngowili yekpe” weka ii na, kɛɛ ngi ji lemaa ajifa nungaa lɛɛngaa lɔ wu wuhu wuma a ji ti lapima Ngowili Yekpei kɔloongɔ Kristi ma maluveva.
Kɛɛ mua ɔɔ malika bɛɛ i gbua ngelegoohu i ngowili le wu ma na i gba na ma mu ndeni wu ma, Ngewɔ i ngi wuaa jahama.
Mu ndenga ngovama tawao nyaa na ndema gbɔma: numu gbi i ngowili lengaa wu ma na i gba na ma wu kuluni, Ngewɔ i ngi wuaa jahama.

Ji ngi ndenga a kɛlɔ kɛ ngi lapimaa kɔɔ nuuvunga ti nya lato? Sawo, ii hii kulo bɛɛ! Na nya longɔ la ta mia a Ngewɔ latoi! Ngi lapimaa aako nya hinda i nɛɛ nuuvungaa wɛ? Sawo, ina na mia lɛ ngi lapimaa pieva, ngɛ yɛ a ngengemɔ Kristi va.
Gbɛɛ ngi hugɛ a wue gbalauŋ, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, kɛ Ngowili Yekpei na ngi ndeni wu ma ii gbuani nuuvu gama.
Ngii majɔɔni a nuuvu gbi tawao numu ii le aa nya gaa la. Yesu Kristi vulii lɔ i kɛni a nge.

Wu mɛninga kia ngi yɛ luva watii na ngi yɛ Ngewɔ vɛli a Juubleisia ti nda welei, kia ngi yɛ a Juwuya gbakpa la Ngewɔblɛisia wooma, ngɛɛ manu ti ma kulo bɛɛ, nga lapi a nya sɔbɛi gbi yee Ngewɔ hindei na hunyaniva.
Nya mbaa Juublei nasia mua tieni mu mahɔngɔ yɛla ngi yɛ leweni ti gbotoma ma Juublaa ti Yewɔ hindei wiela hu kɛɛ kaai nasia maadani ti ndoni a mue.
Kɛɛ Ngewɔ i ngauwanda wieilɔ a nge a ji i nya gbuani ma gba pɛiŋ ti yaa nya le, i loko lo nya ma yengeva ngi wɛ. Tawao watii na i nɛni ngi wɛ
ngi Hindoloi gɛva a nge aako ngi ngi Ngowili Yekpei le nasia ma Juublaa yaa tie ndalongɔ ngi ma, ngii numu gbi mɔlii ndahii va,
tawao ngii lini Jelusalɛm nasia lɔva ti yɛni a toblɛisia nya gulɔ. Kia ngaa na wie, ngi lini yakpe Arebia lɔlei hu lɔ, na wooma ngi yama Damaskɔs lɛi hu.
Foo sawa i leweni pɛiŋ ngi yaa li Jelusalɛm aako mua Pita mu yɛpɛ, tawao mua ta mu yɛ na hoki fele.
Ngii tomɔ weka gbi lɔni kɛlee Jemisi, Ndemɔi ndewei.
Na ngi nyɛima tɔnya le. Ngewɔ kɔɔlɔ kɛ ndɛɛ ii le ngaa yɛ kulama.
Na wooma ngi liilɔ taangaa hu Siria lɔlei hu kɛɛ Silisia lɔlei hu.
A watii na Kristimablei nasia ti yɛ heiheini Judia lɔlei hu tii yɛ nya gɔɔ.
Na lekee ti yɛ kɔɔngɔ ta mia a na nungaa wekeisia ti yɛ nde tɛɛ, “Numui na wɔɔ i yɛ a pie juwuya i yɛ la mu ma taa na Yesu Wowili Yekpei na lema i yɛ lapi wɔɔ hunyaniva.”
Faale ti siɛgbuɛilɔ Ngewɔ ma kɔloongɔ nya ma.
Foo puu maahu naani na wooma, mua Banabasi mu yamɛilɔ gbɔma Jelusalɛm, ngi li a Taitɔs bɛɛ.

Ngi liilɔ jifa Ngewɔ i kɛilɔ a nge kɛ mahoungɔe ngi li. Ji mua tokulɔisia lekee mu gomɛni ngi Ngowili na hugɛilɔ a tie nga nde nasia ma Juublaa yaa tie. Ngii yɛ loni nya yengei na ngi pienga ngovama kɛɛ na ngi piema kiahuna i yɛ a kɛɛ-mɔɔnɛ.
Nya mbaa Taitɔs, kia bɛɛ Grikimɔ a ngie, tii kpɔndani ngi ma ngi heiva bili ya,

kia bɛɛ nungaa lɛɛngaa ti yɛ loni na i wie. Yeenungɛi jisia ti wuaailɔ mu lia yɛlɛŋ mu yabɛɛva, ta kɛ bi tɔaa bɛɛ mu mbaa Kristimableisia mia a tie aako ti tɔ kia mu gbuangɔ la nduwɔyahu jifa mua Yesu Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu. Ti longɔ yɛla ti mu yɛ a nduwɔngaa,
kɛɛ aako mu Ngowili Yekpei yee tɔnyɛi lamagbatɛ wu va hinda aa pie, muii lumani na ma ti longɔ yɛla mu pie.

Kɛɛ nasia Kristimablaa wekeisia ti ti wumbuni, a tokulɔisia, nyaa ji lema ajifa nya gbewe ii le ti yɛni a gbɔɔ; Ngewɔ ɛɛ kiti lewe numu ma bi yɛyii va; nyaa ndema kɛ, tokulɔi nasia tii hinda nina gbi wuni nya gulɔ pieva.
Kia taa na wie, ti tɔilɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i Ngowili Yekpei lela nasia ma Juublaa yaa tie yeengengei loko wuaanga nya yeya, kia lɔɔ i Ngowili Yekpei lela Juublaa ma yeengengei veni Pita wɛ.
Faale Ngewɔ gbayei lɔ i pieni ngi yɛni a tomɔ nasia gama Juublaa yaa tie kia lɔɔ Pita i yɛni a tomɔ Juubleisia gama.

Jemisi, Pita kɛɛ Jɔn, nasia Kristimableisia ti ti wumbuni a tokulɔisia ti kɔɛilɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i ngengei ji venga nya wɛ gba; faale ti loko wuaailɔ mua Banabasi yeya kɛva kɛ mbaanga mia a mua tieni kpɛlɛɛ. Mu hugbatɛilɔ kɛ mua Banabasi ma yenge nasia lia lɔ Juublaa yaa tie, tia ta yenge Juubleisia lia.
Na lekee ti mu mɔlini fa tamia a ji tɛɛ mu yaa gili a hinda-gbɔundablei nasia ti ti lia tawao na vulii mia nya magbɛlingɔ yɛla pieva.
Kɛɛ kia Pita i foni Antiɔk, ngi ngi wiehindei magbuɛilɔ Kristimableisia yaama ajifa i yɛ laailɔ ke kɛ kpulanga mia i pieni.

Pɛiŋ Juublei nasia lɛnga Jemisi i ti looni ti yaa foo Antiɔk, Pita tia mu ndeengɛi nasia Juublaa yaa a tie ti yɛlɔ a mɛhɛɛ mɛ hinda yakpe. Kɛɛ yeenungeisia ti fongɔi wooma, i gbuɛilɔ ti woohu, ɛɛ luma tia tieni taa gbɔma mɛhɛɛ mɛ jifa i luwɛilɔ nasia ma ti yɛ nde tɛɛ kɛlee ti nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti hei bili ya.
Mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia Juublaa a tie tia bɛɛ ti toilɔ Pita ma a nduwɛi ji wiela, tawao Banabasi vulii bɛɛ i ti wokɔɛilɔ i na wie i kɔɔngɔ kɛ ii wɔnani.

Kia ngi tɔni kɛ tii jiama a tɔnya welei na Ngowili Yekpei i kɛni, ngi ndeilɔ Pita ma ti gbi yaama ngɛɛ, “Juumɔ lɔ a bie, na hu gbi biaa gɛ hindei wiema kia nasia Juublaa yaa tie, ba na wie ii gbuani a Juumɔ. Gbɛe na hɔɔ bi lapima kpɔndava nasia ma Juublaa yaa tie bɛɛ ti luva kia Juungaa?”
Tɔnya le kɛ Juungaa lɔ a mue mu leyii hu, muii yɛni a “Nasia Juublaa yaa tie yee jumbungɔisia”.

Na hu gbi mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ a numu yɛlɔ a pɔɔnamɔ i tia ta luahu gbatɛ jifa lekee ngi langɔ a Yesu Kristi, na wieva ii le Sawei longɔ la. Mua bɛɛ mu langa a Yesu Kristi aako Ngewɔ i mu yɛ a pɔɔnablaa i mua tieni luahu gbatɛ jifa mu langɔ a Kristi, na wieva ii le Sawei longɔ la. Gbamaile numu gbi tia Ngewɔ ti luahu ɛɛ gbatɛ jifa a na wie Sawei longɔ la.

Ina hɔɔ kia mu lapima mua Ngewɔ-ni mu luahu gbatɛva a ji mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, mu woteilɔ a “Jumbublaa,” kia lɔɔ nasia Juublaa yaa tie ti na, kɛ Kristi i mɔnɛma aako jumbui i li gulɔma? Ii hii kulo bɛɛ!
Sawei yeenasia ngi ti hunyanini ngɛɛ tii yaa gbekpeni Kristimamɔ va, ina ngi tɔɔtoilɔ gbɔma a ti hugbatɛla, kɛ ngi kɛnga kɛ jumbumɔ vulii lɔ a nge.
I gɛlɛ Sawei lekee ma, nya haangɔe, Sawei vulii lɔ i nya waani, aako ngi vulu yengeva Ngewɔ wɛ. Ti mua Kristi waanga wɔɔ krɔsii ma,
faale nya ii le gbɔma nya vulungɔ aa yɛla, Kristi mia ngi vulungɔ nya hu. Ndɛvui ji na i nya hu kiahuna, i nya hu lɔ jifa nya langɔ a Ngewɔ Hindoloi na i loni a nge, i ngi lɛɛvui ve nya va.
Ngii gbeleni Ngewɔ yauwandei ma. Kɛɛ Sawei i yɛngaa a sabu Ngewɔ i tia numu luahu gbatɛ, kɛ Kristi i haailɔ gbama.
Wu Kristimablaa gbowangɔi nasia wu Galesia! Ye lɔ i wu gbɛgbɛlinga? Hee na Yesu Kristi pieni krɔsii ma, ngi nduawoilɔ gbalauŋ wu gama!
A mɔli yilei ji gbɛmbo lɛ nya wɛ: wu Ngewɔ Yafei majɔɛilɔ jifa wu na wieni Sawei longɔ la ɔɔ jifa wu Ngowili Yekpei humɛnini kɛ wu laala?
Wa yee gu wu gbowa hii! Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ i pieni wu ndɛvu nina lɔto; wu longɔe na wu ngakpua a wu wuma gbaya?
Na kpɛlɛɛ i wu wienga ii yɛni a gbɛogbɛ wu gama? A tɔnya na i yɛni vulii a hinda lɔ.
Ngewɔ a ngi Yafei velɔ wu wɛ, i kaabande hindangaa wie wu lia jifa wa na wie Sawei longɔ la ɔɔ jifa wa Ngowili Yekpei humɛni wu la la?
A gili a na i Ebraham wieni; kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “I lailɔ a Ngewɔ tawao ngi lava a Ngewɔ, Ngewɔ i ngi wumbuilɔ a pɔɔnamɔ.”
Mahoungɔe hɔɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ Ebraham bɔɔsɔɛisia yeetɔnyangɔisia a nungei nasia lɔ ti langɔ a Ngewɔ.

Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i kulɔmayia leilɔ yɛ Ngewɔ a taa nasia Juublaa yaa tie luahu gbatɛlɔ ji ta la a ngie. Faale Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i Ngowili Yekpei hinda hugɛilɔ a Ebraham ji i ndeni yɛ, “Ngewɔ a pielɔ luba i yɛ nuuvu kpɛlɛɛ ma bi sabui hu.”
Ebraham i lailɔ a Ngewɔ tawao i luba majɔɛilɔ; faale nasia kpɛlɛɛ ta la a Ngewɔ ta luba majɔɔlɔ kia i ngi wieni.
Nasia ta gili tɛɛ Ngewɔ a ti gululɔ jifa ta Sawei hou, Ngewɔ jondii lɔ ti ma. Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Numu na gbi ii loni na kpɛlɛɛ wiela ma tɔnyangɔ Sawa Gɔlɛi hu, Ngewɔ jondii lɔ ngi ma!”
I langa na ke kɛ Ngewɔ ɛɛ tia numu gbi luahu gbatɛ jifa a na wie Sawei longɔ la, ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Numui na lekee Ngewɔ a tia ta luahu gbatɛ jifa ngi langɔ a Ngewɔ, tamia a ndɛvui majɔɔ.”
Kɛɛ Sawei houla kɛɛ lola a Ngewɔ ti gba polouŋ ti nyɔunyɔ ma. Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “Numui na lekee a na kpɛlɛɛ wie Sawei longɔ la a ndɛvui majɔɔ hu lɔ.”
Kristi i mu wumawonga sondui yeya na Sawei a wala, ji i woteni a sondumamɔ mu va; ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee ti ngi waani ti ngi hɛlɛ ngulii ma, Ngewɔ jondii lɔ ngi ma.”

Kristi i ji wieilɔ aako lubei na Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni pieva a Ebraham i foo nasia gama Juublaa yaa tie Yesu Kristi sabui hu, kɔɔ mu langaa a Kristi mu kpɛlɛɛ mu Ngewɔ Yafei na majɔɔ i Lahei wumbuni fa.

Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, hindei nasia ta wie folo gbi, nyaa yeengila yɛma a Ngewɔ Lahei yeetɔmaseli. Numu fele ti hinda yangilingaa, ti kɔlɔ gbatɛ fa ti ti lɛisia nyɛi ma, numu gbi ɛɛ gu aa nganyani ɔɔ i mato a hani gbi.
A nda nɛmahu kɛ Ngewɔ i ngi laheisia wumbuni Ebraham lɔ gama kɛɛ ngi bɔɔsɔɛi. Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ii ndeni aa yɛma “bɔɔsɔɛisia” ngi lii aa yɛ faha ma, ngi lii i yɛ “bɔɔsɔ” yakpe lɔ ma tamia a Kristi.

Na nya lii i ma tamia a ji; kɛ Ngewɔ tia Ebraham ti hinda yangililɔ tawao Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbu yɛ ɛɛ nganyani. Sawei na Ngewɔ i feni foo hɔndɔ naani kaalɛ numu gbɔyɔngɔ maahu puu na wooma ɛɛ gu aa hinda yangilingɔi na yanyani tawao ɛɛ gu i Ngewɔ Lahei lufe.
Gbamaile ina jifa numu a Sawei hou famia Ngewɔ a hinda yekpe wie a ngie, kɛ ii piema Lahei na va i mbumbuni, na hu gbi, jifa Ngewɔ lahei wumbuni, famia i feni Ebraham wɛ.

Kɛ gbɔɔ hɔɔ Sawei yengei yɛla? Ngewɔ i ngi hinda yangilingɔi matoilɔ a Sawei kɛva kɛ nuuvunga ti jumbu wienga tawao Sawei yɛma lekee wɔɔ na haaŋ Ebraham bɔɔsɔɛi na Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni ngi gama fa i wa. Malikeisia lɔ Ngewɔ i pieni ti yei a Sawei Mojisi wɛ, Mojisi i fe nungeisia wɛ kɛ i wotenga a nduahu jiagamɔ Ngewɔ taa nungeisia luahu.
Kɛɛ watii na Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni Ebraham gama, ta yakpe lɔ i pieni, nduahumɔ ii yɛ ma.
Kɛ Sawei tia Ngewɔ laheisia ti gɔmaa a ti nyɔunyɔ? Sawo, tii gɔma kulo bɛɛ! Gbamaile ina Ngewɔ jawei a gulɔ a numu bawola, Ngewɔ a taa numui gbi luahu gbatɛlɔ jifa ta yeesawei hou.
Kɛɛ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ dunyablaa gbi lɔ jumbui gbayei yeya; faale kpekpeyei wɔɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni pieva, a pie a nasia lɔ ta la a Yesu Kristi.
Kɛɛ pɛiŋ lala a Kristi yeewatii i yaa wa, mu magbangɔ yɛla sawei yeya, haaŋ i to lalei magɛ gbei ma.
Faale Sawei lɔ mu yɛ ngi va haaŋ Kristi i wa, aako i mua Ngewɔ-ni luahu gbatɛ ji ma la a Kristi.
Kia na watii i hitinga lava a Kristi, muii yaa Sawei gbayei bu.
Jifa wu langɔ a Kristi famia wu kpɛlɛɛ wu yɛnga a Ngewɔ leengeisia, wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.
Ti wu wuailɔ kɛ wua Kristi-ni wu wilinga hu, tawao kiahuna na wu kpɛlɛɛ wu wu lii huyilinga wieva kia Kristi vulii i na.
Faale nduahugɛ gbi ii yaa Juublaa luahu tia nasia Juublaa yaa tie, nduwɔngeisia tia nasia nduwɔ yaa tie, hingeisia tia nyahangɛisia, wu kpɛlɛɛ numu yakpe lɔ a wue, wu wilingɔ hu wua Yesu Kristi-ni.
Ina Kristi woo lɔ a wue, kɛ Ebraham bɔɔsɔɛisia lɔ a wue, tawao wa poohani na majɔɔlɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni fa.
Na nya longɔ ngi nde tamia a ji: ndoi na ngi kɛkɛ woohani i loma ngi yeya, ta ngi houlɔ kia nduwɔ watii lɛ ngi gulongɔ, kia bɛɛ ta vulii lɔ ngi woo a hanii gbi.
Ngi gulongɔi hu, nungaa lɔ na ta ngi mahugbe, ta ngi hindei hugbatɛ haaŋ i to watii na ma ngi kɛkɛ a kɛ ta yekpe ngi hindei hugbatɛva.
Hii lɔɔ mua bɛɛ mu yɛ dunyei yeengafangeisia ti luwɔyɛi hu haaŋ mu yafeisia ti lakpa.
Kɛɛ ji watii yekpei i hitini sɔ, Ngewɔ i ngi Hindoloi yoyoilɔ dunyei hu. I woteilɔ a nuuvu, dunyama nyaha i ngi le, i wuaa Juublaa ti Jawei bu,
nasia mabawova ti yɛ yee Sawei bu, aako mu gbi mu yɛ a Ngewɔ leengeisia.
Kɔɔ Ngewɔ i kɛ kɛ ngi leengeisia mia a mue, i ngi Hindoloi Yafei wuaailɔ mu hu, Ngafei na a Ngewɔ loli gbalauŋ yɛ “Kɛkɛ, nya Kɛkɛ.”
Faale na, ndɔwu yaa gbɔma a bie, ndo lɔ na a bie. Tawao jifa ngi lui lɔ a bie, Ngewɔ a bi gɔlɔ na kpɛlɛɛ hu i ngi yeya ngi leengeisia va.
Wɔɔ ta, wuii yɛ Ngewɔ gɔɔ, famia wu yɛ nduwɔya hu haningaa yeya tii yɛni a Ngewɔngaa.

Kɛɛ kiahuna na wu Ngewɔ gɔnga, ɔɔ, mu nde muɛɛ Ngewɔ i wu gɔnga. Gbɛe wu longɔ wu yama gbɔma dunyama yafeisia gama nasia ti dunyei mahu nasia kpaya gbi ii ti wɛ? Gbɛe wu longɔ wu yama gbɔma ti luwɔyɛi hu?
Wa hɛɛ-gomɛngaa houlɔ folo lɛɛngaa ma kɛɛ ngalu lɛɛngaa kɛɛ foi yeewatii lɛɛnga kɛɛ foo lɛɛnga.
Wu hinda i nya liihɛlɛngɔe! Kɛ ngengei kpɛlɛɛ ngi pienga gbɔva wu ma i yɛma a kɛɛwɛ-mɔɔnɛ lɔ?
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu lemungɔe, a wie kia ngi na, ajifa nya bɛɛ ngi wienga kia wu na. Wuii yaa hinda nyamu gbi wieni a nge.
Taa wu nɛmahu kɛ ngi Ngowili Yekpei leilɔ wu ma haalei hu; jifa nya heegbɛngɔ yɛla.

Kɛɛ kia bɛɛ nya heegbɛi i yɛni a kaha wu ma, wuii lɛɛni nya hu, tawao wuii gbeleni nya ma. Kia waa na wie, wu loko heiilɔ nya bu kia numu a loko hei Ngewɔ malika bu; wu loko heiilɔ nya bu bi tɔa bɛɛ Yesu Kristi mia wu loko heima ngi bu.
Wu goohu nɛngɔ waa yɛla! Nya vuli nga ndelɔ kɛ wu yɛ wu yamɛisia gbualɔ hu wu fe nya wɛ, ina wu yɛ gulɔ. Kɛɛ gbɔɔ na wienga?
Wu nya wotenga na a wu juwu jifa ngi tɔnyɛi lenga wu ma?

Nungaa wekeisia lɔ lapima vulii aako wu lewe ti wooma, kɛɛ na i ti nɛmahu pieva ii nyandeni wu va. Na lekee ti longɔ la ta mia a ji wa gbele nya wohu wu yɛ ti va, aako ti hinda i gbewe wu ma kia wu ndɛi gbewengɔ ti ma.
Nyandengɔe numu i gbewe hii numu wekei va ina na i ngi nɛmahu kpekpengɔe. Ji lɔnyangɔe kpele gbi, nya yɛngɔi hu lekee ii le wu lia.
Nya liima leengeisia, ndo-le-goohu-gbalɛi na a yɛ koonyahɛi ma, nyɔkɔ mia i nya ma wu va haaŋ i lohu wu wie kia Kristi na.
Nya longɔ waa le mua wueni mu yɛ mia ngaamɛi ji, aako ngi nya yɛpɛyii wu gama maluve. Wu hinda i nya liihɛlɛngɔ waa le.
A hugɛ lɛɛ na a nge, wua wu longɔ wu yɛ Sawei bu, wuii na mɛnima Sawei i ndema?
Yɛ hindolo fele lɔ ti yɛ Ebraham yeya, tia nduwɔ-nyaha yila ti yeengila le, kɛɛ nyahɛi na nduwɔ yaa ngie ti yeepekei le.
Ndoi na nduwɔ-nyahɛi i ndeni taa Ebraham lɔ ti ndeni kia ta ndoo gbi le la, kɛɛ nyahɛi na nduwɔ yaa ngie ngi nda loi i yɛni a Ngewɔ Lahei yeehuvɛi lɔ.

Tɔmaseli lɔ a ji. Nyaha felei jisia ti na hinda yangilingɔ fele lɔ va. Yeena i ndeengaa leni nduwɔyɛi hu tamia a Hega tawao ta lɔ hindei na Ngewɔ taa Isrɛlbleisia ti ngangilini Sainai Yiyei wumba, yeetɔmaseli a ngie.
Hega, na looni Sainai Yiyei va Arebia lɔlei hu, i yɛni a tɔmaseli lɔ taa wai Jelusalɛm na va i na kiahuna, ajifa tiaa nduwɔya hu taa ngi leengeisia gbi.
Kɛɛ Jelusalɛm yeena i mahui i yɛni a nyahɛi na lɔ nduwɔ yaa ngie, tawao ta lɔ mu nje le.

Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Goohunɛɛ, nyaha gbemangɔi! Yelei gula a kohunɛ, bia bii ndoo-le-goohugbaalɛ yaati gɔɔni! Gbamaile nyahɛi na ti vayani ngi ma a ndeengaa mato jɔlɔ i lewe nyahɛi na ma ngi hinii ii gbeleni ngi ma.”
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, Ngewɔ leengeisia lɔ a wue kia Aisaki i yɛ na Lahei na va Ngewɔ i mbumbuni.
A watii na wɔɔ ndoi na ti ngi leni a ndoo gbi leyii i juwuya gbakpailɔ yeena ma Ngewɔ Yafei i pieni ti ngi le. Yeehinda yakpei mia i wiema kiahuna bɛɛ.
Kɛɛ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ gbɛ? Yɛ, “Nduwɔ-nyahɛi taa ngi loi gbɛ mbei ti li; ajifa nduwɔ-nyahɛi loi taa nyahɛi na nduwɔ yaa ngie loi tɛɛ gbɔ ti kɛkɛ yeyahaniisia ma.”
Faale na, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, nduwɔ-nyahɛi leengaa yaa a mue, nyahɛi na nduwɔ yaa ngie ngi leengeisia lɔ a mue.
Mu yaa nduwɔyahu, Kristi i mu gbuanga nduwɔyɛi hu! A yɛ na naa, kɛɛ nduwɔya hu ii le, waa luma taa gbɔma wu wote a nduwɔngaa.
A woolo! Nya nya, Pɔɔl ngi nde wu ma kɛ wu lumangaa ti wu hei bili, ya kɛ na gbi Kristi pienga ii yɛni a gbɛ-o-gbɛ wu wɛ.
Nyaa gbɔma numui na laahima a luma ti ngi hei bili ya kɛ kpa lɔ ngi ma Sawei kpɛlɛɛ houva.
Wua wu lapima aako Ngewɔ i wu yɛ a pɔɔnablaa sawa houle wooma, wu wua yekpe gbendanga Kristi ma tawao wu baanga a Ngewɔ yauwandei.
Kɛɛ mua, na mu kulɔgbema ta mia a ji kɛ Ngewɔ a mu yɛlɔ a pɔɔnablaa; ji lɔ mu mawuloma tawao Ngewɔ Yafei a gbɔlɔ mu ma, jifa mu langɔ a Kristi.

Ajifa mua Yesu Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu yɛngaa la, numu heingɔ i yɛla bili ya ɔɔ ngi heingɔ ii le bili ya, gbɛ-o-gbɛ yaa na. Na baama hinda le ta mia a ji ma kɛ kɛ mu langɔe a Kristi a ji ma lo a nungaa wekeisia.
Wuaa gɛ wiimɛ ma pandaa! Ye lɔ i pienga wu gbenga a golo la a tɔnyɛi? I yee pieni i guni wu ma?
Ngewɔ na i loko loni wu ma ta ii le aa ji wie.
Kia ta nde la tɛɛ, “Yisti wulo hii lekee mia a pie lɛwɛ wai gbi i ve i yɛ buufa.”

Kɛɛ nya nya lii longɔe Ndemɔi ma wu va. Jifa mua wueni kpɛlɛɛ mu wilingɔ hu, nya langɔe la kɛ wuɛɛ nya nda nɛmahui gula waa peka wumbu tawao nya langɔe la kɛ numui na i wu lii gbavoma, i yɛ a numu-o-numu, Ngewɔ a kpaalɛ lalɔ ngi ma.

Kɛɛ nya, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, ina kia ti ndema la, nyaa lekee nungaa gaama ngɛ mahoungɔ ti yɛ a nungaa hei bili ya, kɛ gbɛe nungaa ti juwuya hitɛngɔ nya wooma lekee? Ina nyaa vulii na lema, kɛ Ngowili Yekpei ji nga nde kɔloongɔ Kristi haalei ma krɔsii ma ii yɛ numu gbi vawɔli.
Nga yɛ loni nasia ti wu lii gbavoma ti nɔɔ ma ti ngakpua; ti nɔɔ ma vulii ti lewe bili ma ti tia yekpe nuuni.
Kɛɛ wua, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, Ngewɔ i wu gbuanga nduwɔya hu. Kɛɛ waa wu gbuala nduwɔyahu aa yɛ a wu gbuawee wu luwui ma hindeisia wieva. Kia waa na wie, a wu nyɔunyɔ magbewe gbua ndoma hu.
Ajifa Sawei kpɛlɛɛ wuaangɔ njɛpɛ yakpɛi ji lɔ hu; “Lo a nungaa wekeisia kia bi longɔ a bia yekpe.”
Kɛɛ wu luvangaa kia fulahuangɛisia ta pie la, wa wu nyɔunyɔ nyinyi, wa wu gbaalɛ, kɛ a wu mahugbe, ina na ii le wa wu nyɔunyɔ hinda huwulɔ kpɛmgbɛjɛɛ.
Na ngi ndema ta mia a ji: A jia a pelei na Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ a wue, tawao waa wu luwui liima hindeisia wie.

Gbamaile mu luwui liima hinda nyamui nasia mu nuuvuyei longɔ a piela, Ngewɔ Yafei ii loni mu ti wie; tawao hinda yekpei nasia ma lo mu ti wie ji Ngewɔ Yafei a yɛ mu hu, tamia mu nuuvuyei ii loni la. Hinda felei jisia ti mu hu tiaa Tuuŋ lapima wɛlɛva ti nyɔunyɔ maahu tawao ta pielɔ wuɛɛ gu waa na wie wu longɔ wu pie.
Wu jiangaa a pelei na Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ, kɛ kpa ii yaa wu ma sawei houva.
Gbɔɔ nuuvuyei a pie i lailɔ kengelee, hinda nyamui jisia mia ta gbua hu: manɔhɔ hindeisia, ngawufema hindeisia;
hɛɛla nɔmɔliisia ma kɛɛ huana hindei. Nunga ta juwuyalɔ a ti nyɔunyɔ, ta lapi a ti nyɔunyɔ; ta lololɔ, ti liilewengɔ tawao hani gbi ɛɛ gu a tie. Ti luahu a gɔlɛkɔlɛlɔ ti hei a tiwa kɛɛ kuluma;

ta tomaya wie, ndɔi a ti hou, ta ndɔ-gboli-gomɛisia ga, ta hinda wekeisia wie kia jisia ti na. Nyaa na wu laahima kia ngi pienga la ngovama, nasia ta hindei jisia wie tɛɛ Kohunɛ na majɔɔ nasia ti Ngewɔ Mahayɛi bu ta majɔɔ.
Kɛɛ Ngewɔ Yafei i yaa yengema a mue, na a gbua hu tamia a ndoma, kohunɛ, ndiilɛli, ndiigɔlɛ, hindawanda, kpekpeya, pɔɔna hinda wiela,
ngayei kɛɛ ndiihou. Sawa gbii na kɛva kɛ hindei jisia ti nyamungɔ.
Tawao nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ Yesu Kristi woo a tie ti ti nuuvuyei gbakpanga krɔsii ma, tia ngi manima hindeisia kɛɛ ngi liima hindeisia.
Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ i ndɛvui venga mu wɛ, mahoungɔ ta i kɛ a mue ma yee jia hinda gbi hu.
Mu yaama aa lɛ, maa jia mu nyɔunyɔ liima, ɔɔ maa lolo a mu nyɔunyɔ.

Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu tɔngaa wu yilayee i hinda nyamu laasi gbi wienga, mahoungɔ wua Ngewɔ Yafei i wu hu wu ngi lo pele yekpe ma, kɛɛ waa pie a ŋajiŋaji. Tawao a wu jiayii mahugbe aako wua bɛɛ hinda nyamu wie mani aa wu lɔ.
A ya a gbɔ wu nyɔunyɔ ma wu hinda gbɔugbɔisia hu; wu na wiengaa kɛ wu Kristi jawei hounga.
Numu i ta yekpe wumbungaa a baamamɔ waa kɛɛ gbɛ-o-gbɛ yaa a ngie, kɛ i ta yekpe lekee lɔ wɛlɛma.
Numu gbi i ngi wiehindei jɔgbɛ. Kpekpengɔ yɛngaa la, kɛ a mata gbualɔ a na ta vulii i pienga, kɛɛ aa huma na ma numu weka i pienga.
Gbamaile numu gbi a ngi nda ngahɛi lɔ hou.
Mahoungɔe numui na ti ngi gaama a Ngewɔ layiei i luma taa ngi Kaamɔ ti gbɔ hani yekpei kpɛlɛɛ ma i ngi yeya.
Waa wua yekpe wɛlɛ; numu gbi ɛɛ Ngewɔ wuhu baa. Tuhani na numu a hii, tamia lɔɔ a tewe.
Numu i tuhani hinga ngi luwui liima hindeisia yeekpalɛi hu, na a tewe na tamia a hee; i tuhani hiingaa Ngewɔ Yafei gbaalɛi hu, na Ngewɔ Yafei a fe ngi wɛ teweva, tamia a kunafɔ lɛɛvui.
Faale mu gahu aa gbɔyɔ a hinda yekpe wiela; gbamaile muii gbeilɔ kpekpe wiela ma, watii a hitilɔ ma yeenafei majɔɔ.
Faale, watii gbi lekee mu sabu jɔnga, mahoungɔ mu hinda yekpe wie a numu gbi, kakayee nasia mua tieni mu langɔ a Kristi.
A kɔlɔ-loi jisia wɔlɔyii lɔ lɛɛ ngi nyɛima ji ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima na wu gama a nya lokoi vulii!
Nungɛi nasia ti lapima bili gbɔndava wu ma tia mia a nasia ta ti luwumɛi nyandeyii magɛ, ta gbɔma lawo la. Na hu gbi, ta pielɔ lekee aako nungaa taa hitɛ ti wooma a juwuya Kristi krɔsii va.
Nasia vulii bɛɛ ta ti hei bili ya tɛɛ Sawei hou; ti longɔ ti wu hei bili ya kɔɔ ti lawo kɛ ti gunga wu ma lumava ti yenge wu luwui ma.
Na hu gbi, nya nga lawo lekee a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi krɔsii lɔ; ajifa ngi krɔsii sabui hu lɔ dunyei haangɔ nya wɛ, nya haangɔ dunyei wɛ.
Hinda gbi ii le ina numu heingɔe bili ya ɔɔ ngi heingɔ ii le bili ya. Na baa i ma ta mia a ji Ngewɔ a numu gbatɛ a nina.
Nasia ta sawei ji hou ti lɛɛvuisia hu, Ngewɔ i ti gɔ a ndiilɛli kɛɛ manuma tia kɛɛ Ngewɔ nungeisia kpɛlɛɛ!
Pɛiŋ ngi ya kɔlɛi ji nyɛila gbɔyɔ: gbɛɛ ngi nde; numu gbi aa gbɔma nya vawɔli, ajifa kpɔi jisia ti nya luwuma ta kɛlɔ kɛ Yesu luwei mia a nge.
Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yauwandei i yɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ ma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia. Amiina.
Nya Pɔɔl, nya i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ i nya yɛni a tomɔ Yesu Kristi va, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima Kristimablei nasia gama ti ɛfisɔs, nasia tɛɛ wote jifa ti wilingɔ hu tia Yesu-ni:
Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ kɛɛ Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi ti wu gɔ a ngauwanda kɛɛ ndiilɛli.
A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma jifa kia mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu, i ngelegoohu gbekpeyɛi yeelasii kpɛlɛɛ wienga a mue mu yafeisia.

Pɛiŋ bɛɛ wɔɔ dunyei i yaa gbatɛ, Ngewɔ i loko longa wɔɔ mu ma yɛva a ngi woo, a ji mua Kristi-ni ma wili hu aako mu jiayii i yɛ sɛwɛsɛwɛ Ngewɔ yaama, tawao jumbu gbi aa yɛ mu ma. Ndomɛi va Ngewɔ pieni a mue,
hugbatɛngɔ yɛla ngi lii hu mu woteva a ngi leengeisia Yesu Kristi sabui hu, ji lɔ nɛngɔ yɛla ngi wɛ pieva.
Na a pielɔ tato i yɛ Ngewɔ ma ngi yauwanda wai va i pieni a mue gbaama, ngi Hindoloi sabui hu, na ngi langɔ la.
Jifa Kristi i haani krɔsii ma, i mu wumawonga a ngi ŋamɛi tawao Ngewɔ i gbenga mu jumbuisia ma. Ngewɔ yauwandei ya wɔlɔni ma kpa;
na ya wɔlɔngɔ wa i pieni a mue a ngi nɛmahu gbi kɛɛ ngi hinda hugɔɔlei.
Ngewɔ i na wieilɔ i yɛ ngi lii hu, i hinda hugbatɛngɔ lɔwungɔi na hugɛ a mue i yɛ ngi lii hu pieva a Kristi loko.
Yeehinda hugbatɛngɔi na Ngewɔ a ngakpua lɔ ji yeewatii a hiti, ta mia a ngi gbatɛ-hani kpɛlɛɛ lɛla ma hinda yila; hani gbi ti ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunyei hu, i Kristi yɛ a ngui ti mahu.
Hindei gbi a wielɔ kia i Ngewɔ lii hu kɛɛ kia i hugbatɛni la; tawao Ngewɔ i loko loilɔ mu ma yɛva a ngi nungeisia, mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu kia i yɛ ngi lii hu pieva pɛiŋ wɔɔ i yaa hani gbi gbatɛ.
Mua, mua yese mu liiloni Kristi ma. Kɛɛ i loko loilɔ mu ma aako mu tato ve Ngewɔ wɔlɔyei wɛ.

Wua bɛɛ wu woteilɔ a Ngewɔbleisia ji wu ngowili yeetɔnyangɔi mɛnini, Ngowili Yekpei na i pieni Ngewɔ i wu bawoni. Wu lailɔ a Kristi tawao Ngewɔ i ngi lokowoi wuilɔ wu ma yɛva a ngi woo a ji i ngi Yafei na veni wu wɛ i Lahei wumbuni fa.

Ji mu Ngewɔ Yafei majɔɔnga, mu langa la kɛ ma na majɔɔlɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni feva ngi nungeisia wɛ, tawao a pielɔ mu la la kɛ Ngewɔ a nasia gbualɔ yɛlɛŋ nduwɔyahu ngi woo a tie. A mu ngi wɔlɔyei lato!
Sabui ji va lɔ i hiye watii ma ngi mɛnini kɛ wu langɔe a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi, tawao wu longɔ a Ngewɔbleisia kpɛlɛɛ,
ngi yaa lɛɛvui a siɛgbuala Ngewɔ ma wu va. Nga wu laa gɛlɔ ji nga yɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima
tawao nga mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ngi Kɛkɛ wɔlɔngɔ wai manɛnɛ aako i ngi Yafei ve wu wɛ, yee-Ngafei i pie wu nɛmahu i lewe, i Ngewɔ gɛ a wue, aako wu tɔnyɛi gɔɔ kɔloongɔ ngi ma.

Nyaa ngi vɛlima gbɔma kɔɔ wu nɛmahuisia ti lawo tɔnyɛi na gɔva gbalauŋ a gbua Ngewɔ gama aako wu hani na gɔɔ i wu lolinga kulɔgbeva, kɛɛ kabande gbekpeya gboto wai na Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbunga feva ngi nungeisia wɛ,
kɛɛ ngi gbayei huleweni kpa i yengema mu hu, mua mu langɔ a Kristi. Yeekpekpeya yakpei ji i yengema mu hu ti yakpe tia kpaya wai na
Ngewɔ i Kristi wuni la hee hu, i ngi hei ngi yeja gakei ma ngelegoohu.
Ngewɔ Kristi yɛlɔ a maha, ngi lewengɔ polouŋ mahubleisia gbi ma kɛɛ nasia kpaya wuangɔ ti yeya, kɛɛ tomableisia, kɛɛ mahawaisia tawao i leweni toma-biyɛi yeekpayei ma i dunyeihu kɛɛ na poma.
Ngewɔ i hani kpɛlɛɛ wuailɔ Kristi bu, kɛ i ngi wotɛnga a ngui hani gbi mahu sɔsii va.
Sɔsii i yɛni a Kristi gbuhɛi lɔ, tawao sɔsii lɔ i Kristi yakpuani, Kristi na i hani kpɛlɛɛ yakpuani dunyei hu gbi.
Bi wiengɔ kia haamɔ Ngewɔ yaama, ajifa wu gangani a Ngewɔ, wa jumbu hindeisia wie.
A watii na, wu jiani a pele na lɔ hinda nyamublaa ti jiama la; wu golongɔ yɛla ngafa nyamui nasia ti hinda gbi ti maha nyamui wɛ, ngafei na i yengema kiahuna a nungei nasia ti gangangɔ a Ngewɔ.

A tɔnya kia ti na, hii wɔɔ mu gbi mu yɛ na, ma lewe a mu nyɛkɛ gbuala, ma hinda gbi lekee wie mu gbuhɛisia liilɛliva kɛɛ mu nɛmahuisia. Kia lee nungaa gbi ti na, Ngewɔ i liileweilɔ huɛɛŋ mu ma jumbui va.
Kɛɛ Ngewɔ manumangɔ waa le, tawao ngi longɔ waa a mue,
faale kia bɛɛ mu haangɔ Ngewɔ yaama yɛla jifa mu gangangɔ a ngie, ji mua Kristi mu wilingɔ hu i mu vuluilɔ i mu wumbu hee hu. Ngewɔ yauwandei wooma mia wu bawonga.
Jifa mu wilingɔ hu mua Kristi-ni, i mua tieni wumbuilɔ hee hu i pie mu yɛ ngi mahayɛi ma ngelegoohu.
I ji wieilɔ aako watii gbi va ngi yauwanda hulewengɔ wai i gɛ, kɛɛ ndomɛi na va i pieni a mue Yesu Kristi sabui hu.
Gbamaile Ngewɔ yauwandei wooma mia wu bawonga mu lalei va a Kristi, wua yekpe wu wiehindeisia va ii le, aako numu gbi aa lawo.
Ngewɔ mia mu gbatɛni, tawao Kristi sabui hu, i mu gbatɛnga ngenge yekpei nasia wieva lɔ i hugbatɛni mu va a ngova pieva.
Wua ti wu leni Juublaa yaa wue, Juublaa ta wu loli a “pɔnɔblɛisia” ta tia yekpe loli a biliblɛisia, jifa ta ti luwui lewe ma. A gili gbɔɔ wɔɔ a wue.

A watii na wuii yɛ Kristi gɔɔ. Hotangaa lɔ wɔɔ a wue, wu gba Ngewɔ nungei nasia ma i ti wumbuni. Wuii yɛ Ngewɔ hinda yangilingɔi nasia ma toongɔ laaheisia ma i mbumbuni ngi nungeisia gama, wu yɛlɔ na dunyei hu wu liiloma gbi ii na, tawao wuii yɛ Ngewɔ gɔ.
Kɛɛ kiahuna na, wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu, wua wɔɔ wu maguhangɔ polouŋ a Ngewɔ, i wu lalangaa gbla jifa Kristi i woteni a saahanii i haa.

Gbamaile Kristi vulii i wanga mu wɛ a ndiilɛli a ji i Juublaa tia nasia Juublaa yaa tie yɛnga a numu yila. A ngi gbuhɛi vulii lɔ i pɛlɛ-bondɛi na woloni la, na i ti luahu gɔlɛngɔ wɔɔ, kɛ ndiimanyamu wuaangɔ ti luahu.
A ngi haalei i Juubleisia ti jawei gbuɛilɔ kɛɛ yeesawa mumuisia aako i kɛnyɛ felei jisia wote a numu nina yakpe tia tieni ti wilingɔ hu, kɛ i ndiilɛli wuaanga ti luahu.
Hee na Kristi pieni krɔsii ma, ta lɔ i ndiimanyamui gbɔyɔni ti luahu; yeehee na mia i kɛnyɛ felei jisia wɛlɛni hu, i ti yɛ a numu gbuha yila, i yama a tie Ngewɔ gama.
Famia Kristi i wailɔ i Ngowili Yekpei le wu ma kɔloongɔ ndiilɛli ma numui gbi va, wua Juublaa yaa wue wu maguhangɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, kɛɛ Juubleisia, ti magutungɔ a ngie.
Kristi sabui hu lɔ mu kpɛlɛɛ, Juublaa kɛɛ nasia Juublaa yaa tie ma gu a wala mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ gama ngi Yafei gbayei hu.
Faale naa, wua Juublaa yaa wue wuii yɛni gbɔma a hotangaa; wu mbaa taalingaa lɔ a Ngewɔ nungeisia, wua tieni kpɛlɛɛ Ngewɔ leengeisia a wue.
Wua bɛɛ wu wiengɔe kia pɛlɛ na. Tobleisia tia tutuisia lɔ ti kpujani, tawao yeendiihu ngajei vuilɔ a Yesu Kristi!
Ta lɔ i houni pɛlei kpɛlɛɛ ma, a pie ti lo yeepɛlei loma i wote a pɛlɛ magayemangɔ Ndemɔi gɔɔma.
Wua bɛɛ wua Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu, a wu makpɔlɔ wua Ngewɔblaa wekɛisia gbi i wu wote a pɛlei na Ngewɔ Yafei a yɛ mbu.
Sabui ji vamia, nya Pɔɔl, nga hɛɛ wu va, kia bɛɛ kpindiwɛlɛbumɔ a nge Yesu Kristi va, wua wu va Juublaa yaa wue.
Pɛiŋ ngi ya li gulɔ, i laailɔ leiŋ kɛ Ngewɔ, ngi yauwandei hu, i ngengei ji venga nya wɛ kɔɔ ngi pie wu gbekpeyei va.
Ngewɔ i ngi hugbatɛ lɔwungɔe hugɛilɔ a nge, kia ngi nyɛinga sange.
Tawao wu na gaangaa ngi nyɛini, wa gulɔ a na gɔla ngi kɔɔngɔ kɔlooni Ngewɔ hinda lɔwungɔi na ma Kristi i ngayengema.
Wɔɔ ta, Ngewɔ ii yeehinda lɔwungɔi ji magɛni a nuuvungaa kɛɛ kiahuna i pienga ngi Yafei i hugɛnga a kayema looblɛisia kɛɛ ngi lutuisia.

Yeehinda lɔwungɔi a ji lɔ kɛ Ngowili Yekpei i pienga nasia Juublaa yaa tie tia Juubleisia ti gbɔnga Ngewɔ lubeisia ma; ti yɛni a Kristi gbuha yakpei lɔ, ti gbɔngɔ hani na ma Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni fa, Yesu Kristi sabui hu.
Ngewɔ pienga ngi yɛnga a ngengemɔ ngowili yekpei va a ngi yauwandei hu we, na i feni mbɛ gbama, a ngi gbayei yengeihu wɛ.

Numui na Ngewɔbleisia kpɛlɛɛ ti lewengɔ ngi ma, i leweni nya ma; na hu gbi nya lɔ Ngewɔ i ngauwandei ji veni nya wɛ liva nasia Juublaa yaa tie gama a Ngowili Yekpei kɔlooni Kristi gbatɛ wai na ma tɛɛ gu a mbugɔɔla;
tawao gbɔma ngi fasai numui kpɛlɛɛ gama kia Ngewɔ a yee ngi hinda hugbatɛngɔ lɔwungɔi yayenge. Ngewɔ na hani gbi gbatɛni, i ngi hugbatɛ lɔwungɔi lɔwuilɔ foo gboto lewengɔ kpɛlɛɛ va wɔɔ,
aako sɔsii sabui hu, malikei yeemahangeisia tia ngafa nyamui nasia ti na ti ngi nɛmahulewei yeelasii kpɛlɛɛ gɔɔ.
Ngewɔ i ji wieilɔ kia lɔɔ wɔɔ dunyei lɔtomɛi i hugbatɛni pieva, tawao i pieni a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi loko lɔ.
Jifa mua Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu tawao mu langa a ngie, ma ndiigba jɔlɔ liva Ngewɔ gɔɔbu, mu kɔɔngɔ kɛ a wololɔ mu ma.
Faale nyaa wu manɛnɛma, waa yɔkɔ jifa kpalɛ i lama nya ma wu va; ji kpɛlɛɛ i wiemaa aako wu nafa.
Sabui ji va lɔ kia ngi ji kpɛlɛɛ lenga nga gula lɔ mu Kɛkɛ gɔwɔbu,
na a hani gbi gɔ ti ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunya a ndɛvui.
Nyaa Ngewɔ manɛnɛma kɔɔ i pie ngi Yafei i kpaya gbua ngi wɔlɔya wai hu i fe wu wɛ aako wu yafeisia ti gbaya,
tawao nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima ngɛɛ i pie Kristi i hei wu liisia hu kia wu langɔ a ngie. Nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima ngɛɛ wu gbɔku ndoma hu, tawao i gbaya wu liisia hu,
aako wua Ngewɔbleisia gbi wu kpaya majɔɔ Kristi lomɛi yawɔlɔyii hugɔva gbalauŋ kɛɛ ngi guhayii kɛɛ ngi wungɛi kɛɛ ngi hubɔyii.
Ngewɔ i pie wu Kristi lomɛi gɔɔ, kia bɛɛ numu ɛɛ gu aa kpɛlɛɛ gɔɔ, aako wu gbua vulii a Ngewɔ.
Ngewɔ na, ngi gbayei i yengema mu hu, a gulɔ i na wie kpotongɔ kaka tewengɔ polouŋ na ma ma ngi mɔlila ɔɔ ma gilila,
Yesu Kristi kɛɛ Ngewɔbleisia ti mbɛlɛya ve Ngewɔ wɛ watii gbi va, kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ. Amiina.
Faale ngi wu manɛnɛ, nya nya Pɔɔl, ngi kpindiwɛlɛ bu jifa Ndemɔi yengemɔ a nge, a luva a tuvei na i yɛ Ngewɔ nɛmahu jii wu lolini.
A wua yekpe mayei tawao, wu makɛngɔ i yɛla kpele gbi, tawao ndiihou i yɛ wu wɛ. A ndoma gɛ wu hinda i gu wu nyɔunyɔ hu.
A lapi a wu sɔbɛ gbi yɛva ngoyilɛi na hu Ngewɔ Yafei i hugbatɛnga, a ji wa hei ndiilɛli na hu i wu yɛnga a numu yila.
Kpuha yakpei mia a mue tawao Ngewɔ Yafei i yakpe, kia lɔɔ liiloma yakpei na Ngewɔ i mu lolinga kulɔgbeva.
Ndemɔi yakpe, lalei yakpe, nguɛi na i yakpe ti mu wuani la Ngewɔ biyei hu;
Ngewɔ yakpe taa Kɛkɛi nuuvu kpɛlɛɛ va, na Ndemɔi le nungeisia kpɛlɛɛ mahu, a yenge a numui gbi tawao, i numui kpɛlɛɛ hu.
Mu gbi a ngilangila, mu mboya hanisia majɔɔnga kia Kristi i kɔɛkɔɛini mu ma.
Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Ji i yɛ lɛma ngeleima, i liilɔ a kɔhou gboto waa; i mboya haningaa gɔɛkɔɛilɔ nuuvungaa ma.”
Gbɔɔ “i lɛilɔ ngelemahu” yeembui le i gbua ji ma i yeilɔ gbɔma ndɔu.
Faale ta lɔɔ i yeini ndɔu, talɔ gbɔma i lɛni polouŋ ngelemahu, aako i yɛ hani gbi hu dunyei hu gbi.

Ta lɔ i mboya haningaa venga nuuvungaa wɛ gbama; i kpaya veilɔ mu lɛɛnga wɛ yɛva a toblaa, i kpaya ve pekeisia wɛ yɛva a Ngewɔ lutungaa, i kpaya ve ti lɛɛngaa wɛ ta lewetewe ta Ngowili Yekpei le, yeenasia ti yɛngɔ a sɔsii mahublɛisia kɛɛ kaamɔngaa.
I ji wieilɔ aako i Ngewɔbleisia gbi magbatɛ Kristi yengei va kɔɔ mu Kristi gbuhɛi lo.
Faale na, mu kpɛlɛɛ ma lɛlɔ ma mu yɛ a numu yila mu layii hu a Ngewɔ kɛɛ ngi Hindoloi gɔlɛi; ma wotelɔ a numu lakpangɔngaa, mu wiengɔ kia Kristi na.
Na wiengaa muɛɛ yaa wie kia ndopongaa, ndɛi nasia numu wɛlɛbleisia ta nungaa gaa la ti yakava, taa wu hɔwɔhɔwɔ la hu kia viivii tia njavei ta pie a ndɛndɛ mumuisia.
Kia na aa wie, mu yɛngaa a tɔnya le, mu lo a mu nyɔunyɔ, ma lakpalɔ a pele gbi mu wie kia Kristi, na sɔsii yeengui a ngie.

Ta lɔ i pieni ngi gbuhɛi yeemahakɛisia gbi ti looni nga pandaa, yeengila i ngi nda yɛmɛi. Yeehakɛi kpɛlɛɛ ti yengengaa pandawanda a leenga kia mahoungɔ yeengila gbi i ngi nda yengei wie la, kpuhɛi gbi a loolalɔ kia nungeisia ta lo a ti nyɔunyɔ.
Nyaa naa wu laahima kpɔtukpɔtu a Ndemɔi gbayei ngɛɛ waa yaa luva kia nungei nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ta pie, nasia tɛɛ gili a hinda yekpe gbi kɛlee baabaa hindeisia,
tawao nɛmahu gbi ii ti ma. Ti nda gbi ii ndɛvu ninɛi na ma Ngewɔ a fe nungaa wɛ jifa tii gbɛogbɛ gɔɔ tawao ti woohu gbɔndangɔ.
Tɛɛ yaa wufe kulo bɛɛ; gbɛogbɛ ii gbeweni ti ma kɛlee pie nyamu hindei, ta manɔhɔ hindei yeelasii gbi wie kɛlɛma ii ma.
Kɛɛ na ii le taa wu gaa la kɔloongɔ Kristi ma!
Wu ngi hinda humɛninga vulii tawao kia ngi woomablaa a wue, ti wu gaailɔ a tɔnyɛi na i Yesu Kristi hu.
A gbe wu luvayii wovei na ma i yɛ pie wa hinda nyamui nasia wie, wu luvayii wovei na i yɛ wu nyani, a ji i yɛ pie hindei nasia ta numu yaka yeemani a wu lɔ.
Mahoungɔe vulii ndii nina kɛɛ nɛmahu nina ti yɛ wu hu,
tawao mahoungɔe wu tuva nina wumbu na Ngewɔ kpatɛni kɔɔ i wie kia i na, pɔɔnahu kɛɛ kayemahu a tɔnyahu we.
Faale a gbe ndɛɛ gulalei ma, numu gbi i yɛ a tɔnyɛi le ngi mbaa Kristimamɔi ma ajifa Kristi gbuha yakpei yeemahaakɛisia lɔ a mue.
Wu lii i lewengaa, waa luma wu liilewei aa wu lo jumbu hinda wiema; tawao waa luva kpɛiŋ yeendilewei hu.
Waa pele ve Seitana wɛ pieva wu jumbu wuli.
Numu na wɔɔ ngi hɛlɛngɔ a humɛi, mahoungɔ i gbe humɛi ma, i tɔtoo a ngengei na wiela a navoo jɔɔ hu pɔɔna hu ngi mahindeisia va kɛɛ gbɔva fɛɛliblɛisia ma.
Waa njia nyamu le numu ma kɛlee njɛpɛi nasia ta kpɔma wie, njɛpɛi nasia nyɔkɔ ta hinda hugbatɛ nungaa ti gbewengɔ fa aako na wa nde i kpekpe wie a nasia ta wu woi mɛni.
Waa Ngewɔ Gayema Yafei lii nyani; ajifa Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ Ngewɔ lokowoo le i wu ma kɛva kɛ ngi woo lɔ a wue haaŋ i to mbayoya voloi ma.
A gbe ndiimanyamui gbi ma kɛɛ ndiimavulɛi kɛɛ ndiilewei. Waa yaa lumbe, waa numu yɛli, tawao waa kili nyamu wumbu numu gbi va.
Kia waa na kpɛlɛɛ wie, a hindawanda wie a wu nyɔunyɔ, wu nasia mamamau lɔ hinda nyamu a ti wie, wu manu wu nyɔunyɔ ma, kia Kristi i pienga Ngewɔ i maanunga wu ma.
Faale naa, kia Ngewɔ liima leengeisia a wue, mahoungɔe vulii wu lapi aako wu wiehindeisia ti gbua a ngi ndei.
Mahoungɔ ndoma i jia a wue hinda gbi hu wu lɛɛvui hu, kia lɔɔ Kristi i loni a mue, i ngi lɛɛvui ve a saahanii gu nɛnɛɛ na nɛngɔ Ngewɔ wɛ.
Jifa Ngewɔ nungeisia a wue, puegbua hinda ɔɔ manɔhɔ hinda ɔɔ mani nyamu wiela nungaa ti yeya-hanisia ma, maa ii houni kulo bɛɛ ndaa gɛva vulii bɛɛ wu lia.
Tawao maa ii houni wu loko wili ngufeba yɛpɛ lela hu ɔɔ baaba yɛpɛ ɔɔ ndawɔ yɛpɛ. Kia waa na wie, a ya a siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma.

A la la kɛ numu gbi lekee a puegbua hindei wie ɔɔ manɔhɔ hinda ɔɔ a mani nyamu wie nungaa ti yeya-hanisia ma ɛɛ heima gbi jɔɔ kunafɔ mia Kristi taa Ngewɔ ta yɛ na mahayɛi ma; gbɛva hanimanimɔ wiengɔi kia numu na a vɛfɛ nɔmɔli yewɔi vɛlilei ma
Waa luma numu gbi aa wu wɛlɛ a baabaa yɛpɛngaa; yeehindei nasia vulii va lɔ Ngewɔ a liilewe nasia ma tɛɛ golo ngi wɛ.
Faale gbɛ-o-gbɛ aa yɛ wua numu bondɛi nasia luahu.
Wua vulii wu yɛ wɔɔ kpindi hu lɔ, kɛɛ i hiye watii na ma wu woteni a Ndemɔi woo, wu fofoi hu lɔ. Faale mahoungɔ wu luva kia fofohublaa,
gbamaile yeefofoi ji huvei lɔ a pie nungaa ti hinda gbi wie na kpekpengɔ, pɔɔnangɔ, tawao tɔnyangɔ.
A lapi wu Ndemɔi liima hindei gaa wu kɔɔ.
Waa wili baabaa hindei nasia hu kpekpeya gbi ii hu nungaa ta pie, gbɛva nasia ti kpindi hu tia mia ta yeehindei nasia wie. Kia waa na wie, a yeehindei jisia magbundɛ gula fofoya.
Mawufengɔe hulewengɔ gbo laliva vulii hindei nasia ma ta pie ndɔwuma.
Kɛɛ foofo i wungaa yeehindei jisia kpɛlɛɛ ma kɛ ti yɛyii yeetɔnyɛi maa i gɛnga gbalauŋ.
Ajifa hani gbi lekee numu a gu a tɔla, foofo le. Famia ta nde tɛ: “Njiimɔi, wu, bi hiye hee hu, tawao Kristi a voolɔ i foofo wu bi ma.”
Faale a wu luvayii mahugbe. Waa luva kia nungei nasia tii hinda hugɔɔ, kɛɛ a luva kia nɛmahuleweblaa.
Watii gbi lekee wa gu a hinda yekpe wiela mahoungɔ wu pie, ajifa nuuvuisia ti nyamungɔe a folei ji.
Waa yɛ a kpowablaa, a lapi kɔɔ gbɔɔ Ndemɔi longɔ la wu pie.
Ndɔ aa wu hou, ajifa a hinda lɔ huwu lekee; kia na aa wie, Ngewɔ Yafei ta i wu laave.

A wule wu nyɔunyɔ gama ngulei nasia ti Saam Gɔlɛi hu kɛɛ Kristimableisia ti wuleisia; a Kristimableisia ti wuleisia yaa kɛɛ Saamisia kɛɛ ngulii nasia Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ, a wu lii gbi siɛgbuava Ndemɔi ma.
Mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi biyɛi hu a siɛgbua mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ ma kpele gbi hindei gbi va i wiema.
A wuaa wu nyɔunyɔ bu mbɛlɛhei na gɛva i wu yeya Kristi va.
Hiniblɛisia, a wuaa wu hiningɛisia bu, bi tɔngaa bɛɛ Ndemɔi mia wu wuama ngi bu.
Gbamaile hinii lɔ kpaya i ngi wɛ nyahɛi maahu kia lɔɔ kpaya i Kristi wɛ sɔsiblɛisia maahu; tawao Kristi na ngi gbuhei a sɔsiblɛisia ta vulii lɔ i sɔsiblɛisia bawoni.
Faale mahoungɔe hinimɔ gbi i golo ngi hinii wɛ kia sɔsiblɛisia ti golongɔ Kristi wɛ.
Nyahamɔi, lo a bi nyahɛi a ndomɛi na nyɔkɔ Kristi i piengɔ a sɔsiblɛisia gbi, i ngi lɛɛvui ve ti va.
I ji wieilɔ kɔɔ i sɔsiblɛisia wua fo a njɛi kɛɛ Ngowili Yekpei;
aako i sɔsiblɛisia ve ta yekpe wɛ kia numui na, nyandengɔ waa tawao mbɛ gbi ii ngi ma.
Mahoungɔe hingeisia ti lo a ti nyahangɛisia kia ti longɔ a tia yekpe ti gbuhɛisia. Hindoi na ngi longɔ a ngi nyahɛi ngi longɔe a ta yekpe.
Numu gbii na aa lolo a ta yekpe ngi gbuhɛi. Kia aa na wie, a ngi gbuhɛi makɛlɔ a mɛhɛɛ, a mahugbe, kia lɔɔ Kristi a pie a sɔsiblɛisia,
ajifa ngi gbuhɛi yeemaahakɛisia lɔ a mue.
Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Sabui ji va, hindo a ngi kɛkɛ lolɔ kɛɛ ngi nje i vɛfɛ ngi nyahɛi ma, kɛ ti veengɔ ti yɛnga a numu yila.”
Tɔnya hubɔngɔ lɔwungɔ lɔ hugɛngɔ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ji hu, tawao ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ kɔlooni Kristi kɛɛ sɔsii lɔ ma.
Kɛɛ kɔlooni wua bɛɛ lɔ ma: mahoungɔ nyahamɔ gbi i lo a ngi nyahɛi kia ngi longɔ a ta yekpe tawao mahoungɔ hinimɔ gbi i baa gɔɔ waa ngi hinii ma.
Ndeengɛisia, kpa le wu ma na gbi wieva wu leblesia ta nde wu ma pieva ajifa Ndemɔi woomia a wue, tawao namia pɔɔnangɔ pieva.
Sawei kpɛlɛɛ Ngewɔ i feni Mojisi wɛ yeehaalayei lɔ Lahei langɔ ma, i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Bagɔɔ bi kɛkɛ ma taa bi nje,
aako hindei gbi i nɛɛ bi ma tawao bi lɛɛvui hu i guha dunyei hu.”
Ndolebleisia, waa hinda wie a wu leengeisia a pie ti lii i lewe. Kia waa na wie, a ti makɛ a pelei na mahoungɔ Kristimamɔ i pie, wu ti gaa a na mahoungɔ ti pie.
Nduwɔngeisia, a golo wu luwɔkɛisia wɛ, nduwahu kɛɛ magbɛlihu; tawao a pie a ndiigole bi tɔngaa bɛɛ wu piema Kristi lɔ wɛ.
Watii na wu luwɔkɛisia ta yɛ wu gbema yeewatii lekee ii le waa yɛ ngenge yekpe wiema aako ti wu lato; kɛɛ a yɛ a na wie Ngewɔ longɔ la a wu lii gbi kia Kristi luwɔngaa.
A wu luwɔyengei wie a kohunɛ bi tɔngaa bɛɛ wu yengema Ndemɔi lɔ wɛ, nuuvungaa gbama ii le.
A la la kɛ Ndemɔi a numu gbi pawalɔ ngenge yekpei na va a pie, i yɛ a nduwɔ ɔɔ ii yɛni a nduwɔ.

Nduwɔkɛisia, hii mahoungɔ wu wu luwɔngɛisia hou kpekpengɔ; wu gbe a ti huluwala. I yɛ wu nɛmahu kɛ Ngewɔ na ngelegoohu ngi woo lɔ a wua kɛɛ wu luwɔngɛisia tawao mu gbi mu gbɛmboyii i yakpe, Ngewɔ ɛɛ topooma wie.
Gbɛɛ ngi kɔlɛi ji gɛlɛ a ndela ngɛɛ, wu gbayei i lɛ gulɔma Ndemɔi ngi gbaya wai hu.
A wu mayili a kɔhakei nasia kpɛlɛɛ Ngewɔ a fe wu wɛ aako wu gu a lapila a kaaso nyamui nasia Seitana a nungaa wɛlɛ la.
Gbamaile muii lapima a nuuvungaa; mu lapima a ngafa nyamui nasia lɔ ti na hinda gbi, yeemahangeisia kɛɛ yeekpaayablɛisia kɛɛ ngafangei nasia nungaa ta hɛɛ ti ma a watii ji mu hu kia kpindi.

Faale a wu mayili a kɔhakei nasia Ngewɔ fenga wu wɛ wu mahugbeva. Aako yeefolo nyamui nasia ti gbuangaa, wuɛ yama a wooma we ji wu gɔnyamui a gbundɛ wu ma; tawao yeendapi na i gɛlɛngaa, wa gulɔ huɛɛŋ a loola kpaukpaungɔ.
Faale a loo kpakpaungɔ wu magbatɛngɔ i yɛla, wu lia yilingɔ a tɔnyɛi, pɔɔnɛi yɛngɔ a kɔlu-lɛɛvɛ i wɛlɛni wu liimɛi,
tawao wu gɔwɔhu gɔwɛi i yɛ a magbatɛi na wa yɛ hu Ngowili Yekpei leva kɔlooni ndiilɛli ma.
Watii gbi lalei hou yeya kia kɔvɛlɛi na; ajifa i yɛngaa wu yeya, ndikpa gbandi-gbandi nasia Seitana a pili wu ma wa gulɔ a ti huhoula la, tɛɛ foo wu ma.
Tawao wu mbayoyei gulu wu pɛlɛ wumba a bɔlei, kɛɛ Ngewɔ Yiɛi i yɛ a kɔbolei na Ngewɔ Yafei a fe wu wɛ.

A ji kpɛlɛɛ wie, wa Ngewɔ vɛli Tuuŋ, wa ngi gbɔmi huvɛli. Wu yaa hinda gbi wiema a Ngewɔ vɛli a pelei na Ngewɔ Yafei a kɛ. Faale gbɛogbɛ i wie, waa gbe a Ngewɔ vɛlila waati gbi, tawao a yɛ a Ngewɔ vɛli Tuuŋ Ngewɔ nungeisia kpɛlɛɛ va.
A Ngewɔ vɛli nya bɛɛ va aako i yɛ a ngowili wu nya laa ji nga lo ngi yɛpɛ aako ngi yɛpɛ a ngaulewe, ngi pie nungaa ti hinda lɔwungɔi na gɔɔ Ngowili Yekpei i hugɛnga.
Ngowili Yekpei ji va, Yesu Kristi yaamei lɔ a nge kia bɛɛ ngi kpindiwɛlɛ bu kiahuna. A Ngewɔ vɛli aako ngaulewe i yɛ nya hu ngowili yekpei leva kia mahoungɔ ngi ndela.
Mu mbaa Kristimamɔi Taikikɔsi, na mu longɔ la tawao Ndemɔi yengemɔ yekpe waa a ngie, a nya mavaa gbi gɛlɔ a wue, aako wua bɛɛ wu nya yɛyii gɔɔ.
Na vamia ngi ngi loma wu gama aako i mu kpɛlɛɛ mu yɛyii hugɛ a wue, i yama i wu lii gba.
Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ kɛɛ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ti Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ gɔ a ndiilɛli kɛɛ ndoma kɛɛ lanaya.
Ngewɔ i ngauwanda ve nasia gbi wɛ ti longɔ a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi a kunafɔ lomɛi. Amiina.
Nya Pɔɔl, kɛɛ Timoti, Yesu Kristi yengeblaa a mue, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima Kristimablei nasia gama ti Filipai, tia Yesu Kristi-ni ti wilingɔ hu vulii kɛɛ tokulɔisia tia nasia ta gbɔ ti ma.
Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ tia mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ti wu gɔ a ngauwanda kɛɛ ndiilɛli.
Nga siɛgbualɔ nya Yewɔɛi ma wu va watii gbi wu hinda a hitɛ nya wɛ;
tawao watii gbi ngi yaa Ngewɔ vɛlima wu kpɛlɛɛ va nga ngi vɛli a kohunɛ waa lɔ,
pelei nasia va wu gbɔnga la nya ma Ngowili Yekpei vayava hu i hiye folei na vulii ma wu lani a Yesu Kristi i to folei ji ma.
Faale nya langɔe la kɛ Ngewɔ na i ngenge yekpei ji lɔtoni wu hu, a lolɔ piema i kpɔyɔ Folei na ma Yesu Kristi a yama.

Wu hinda lɔ Tuuŋ nya lii hu! Faale pɔɔnangɔ nya va giliva hii kɔlooni wu ma; ajifa wu gbɛɛnga nya ma mua ngengei na wiema Ngewɔ i fenga nya wɛ gba pieva kiahuna na ngi kpindiwɛlɛ bu kɛɛ watii na nya hugbɛmbongɔ yɛla kɛva kɛ tɔnya lɔ a Ngowili Yekpei kɛɛ pieva nungaa ti la la kiti gbi aa yɛ ti ma.
Ngewɔ lɔ nya jeli le kɛ tɔnyɛi mia nga nde wu ma ji nga nde ngɛɛ nya longɔe a wu kpɛlɛɛ kia lɔɔ Yesu Kristi vulii ngi longɔ a wue.
Nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima aako i pie ndoma lii na i wu goohu wu nyɔunyɔ va i ya a gbaya Tuuŋ kɔɔ wu gu a tɔnyɛi gɔla, tawao wu yɛ a kiti lewe pɔɔnangɔ,
aako hindei na kpekpengɔ tewengɔ hinda yekpei kpɛlɛɛ ma wu gu a mbumbula pieva. Na wiengaa wu sɛwɛsɛwɛngɔ a yɛla tawao tɔwanyani ɛɛ yɛ wu ma Folei na ma Kristi a yama.
Na gbi wa pie a yɛ a hinda yekpe waa lɔ tawao Yesu Kristi yakpe lɔ a pie wu ji wie, aako nungaa ti Ngewɔ wɔlɔ, ti ngi lato.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, nya longɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ hindei nasia ti nya wienga ti pienga numu gboto lɔ lekee lama a Ngowili Yekpei.
Famia sojei nasia gbi ta Rom Maha Wai wɛlei mahugbe kɛɛ pekei nasia gbi ti mbei ti kɔɔlɔ kɛ jifa Kristi yengemɔ a nge famia ti nya wuni kpindiwɛlei bu.
Tawao nya wuava kpindiwɛlei bu i pienga Kristimableisia gbotoma ti lii valanga panda Ndemɔi ma na hii ti lii lɔ lekee gbaama Ngowili Yekpei leva a ngaulewe.
Tɔnya le kɛ ti lɛɛnga ta Ngowili Yekpei lelɔ kɔlooni Kristi ma tolo gbuava kɛɛ jifa ti longɔ a njianjia, kɛɛ pekeisia ta pie vulii a ndii yekpe lɔ ti longɔ kpekpeya i gbua hu.
Kɛlɛmayei jisia ta pielɔ hii jifa ti longɔ a nge ajifa ti kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ kɛnga a nya yenge ndeva leiŋ kɛ tɔnya lɔ a Ngowili Yekpei.

Pekei nasia ti lolongɔ tɛɛ Ngowili Yekpei le kɔlooni Kristi ma a ndii yekpe, ta ndelɔ aako ti kpekpeya jɔɔ hu tia yekpe va; ti lii lɔ ma tɛɛ ta hinda gboto huwulɔ nya yeya kia lɛ ngi mbei kpindiwɛlei ji bu.
Njia gbi ii na ma ti longɔ ti pie a nge! Na kpewengɔ nya ma ta mia a Ngowili Yekpei lelei a pele gbi lekee, i yɛ lema sabu yekpe ma ɔɔ ndɛhu. Tawao nga goohunɛɛlɔ Tuuŋ,
ajifa ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ na wa fɛli nya va kɛɛ kpɔmɛi na a gbua Yesu Kristi Yafei gama ta pielɔ mahubleisia ti gbe nya ma.

Na kpewengɔ waa nya ma tawao nya lii i ma ta mia a ji kunafɔ ngaa gbaha a nya yengei wiela, tawao waati gbi, kakayee ngamɛi ji, ngi ndiilo waa majɔɔ aako nya layie hu kɛɛ nya wiehindei ngi pie nungaa ti Kristi mbɛlɛhei gɔɔ, ngi haa bɛɛ ɔɔ ngi vulu.
Gbamaile gbɔɔ ndɛvui yeesabui le? Nya nya wɛ, ndɛvui yeesabui lɔ a yengela Kristi wɛ. Nya haala ta, a walɔ a nafa wa nya gama.
Kɛɛ ngi lɛmbingaa nga gulɔ a ngenge yekpe mato wiela, faale ngii kɔɔ ina nga nya haalɛi lɔ wumbu ɔɔ nya lɛmbilɛi.
I wienga bi tɔaa bɛ tia nya laalama a leenga ngejahu we kɛɛ kɔwɔhu. Nya longɔ waa le ngi gbua ndɛvui ji hu ngi yɛ Kristi gama, tawao ji nyandengɔ polouŋ nya va.
Kɛɛ aako ngi gbɔ wu ma, baagɔma lɔ nya yɛla ma ndɛvu hu i lewe nya haalɛi ma.
Nya langɔe a ji, faale ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ ngi yɛmaa lɛ na gbɔva wu gbi ma, aako wu lalei a Kristi kɛɛ wu goohunɛɛ mato.
Nga ji wielɔ kɔɔ ngi wangaa gbɔma wu gama wu sabu matongɔ jɔɔ mata gbuava a nge tuvei va wu piema wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.

Kiahuna hinda yakpei na baagɔma i ma tamia a ji wa luva kia Ngowili Yekpei kɔlooni Kristi ma i ndeni yɛ wu pie, kɔɔ ngi gungaa a wala wu gama ɔɔ ngii guni, nga mɛnilɔ kɛ wuaa looni kpaŋ, wu lii i hani yakpe ma tawao wa lapi a ngooyila kɛɛ wu liima hindei yakpe lalei na va a gbua Ngowili Yekpei hu,
tawao waa luwa nasia ma ti lolongɔ a wu yengei. Wu lii i loo watii gbi; ji lɔ a kɛ a tie kɛ ta gbahalɔ tawao kɛ wua wa temaya majɔɔlɔ, jifa Ngewɔ lɔ a teemayɛi ve wu wɛ.
Gbamaile wua wu sabu yekpe waa majɔɔnga gbama yɛva a Kristi yengeblaa, wu lava lekee ii le a ngie, kɛɛ jifa gbɔma kpaalɛ a la wu ma ngi va.
Wa gulɔ na a gbɛɛla nya ma yeendapii ji hu. Ndapi yakpei na wu yɛ tɔ wɔɔ nga kɔ ta mia, kia wu tɔma la, ngi kɔma kiahuna bɛɛ.
Ina wu luvayii Kristi hu i wu gɔnga a ndii kpakpau, ina ngi lomɛi a wu nɛpɔlɔ, ina wua Ngewɔ Yafei-ni wuaa mbaaya hu, tawao hindawanda kɛɛ manuma lɔ wu hu wu nyɔunyɔ va,
Nyaa na wu manɛnɛma hɔɔ, kɔɔ wu pie nya goohu i nɛɛ waa a ji wu giliyii a yɛ yakpe, wu longɔ a wu nyɔunyɔ mahɔɔngɔ, wu lii i yɛ yakpe kɛɛ wu liima hindei.
Waa hinda gbi wie wua yekpe lekee nafava, ɔɔ aako nungaa ti nde tɛɛ numu waawaangaa lɔ a wue, kɛɛ a wua yekpe mayei wu nyɔunyɔ gama, kpema gbi wa nungaa wekɛisia fesa wua yekpe ma.
Wu mbaangɛisia ti nda hindei i gbewe wu ma vulii, wu wumayei lekee ii le.
Mahoungɔ wu wiehindei tia Yesu Kristi wiehindei ti yɛ yakpe:
Tia Ngewɔ ti gbatɛyii i yakpe wɔɔ gba, kɛɛ ii gilini la lapiva kɔɔ taa Ngewɔ ti maa i hɔɔ a kpaya.
Kia aa na wie, i gbuailɔ toma wai na a ngi wumaye, i wote a nduwɔ. I wieilɔ kia lɔɔ nuuvu, i gbua nga ngi yɛngɔ a nuuvu.
I ta yekpe mayeilɔ, i lo goloma Ngewɔ wɛ i luma i haa, hee na i pieni krɔsii ma.
Na vamia Ngewɔ i ngi loni tomɛi na tewengɔ tomɛi kpɛlɛɛ ma ngelegoohu, i mbiyɛ ve ngi wɛ tewengɔ mbiyɛ weka gbi ma.
Faale, baagɔma veva Yesu biyɛi wɛ, Hani kpɛlɛɛ ti ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunya kɛɛ ndɔu ta mawɛɛlɔ ngi gɔɔbu,
tawao ti gbi ta ndelɔ leiŋ tɛɛ Yesu Kristi lɔ ti Lemɔi le ngɔlɔyɛi veva mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ wɛ.

Faale naa nya liimablɛisia, kia lɔɔ wu yɛ woolo nya layie ma tuuŋ watii na ngi yɛ wu lia, fesangɔ waa a yɛla wu golo mbɛ tewengɔ na ma ji ngɛɛ yɛ wu lia. A wua yekpe ve Ngewɔ wɛ nduwahu kɛɛ magbɛli wu yɛ lɔɔ a lapi haaŋ wu mbawoyei majɔɔ,
ajifa Ngewɔ lɔ tuuŋ yengema wu lia, aako i pie mani i wu lɔ tawao wu kpaya majɔɔ ngi nda liima hindei wieva.
Wu yɛngaa hinda gbi wiema, waa gbonyɛ wu nyɔunyɔ ma tawao waa wu nyɔunyɔ laabla,

aako numu gbi aa wu yia nyamu le tawao wu joowi jumbui ma, wu yɛ sɛwɛ kia Ngewɔ leengaa yekpengaa, wu heini dunya hu kavablaa kɛɛ jumbublaa ti ndavengɔ. Mahoungɔ wu voo ti lia kia tumbekeisia ta ngelei ma voo la,
a ji wa Ndɛvu ve yiɛi le ti ma. Wu ji wiengaa, nga sabu jɔlɔ mata gbuava a wue Folei na ma Kristi a wa, ajifa na wu pienga a kɛlɔ kɛ ngenge gbayangɔi kpɛlɛɛ ngi pieni ii yɛni a kɛɛwɛ-mɔɔnɛ.
Tɛnga ti nya waamaa nya ŋamɛi i wu kia saahanii na wa fe Ngewɔ wɛ, tamia a wu lalei a Kristi. Na wiengaa hii, kɛ nya goohu nɛngɔe tawao kɛ mua wueni kpɛlɛɛ lɔ mu gbɔnga nya goohunɛɛi ma.
Hii lɔɔ mahoungɔ wua bɛɛ wu goohunɛɛ, mua wueni mu gbɔ wu goohunɛɛi ma.
Ndemɔi i lumangaa, taa nya lii hu Timoti loova wu gama hugutungɔ, kɔɔ ngi wu gama va gɔɔ nya lii i lɛli.
Ta yakpe lɔ wu hinda i mua ta lii hu tawao ngi gbewengɔe vulii wu va.
Yeepekeisia gbi ti gbewengɔ ti wuma hindei lekee lɔ va, tii gbeweni Yesu Kristi liima hindei wieva.
Tawao wua vulii wu ngi gbekpeyii gɔɔlɔ, kia mua ta mu Ngowili Yekpei yeengengei wienga la kia hindolo tia ngi kɛkɛ.
Faale ngi nya hindei gɛlɛyii gɔngaa lekee, ta lɔ nya lii ngi ma ngi loova wu gama.
Tawao nya lii lɔ looni Ndemɔi ma kɛ a pielɔ vulii ngi gu a wala wu gama hugutungɔ.
Ngi tɔnga kɛ a nyandelɔ ngi mu ndee Ipafɔditɔsi lo wu gama na mua ta mu ngenge gboto wienga, mu ndapi gboto gɔnga Kristi va tawao wu vamia i wanga, gbɔva nya ma.
Wu gbi wu lɔ-mani lɔ waa ngi ma, tawao ngi lii gbuangɔe ngi goohu jifa wu yɛ mɛniilɔ kɛ i heegbɛilɔ.
I heegbɛilɔ vulii a tɔnya, i loni te i haa. Kɛɛ Ngewɔ i manuilɔ ngi ma, tawao ta yaangɔ ii le, i manuni nya bɛɛ lɔ ma, i ndiinyani gboto veela nya ma.
Faale nya longɔ waa le ngi ngi lo wu gama aako wu goohu i nɛɛ gbɔma ji wa ngi lɔ, nya bɛɛ nya liinyani i gɛlɛ.
Kɔnɛle a loko hei ngi bu a kohunɛ waa ajifa wu ndee mia a ngie, wua tieni wu longɔ a Ndemɔi. A baagɔma ve nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ wɛ ta na wie i pienga,
ajifa i ngi lɛɛvui gbuɛilɔ ndɔgbɔ a lo te i haa Kristi yengei va, kɔɔ i kpɔmɛi na wie nya ma wua vulii wuii yɛ gu a piela.

Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, pɛiŋ ngi yaa kɔlɛi ji gɛlɛ, nya longɔ ngi nde ngɛɛ wu goohunɛɛ jifa wua Ndemɔi-ni wu wilingɔ hu. Ɛɛ yɛ a mɔnɛ gbi nya va lajiava hindei nasia hu ngi nyɛinga ngovama, tawao ngi lajiangaa ti hu, kpundɛi na i wu mahu, mahu a yeilɔ.
A wu mahugbe a nasia ta hinda nyamuisia wie, ngilangɛi nasia, nungei nasia ti nɔɔngɔ hu tɛɛ kɛ ta numu luwui lewe ma.

Mua mia mu heingɔ bili yeekpekpei ya, yeenungei nasia ii le, ajifa mua ma Ngewɔ vɛli ngi Yafei gbɔmi hu lɔ, tawao gbɔma mu goohu nɛngɔ jifa mua Yesu Kristi-ni mu wilingɔ hu. Muii lani a hindei nasia nungaa ta pie ti luwui lewe gomɛisia hu.
Nga gulɔ vulii a hɛlɛla a hinda bondɛi nasia. Ina numu gbi langɔe la kɛ a gulɔ a hɛlɛla a ngi luwui lewela ma, sabu gboto lɔ nya wɛ tewengɔ ti ma pieva hii.
Ajifa ti nya leni hoki yila kɛ ti nya heinga bili ya, Isrɛlmɔ mia a nge ndavengɔ, ngi gbuani Bɛnjami bembei hu lɔ, Juumɔ a nya kɛkɛ kɛɛ nya nje. Juubleisia ti Jawei houla va, Farisiimɔ lɔ wɔɔ a nge,
tawao na kpewengɔ waa yɛla nya ma, tamia a juwuya hitɛ la Kristimableisia wooma. Ina Sawei houla a gulɔ i numu yɛ a pɔɔnamɔ, kɛ nyamu yakpe bɛɛ ngii kani.
Kɛɛ hindei kpɛlɛɛ wɔɔ ngi mbumbuni a nafa hinda, ngii yaa mbumbuni a gbɛogbɛ na va Kristi i pienga nya wɛ.

Hindei nasia lekee ii le, ngi hani kpɛlɛɛ wumbunga a gbɛ-o-gbɛ yee na va ngi jɔngɔi lewengɔ polouŋ ti ma, tamia a nya Lemɔi Yesu Kristi gɔlɛi. Ngi va lɔ ngi hani gbi wilinga; ngi ti kpɛlɛɛ wumbunga a manɔhɔ gbama lɔ, aako ngi yɛ a Kristi woo,

mua ta mu wili hu pandawanda. Pɔɔnamɔ yaa gbɔma a nge Ngewɔ yama hindei nasia va ngi pienga, pɔɔnamɔi na nyɔkɔ numu a wote la ji a Sawei hou. Ngewɔ i nya yɛnga na a pɔɔnamɔ jifa nya langɔ a Kristi; pɔɔni na a gbua Ngewɔ gama jifa nya langɔ a Kristi.
Na lekee kpewengɔ nya ma tamia a ji mua Kristi ma wili hu, kɛɛ kpayei na yayenge i ngi hiyengɔi hu hee hu, kpaalɛi nasia ti lani ngi ma, nyɔkɔ i la nya ma, ngi hee na nyɔkɔ wie i pieni,
nya lii ma ngɛɛ Ngewɔ a nya bɛɛ wumbulɔ hee hu i nya vulu.
Ngii ndema ngaa yɛma ngi wilanga a na kpɛlɛɛ wiela Ngewɔ longɔ ngi pie ɔɔ kɛ ngi yɛnga a numui na mahoungɔ ngi yɛla. Nya lapima tuuŋ mawaa na va Yesu Kristi i welanga a nya yɛla a ngi woo fa.

Tɔnya le, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, ngii lani la vulii kɛ ngi gunga yeemawaa ma; na hu gbi hinda yakpei na nga pie ta lɔ a ji nga gbewe gbua lɔ na kpɛlɛɛ hu i lewenga, ngi lapi a nya sɔbɛ gbi fova na ma i nya gulɔ.
Faale, nyaa wiimɛ ma tuuŋ nga li yakpe piimɛi gɛlɛmɛi aako ngi gu mawaa ma, tamia a kunafɔ lɛɛvui Ngewɔ i nya lolinga ma Yesu Kristi sabui hu.
Mua kpɛlɛɛ mu layii a Kristi huhitingɔ, mahoungɔ ndii yakpe ji i yɛ mu goohu. Kɛɛ ina ndii weka mia i wu lɛɛngaa goohu, Ngewɔ a pielɔ wu hugɔɔ gbalauŋ.
I yee gbi yɛna, a mu yɛ a jia tuuŋ a sawa yakpei na mu jianga la wɔɔ i to kiahuna ma.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a yɛ tuuŋ a nya wokɔɔ. A woolo nasia ma ti jiama a pele wɔnɛi nasia mu kɛnga a wue.
Ngi ji lenga wɔɔ wu ma kaka, tawao nyaa laajiama hu nga wɔɔ; numu gboto lɔ na ti luvayii i Kristi haalɛi krɔsii ma yɛnga a gbama hinda.
Ti gɛlɛmɛi a jahama lɔ, gbamaile ti luwui liima hindeisia lɔ ti yewɔɛi le. Ta matɛi gbua a na lɔ mahoungɔ ti wufe fa, tawao ta gili lekee a dunyei ji hu hanisia lɔ.
Na hu gbi, mua mu yɛmii a ngelegoohu lɔ tawao mua mu Bawomɔi, mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi mawuloma, i gbua ngelegoohu i wa.
Mu gbuha huhaangɔi jisia ta haa, Kristi i wangaa a yeekpuhɛi jisia maluvelɔ i pie ti wie kia ngi nda wai i na ngɔlɔya hu, a kpayei na yayenge a pie i gu a hani kpɛlɛɛ wuaala ngi mahayɛi bu.

Faale na, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, ngi loni a wue kpa tawao wu mani i nya lɔnga kpa! Wa pie kpa nya goohu i nɛɛ tawao nga mata gbua kpa kpele gbi a wue! Nya liima ndeengɛisia, hii mia mahoungɔ wu loo kpaŋ, waa wote wu luvayii hu kia wua Ndemɔi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.
Yuodia wua Sintiki, nyaa wu manɛnɛma, a lapi wu woo i yɛ yila kia ndeenyahalengei nasia tia Ndemɔi-ni ti wilingɔ hu.

Kɛɛ bia, nya mbaa ngengemɔ lɔnyangɔi, nya longɔ bi gbɔ nyahangɛi jisia ma; jifa mua tieni mu ngenge gbayangɔ wienga Ngowili Yekpei vayava hu, mua Klɛmɛnt-ni kɛɛ nya mbaa ngengeblaa wekɛisia gbi, ti biyɛi nyɛingɔ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi na hu fuublɛisia ti lɛisia ti hu.
A goohu nɛɛ waa kpele gbi ji wua Ndemɔi-ni wu wilingɔ hu. Gbɛɛ ngi nde gbɔma: a goohunɛɛ.
A bɛwɛbɛwɛya gɛ a numu kpɛlɛɛ. Ndemɔi lɔ wama hugutungɔ.
Hinda gbi aa wu liihɛlɛ, kɛɛ wu yee yɛni gbi Ngewɔ vɛlima, a ngi vɛli kpele gbi a na wu gbewengɔ fa tawao wu siɛgboto gbua ngi ma watii gbi wa yɛ ngi vɛlima.
Faale ndiilɛli na Ngewɔ a fe, na numu gbi ɛɛ gu a ngi yɛyii gɔla a wu liisia mahugbelɔ kɛɛ wu nɛmahuisia jifa wua Yesu Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu.

Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, kɛlɛma yɛpɛi lɔ ngi ndema kɔlɛi ji hu a ya a gili a hindei nasia lekee ti gbekpengɔ tawao nungaa ta tato: tia mia a hindei nasia ti lɔnyangɔ, baagɔma i ti ma, ti wɔnangɔ, ti sɛwɛsɛwɛngɔ, hindei nasia numu gbi a lo la tawao ti malɔwɔi nyandengɔ.
Hindei nasia wu majɔɔni a nge, a ngayenge kia ngi yɛ nde la kɛɛ kia ngi yɛ pie; tawao Ngewɔ na a ndiilɛli ve mu wɛ a yɛlɔ wu wooma.
Nya goohu nɛngɔ wa Ndemɔi hu, kɛ kia na hu i lɛmbinga ka, nya ma lii i yamanga wu goohu. Ngii ndema ngaa yɛma nya hinda i gbeilɔ a gbewela wu ma sabu lɔ wuii majɔɔni kɛva kɛ wu gbewengɔe nya va.
Tawao ngii ji lema jifa ngi gilinga la kɛ wu nya gbuanga ndɔgbɔ, jifa nya liilɛlingɔe a na gbi a yɛ nya yeya.

Ngi kɔɔlɔ gbɔɔ hinda-gbɔundaa le a yɛ numu ma kɛɛ ji nɛnɛɛ a yɛ numu ma. Yeemakɛi ji gungɔe nya hu aako hinda gbi ngi yɛ na, watii gbi nya liilɛlingɔe, nya goovengɔ i yɛla ɔɔ ndɔlɛ i yɛ nya ma, hani i yɛ nya yeya mɔnungɔ nya ma ɔɔ i yɛ kulo hii.
Kristi lɔ a kpaya ve nya wɛ guva hinda gbi bu.
Kɛɛ hinda yekpe waa mia wu pieni ji wu gbɔni nya ma nya hinda-gbɔugbɔi hu.

Wua vulii wu Kristimableisia wu Filipai wu kɔɔlɔ vulii pandawanda kɛ watii na ngi gbuani Masidonia lɔlei hu, Ngowili Yekpei legbele ninɛi wu ma, wua yakpe mia Kristimablaa a wue wu gbɔni nya ma; wua lekee mia nya hinda-gbɔugbɔi i lani mua wueni ma kɛɛ yeenafei.
Ji ngi yɛ Tɛsalonika la wai hu, ngi gbeweni kpɔma va tewengɔ heima yila ma, wu njooyoilɔ nya wɛ.
Tii yɛma nya longɔ lekee ngi yɛ a hani majɔɔ a wue gbama; nya longɔ wu yɛ a kpekpeyei mato wie, i yɛ a wu yeena mahu wu pienga.

Kɔlɛi ji a selilɔ kɛ hani kpɛlɛɛ wu fenga nya wɛ, ngi majɔɛilɔ tawao i guilɔ, i mɔnu! Kia na Ipafɔditɔsi i wanga a wu hindawanda hani kpɛlɛɛ, na hii nya gbewengɔ fa ngi yeemaleema jɔnga. Yeehani jisia ti wiengɔe kia saahanii gunɛnɛ numu a fe Ngewɔ wɛ, saai na bonda a nɛɛ ngi wɛ tawao a ndahou.
Tawao Yesu Kristi sabui hu, na gbi wa gbewe fa, nya Yewɔɛi a kpualɔ ngi gbatɛ wai hu i fe wu wɛ.
Ngɔlɔyɛi i yɛ mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ wɛ kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ! Amiina.
Ngewɔ nungei nasia Yesu Kristi woo a tie, nya fama gboto yoyoma ti wɛ. Kristimablei nasia ti mbei nya gama, tɛ ta va wu ma.
Ngewɔ nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ ti mbei tiaa fama gboto yooyoma wu wɛ, kakayee nasia ti Rom Mahɛi yeepɛlɛbu.
Nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima kɔɔ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi yauwandei i yɛ wu kpɛlɛɛ ma.
Nya Pɔɔl, nya i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ nya yɛva a tomɔ Yesu Kristi va, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛima mua mu ndewei Timoti,
Ngewɔ nungei nasia gama ti heini Kɔlɔsi laa wai hu, ti yɛngɔ a mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ti langɔ a Kristi, jifa ti wilingɔ hu tia Kristi-ni. Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ i ngauwanda gɛ a wue i wu gɔ a ndiilɛli.
Ma siɛgbualɔ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ngi Kɛkɛ ma watii gbi ma yɛ Ngewɔ vɛlima wu va,
ajifa mu mɛninga kia wu langɔ a Yesu Kristi kɛɛ kia wu longɔ a Ngewɔ nungeisia.

Watii na Ngowili yeetɔnyangɔi, na Ngowili Yekpei le, i foni wu ma haala, yeewatii mia wu hani yekpei na hinda humɛnini wu lii i ma majɔɔva. Faale wu lalei a Kristi kɛɛ wu loyii a Ngewɔmableisia ti gbuani na hu lɔ wu kulɔgbema; tawao yeehanii na lamagbatɛngɔe pandaa ngelegoohu.

Ngowili Yekpei lɔ tuuŋ piema kpekpeya a wa nungaa gama tawao taa lekee vayama dunyei hu gbi, kia lɔɔ i vayanga wu maahu i hiye folei na ma wu Ngewɔ yauwandei hinda humɛni, tawao wu ngi yɛyii yeetɔnyɛi gɔɔni vulii.
Ɛpafras lɔ i ji hinda hugɛni a wue, mu liima yengemɔi na mua tieni mu yengema Kristi wɛ, a mu wooma gbewe gbua.
I ndomɛi na hinda hugɛnga a mue Ngewɔ Yafei i punga wu lii hu.

Sabui ji va lɔ mu Ngewɔ vɛlima tuuŋ wu va i hiye watii na ma mu wu hinda humɛnini. Mua Ngewɔ manɛnɛma aako i ngi liima hindei gɔla yeenɛmahulewe waa ve wu wɛ, kɛɛ nɛmahulewei kɛɛ hinda hugɔɔlei na gbi Ngewɔ Yafei a fe.
Na wiengaa wa gulɔ a luvala kia Ndemɔi longɔ la, watii gbi wa ngi liima hindei wie. Wu luvayii hu, wa kpekpe laasi gbi wielɔ, tawao wu Yewɔ gɔlɛi maa a tolɔ tuuŋ.

Nyaa Ngewɔ vɛlima aako i pie ngi gbaya gabandengɔ wai i pie wu lii i lo wu gu hindei gbi bu. Tawao a siɛgbua a kohunɛ mu Kɛkɛ ma, na i pienga wu gunga a yɛla hanii na ma Ngewɔ i ndamagbatɛnga ngi nungeisia va ngi mahayɛi na hu foofo lekee i na.
I mu gbuanga jumbui lemayɛi yeekpindii hu, i wanga a mue ngi liima Hindoloi mahayɛi hu,
na i mu wumawonga a ji i pienga Ngewɔ i mu jumbuisia lufenga.
Ngewɔ na numu ɛɛ gu a tɔla, ngi gbuayei mia a Kristi na nungaa ti yɛ gu a tɔla. Ta lɔ Kplaloi le, ngi lewengɔ hani gbi ma Ngewɔ i kpatɛni.

Gbamaile Ngewɔ i hanii gbi gbatɛni a ngi loko lɔ, nasia ti ngelegoohu kɛɛ nasia ti dunyei hu, nasia numu a gu a tɔla kɛɛ nasia numu ɛɛ gu a tɔla, kɛɛ ngafangeisia ti lunyɛi kɛɛ ndebleisia tia yeemahangeisia kɛɛ mahubleisia. Ngewɔ i ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunyei gbi gbatɛni a ngi loko lɔ tawao i kpatɛni ngi va lɔ.
Kristi i yɛ na lɔ pɛiŋ Ngewɔ i yaa hani gbi gbatɛ, tawao ngi gbayei lɔ i houni hanii kpɛlɛɛ ma ti yɛmɛisia.
Kristi lɔ sɔsii yeengui le na yɛni a ngi gbuhɛi; ta lɔ ndɛvui a gbua ngi gama. Ta lɔ Kplaloi a ngie Ngewɔ i ngi wuni hee hu aako ta yakpe i yɛ a hindei gbi yeekulɔmɔ.
Gbamaile Ngewɔ vulii lɔ i hugbatɛni yɛ ngi Yewɔyɛi yeehuvɛi yɛyii gbi i yɛ ngi Hindoloi hu.

Faale Ngewɔ Hindoloi sabui hu, ta ngi Ngewɔ i hugbatɛilɔ pieva hanii gbi ngelegoohu kɛɛ dunya ti yama ngi ma. Ngewɔ i wailɔ a ndiilɛli hee va ngi Hindoloi i pieni krɔsii ma, i hanii gbi ti dunyei hu kɛɛ ngelegoohu yama ta yekpe ma.
Watii yila wɔɔ, wu maguhangɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ tawao ngi juwungaa yɛla a wue hinda nyamui nasia va wu yɛ pie ɔɔ wu yɛ gili la.
Kɛɛ kiahuna na, jifa ngi Hindoloi i haani kia nuuvu na, Ngewɔ i wu yamanga na tayekpe ma, aako i pie wu loo ngi gulɔ jumbu wulo bɛɛ ii wu ma.

Kɛɛ mahoungɔ wu yɛ a la tuuŋ a Ngowili Yekpei, wu lo kpaŋ kia pɛlei hitɛ gɔtii i na, wuɛɛ luma gbɛogbɛ aa wu loko gbenda na ma wu lii i loni ma sɔɔva ji wu Ngowili Yekpei mɛnini. Ngowili Yekpei ji lɔ nya nya Pɔɔl ngi woteni a yeengengemɔ Ngowili Yekpei ji numu laasi gboto ti hugɛnga a numu gbi dunyei hu.

Kiahuna nya goohu nɛngɔe kpalɛisia va ti lama nya ma wu va, ajifa kpaalɛi nasia ta la nya gbuhɛi ma tia lɔ ta pie ngi kpaalɛi nasia yeemɔɔnii yakpua i lani Kristi ma Kristimableisia gbi va ngi gbuhɛi a tie.
Tawao Ngewɔ i nya yɛnga a Kristimableisia ti yengemɔ, i yeengengei ji venga nya wɛ pieva wu gbekpeya va. Yeengengei i yɛni a ngi Wowili lelaa lɔ gbalauŋ nungaa ma,
ta lɔ ndɔwuma hindei le i ndɔwunga wɔɔ gba nuuvui kpɛlɛɛ ma kɛɛ i magɛnga na a ngi nungeisia.

Na i Ngewɔ nɛmahu pieva ta mia a ngi lɔwuma hindei hugɛla a ngi nungeisia, ndɔwuma-hinda gabandengɔ wai na i ngi yeya nuuvui yeelasii kpɛlɛɛ va. Tawao yeendɔwuma-hindei lɔ a ji kɛ Kristi lɔ heini wu liisia hu, tawao na a kɛlɔ kɛ wa Ngewɔ wɔlɔyei wu ndɛi majɔɔlɔ.
Famia ma Kristi hinda hugɛ a numu gbi. Nɛmahulewei na gbi lekee i mu wɛ, ma ngayengelɔ ti laahiva kɛɛ ti gaava aako mu pie yeengila gbi i lo Ngewɔ gulɔ kia nuuvu laavengɔ, tia Kristi ti wilingɔ hu.
Aako ji i wie, nga mɔnɛlɔ, nga lapi a Kristi gbayawai na gbi i yengema nya hu.
Gbɛɛ ngi mɔnɛ wai na hugɛ a wue ngi pienga wu va kɛɛ Laodisia lawai hubleisia va kɛɛ nungaa wekei nasia gbi tii yaa nya lɔni taa nya gɔɔ.
Nyaa ji wiema kɔɔ ti liisia ti yɛ kpaukpau tawao ti lalagblanga ndoma hu aako ti hinda hugɔɔla gbatɛ lavengɔi majɔɔ. Ji wiengaa, ta gulɔ a Ngewɔ hinda hulɔwungɔi gɔla, na i yɛni a Kristi vulii.
Ta lɔ Ngewɔ nɛmahulewei kɛɛ ngi hinda-hugɔlei lɔwungɔ ngi hu.
Faale, gbɛɛ ngi ji le wu ma aako numu gbi aa wu wɛlɛ a ndɛɛ yɛpɛngaa, yeenjɛpɛisia ti gbua bɛɛ kaka a njɛpɛ yekpengaa.
Ajifa kia bɛɛ nya gbuhɛi ii wu lia, na hu gbi nyalii lɔ wu gama, tawao nya goohu nɛngɔe ji ngi tɔma wu wilingɔ hu tawao wuɛɛ wotewote wu lalei hu a Kristi.
Kia na wu kɔɔnga tao wu lumanga kɛ Yesu Kristi lɔ wu Lemɔi le, wua tieni wu wilingɔ hu i yɛla.

Wa gulɔ a ji wiela a ji wa pie Kristi i hei wu liisia hu kia wu langɔ a ngie, tawao wu wu lɛɛvuisia loo ngi ma, wu lalei a ngie maa a yɛ a to, kia ti wu gaani la pieva. Tawao siɛgboto gbuala Ngewɔ ma aa baa wu la.

A wu mahugbe hɔɔ, kɔɔ numu gbi aa wu yama gbɔma nduwɔya hu a nuuvu nɛmahulewei na ta nungaa yaka la gbama, na a gbua kaai nasia hu ndebleisia ta ndo a ti leengeisia kɛɛ dunyei yeengafangeisia, kɛɛ ii gbuani Kristi gama.
Na gbi i Ngewɔ hu taa Kristi hu, watii bɛɛ i yɛ nuuvuya hu,
tawao Ngewɔ i ndɛvui yeekpekpei vulii venga wu wɛ ji wua Yesu-ni wu wilingɔ hu, tawao Yesu leweni ngafangaa ti mahangeisia ma kɛɛ ti mahublɛisia.
Ji wua Kristi-ni wu wilini hu, wu woteilɔ a biliblaa, bili na ii le nuuvungaa ta hei, bilii na le Kristi a hei, na i yɛni a mu gbualalɔ jumbu gbayei yeya.
Ajifa watii na ti wu wuani, ti wu gbɔwuilɔ kia ti Kristi gbɔwuni la, tawao watii ti yɛ wu wuama i wieilɔ bɛɛ wu lalei a Ngewɔ gbaya wai na i Kristi wuni la hee hu i wua bɛɛ wumbunga hee hu.

Watii yila ma wɔɔ wu wielɔ kia haablaa Ngewɔ yaama wu jumbuisia wooma ajifa Juublaa yaa a wue tawao jifa Mojisi Jawei ii wu yeya. Kɛɛ Ngewɔ i wu wunga na hee hu kia i Kristi wuni hee hu. Ngewɔ i manuilɔ mu ma mu jumbui kpɛlɛɛ va;
i kɔlɛi na hunyaniilɔ mu wienyamuisia ti nyɛingɔ hu, kɛɛ Sawei nasia kpɛngɔ ma, i gbe gbua feu yeekɔlɛi hinda hu i kpakpa krɔsii ma.
Ji Kristi i yɛ krɔsii ma, i ta yekpe gbuɛilɔ ngafangeisia ti mahangeisia kɛɛ ti mahublɛisia ti gbayei bu, i pie numui gbi ti ti lɔ ta to ngi ma kia kɔ-houngaa temaya vahɛi na hu ti yɛ tooni ngi ma.
Faale, numu gbi aa sawangaa la wu yeya kɔlooni na wa mɛ ɔɔ wa kpɔli, ɔɔ Kayema voleisia va ɔɔ Ngalu Ninɛi yeekomɛisia ɔɔ Ndɛvu Volei ndɛisia.
Hindei jisia nyɔkɔ kpɛlɛɛ ti yɛni a kulɔma hindeisia yeenɛnɛi lɔ; yeetɔnyɛi a Kristi lɔ.

Waa luma numu gbi aa pie wu baa a wu mawaa jifa a nde yɛ i leweni nungaa wekeisia ma jifa malikangaa ti gɛnga wɔɔ a ngie, a nɔɔ nungaa tia yekpe mayeiva a ndɛɛ kɛɛ hɛɛva malikeisia ma. Yeenumui ji bonda ngi giliyii a pielɔ ngi yaama i lɛ gbama,
