Gbamaile Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ, “Ba yɛlɔ a Saagbuamɔ kunafɔ va kia Mɛlkijidɛki i yɛ na.”
Faale sawa wovei i haanga na ajifa ii guni a yengela tawao kpekpeya gbi ii hu.

Gbamaile Sawei na Ngewɔ feni Mojisi wɛ kɛva a nungaa ii guni a piela hani gbi aa gbekpe kia mahoungɔ yɛla i gbekpe. Kɛɛ kiahuna na mu lii lɔ hani na ma kpekpengɔ tewengɔ na ma mu lii i yɛ wɔɔ ma, tawao a pielɔ mu lukpe Ngewɔ gbla.
I baa na ma, Lahei na bɛɛ lɔ na Ngewɔ i mbumbuni. Ngewɔ ii Lahei na nyikɔ wumbuni watii na nungaa wekeisia ti woteni a saagbuablaa.
Kɛɛ ji Yesu i woteni a saagbuamɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuilɔ yɛ ngi ma, “Ndemɔi i Lahei kpaukpau wumbunga tawao ɛɛ yaa ngayama, yɛ, ‘Ba yɛlɔ a Saagbuamɔ kunafɔ va.’ ”
Jifa Ngewɔ i Lahei kpaukpau wumbuni watii na i Yesu woteni a Saagbuamɔ, ta lɔ i Yesu yɛni gbɔma a taanimɔ kɛ hinda yangilingɔ ninɛi i gbekpeni yeengovei ma.
Nduahugɛ weka lɔ na: saagbuablaa wekei nasia ti gbotongɔ yɛla ajifa ti yɛlɔ a haa ti loko a gbenda ti yengei ma.
Kɛɛ Yesu vulungɔe kunafɔ va tawao ngi jaagbua yengei ɛɛ lewe numu weka gama.
Famia kiahuna, kɛɛ kpele gbi ngi gungɔ a nungei nasia bawola ta wa Ngewɔ gama a ngi sabui hu we, ajifa ngi vulungɔe kunafɔ va ti manɛnɛ wuava Ngewɔ gama.

Faale Yesu lɔ Saagbuablɛisia ti gulɔmɔ wai na le, a na gbi wie mu wɛ ma gbewe fa. Ngi gayemangɔ waa le; nyamu ii ngi hu tawao jumbu ii ngi ma; Ngewɔ i ngi gbuanga jumbubleisia ma i ngi lɛnga ngelegoohu.

Ii wieni kia Saagbuabla wekeisia ti na; saa gbuala ii ngi ma folo gbi, ta yese ngi nda jumbuisia va kɛɛ na nungeisia ti ndɛisia. I saa yakpe lɔ gbuani heima yakpe kunafɔ va, ji i ta yekpe veni Ngewɔ wɛ a saahanii.

Nungaa ti woteilɔ a saagbuablaa kia bɛɛ tii yɛ a na wie mahoungɔ yɛla ti pie, kɛɛ Lahei kpaukpau na Ngewɔ i mbumbuni Sawei na wooma i feni Mojisi wɛ ta lɔ a pie Ngewɔ Hindoloi na a gu kunafɔ a hinda gbi wiela mahoungɔ i pie.
Njɛpɛi kpɛlɛɛ mu ndema yeengui lɔ a ji: Saagbuablɛisia ti gulɔmɔ waa bondɛi na lɔ mu yeya, na i heini Ngewɔ maha-heimɛi yeengejahui mia ngelegoohu.
Saagbuamɔ waa lɔ a ngie a yenge Ngewɔ wɛ yeehindei na saagbuamɔi a saa gbua na Ngewɔ ma, tamia kula-wɛlei yeekpekpei na le Ndemɔi Ngewɔ i toni, nuuvu ii le aa to.
Ngewɔ lɔ a Saagbuablɛisia ti gulɔmɔ wai gbi gɛ wava a saahaniisia kɛɛ saa-lohaniisia Ngewɔ gama, faale mahoungɔ yɛla hani i yɛ mu Jaagbuamɔ Wai Yesu yeya feva Ngewɔ wɛ.
Ina taa dunyei hu, ii yɛ yɛ a Saagbuamɔ kulo bɛɛ, ajifa Saagbuablaa lɔ na ta li a saahani nasia Ngewɔ gaama kia Juubleisia ti Jawei i kɛni.

Saagbuamɔ yengei na ta pie i yɛni lekee a na lɔ i wiema ngelegoohu yeekpuayei ɔɔ yeenɛnɛ. Hii wɔɔ i Mojisi wieni. Ji i ngi magbatɛni kula-wɛlei na lova Ngewɔ Hinda Yangilingɔi a yɛ mbu, Ngewɔ ndeilɔ ngi ma yɛ, “Tɔ vulii bi yeekula-wɛlei gbatɛ kia na i yɛ na ngi kɛni a bie ngiyei wumba.”

Kɛɛ kiahuna na, Ngewɔ i saagbuamɔ yengei venga Yesu wɛ tewengɔ ti ndɛi ma, kia lɔ hindei na i ngangilini taa ngi nungeisia kpekpengɔ yeengovei ma, ajifa i gbuani Lahei nasia hu lɔɔ i mbumbuni yɛ nungaa ta kpekpeyangaa majɔɔlɔ tewengɔ yeengovei ma.
Ina hinda yangilingɔi yeehaalayei i guilɔ a ngi yengei wiela, hinda yangilingɔ yeefelei yeemani ii yɛ yɛ na.
Kɛɛ Ngewɔ i hinda lɔilɔ kpulangɔnga yeehaalayei hu ji i ndeni yɛ, “Watii lɔ hitima, Ndemɔi yɛ, ji nga hinda nina yangilingɔi hugbatɛ a Isrɛlbleisia kɛɛ na Judableisia.

Ɛɛ wie kia hinda yangilingɔi na ngi hugbatɛni a ti maadani folei na ma ngi houni ti lokoi ma ngi ti gbua Ijipt lɔlei hu. Tii na wieni hinda yangilingɔi yɛ ta pie, famia ngii woloni kulo bɛ ti ma, himia Ndemɔi ndeni.

Kiahuna, ji mia hinda yangilingɔi le nga hugbatɛ a Isrɛlbleisia Watii na ma wama, himia Ndemɔi ndeni: Nga nya Jaweisia wulɔ kpaŋ ti nɛmahu, tawao nga nyɛilɔ ti liisia hu. Nga yɛlɔ a ti Yewɔi, tawao ta yɛlɔ a nya nungeisia.
Ɛɛ yɛ a kpaa gbi numu ma. ngi mba taali gaava, ɔɔ ndeva ngi mba kɛnyɛmɔi ma, yɛ ‘Ndemɔi gɔɔ!’ Ajifa ti kpɛlɛɛ ta nya gɔɔlɔ, i hiye yeekuloi ma i too yeembawai ma.
Nga manulɔ ti jumbuisia ma, tawao ngɛɛ yaa gbɔma gili a ti wiehinda nyamuisia.”
Ji Ngewɔ i yɛpɛni kɔlooni hinda yangilingɔ nina ma, i pienga yeehaalayei i wovanga; tawao hani gbi lekee i wovanga, i hawa, a lolɔhu hugutungɔ.
Sawangaa ti yɛlɔ hinda yangilingɔi yeehaalayei hu kɔloongɔ Ngewɔ vɛlile ma kɛɛ gbɔma yee-Ngewɔ vɛli mi dunyei hu na nungaa ti kpatɛni.
Ti kula-wɛlei loilɔ, yeelomui yeehaalayei i na numu gbi a wuaa na, ta toli a Lomu Magayemangɔi. Na mia lambo-lomɛi i yɛ na, kɛɛ tebii, kɛɛ bledii na ta kpua a saa Ngewɔ ma i wuni yeetebii ma.
Bi lewengaa wɔɔ kula hɛlɛngɔi yeefelei ma, kɛ bi fonga lomui na hu ta toli a Lomu Magayemangɔ Wai.

Namia wɔɔ saagbuamɛi na i yɛ na, kpatɛngɔ a kanigbɔlui, ta siminjii mɔ na kɛɛ Hinda Yangilingɔi Yeekaŋaa, kanigbɔlui jiangɔ ma gbi, kanigbɔlu bolei na “mana” i yɛ hu i yeekaŋaa hu kɛɛ Eerɔn likpɔi na wɔɔ i yɛ vale a ndawa gbua kɛɛ kɔtu waala felei nasia wɔɔ saweisia ti nyɛingɔ yɛla ma.

Fuuhanisia ti yɛlɔ yeekaŋaa mahu kpakiisia ti ti ma, na a kɛ kɛ Ngewɔ hei na lɔ, ti gbakisia vombongɔ hindei na maahu Ngewɔ a manu na jumbuisia ma. Kɛɛ kiahuna ii le hindei gbi hu aa yɛ gɛma a njɛpɛ gboto.
Hii mia hindei nasia ti hugbatɛngɔ yɛla. Saagbuablɛisia ta wuaalɔ lomui yeehaalayei hu folo gbi ti yengeisia wieva;

kɛ Saagbuablɛisia ti gulɔmɔ wai yakpe lɔ a wuaa lomui yeekohuyei hu, tawao a ji wie heima yakpe foo ma. A wuaalɔ wɔɔ na a tohani na ti kpuanga a saa lomui yeehaalayei hu, i kpua a saa Ngewɔ ma ta vulii va kɛɛ jumbui nasia nungeisia ta pie, na tɛɛ kɔɔ kɛ jumbu mia ti piema.
Ngewɔ Yafei lɔ nungeisia gaama gbalauŋ a hugbatɛi jisia kpɛlɛɛ hu wee kɛ Lomui Yeemagayemangɔ Wai yeepelei ii yaa lawoni lɛ ina lekee lomu yeehaalayei lɔ lɛ looni.

Ji kpɛlɛɛ i yɛni a hindei nasia ti wiema kiahuna yeetɔmaseli lɔ. Yeembui lɔ a ji kɛ saahaniisia kɛɛ tohani nasia nungaa ta kpua a saa ta fe Ngewɔ wɛ tɛɛ gu a piela yeenungeisia ti lii aa gbe a mɔnɛla jumbui nasia va ta pie,

ajifa saahanii nasia ta fe Ngewɔ wɛ ta sawei nasia lekee lɔ gɛ kɔlooni gbɔɔ mahoungɔ ɔɔ maa ii houni numu i mɛ ɔɔ i kpɔle kɛɛ nguɛi nasia ta ti wua la jumbuisia gbuava ti ma. Sawei jisia kpɛlɛɛ ti gbitingɔ ii le numu lii ma tawao ta yɛlɔ lekee na i to watii na ma Ngewɔ a hindei gbi hugbatɛ a nina.

Kɛɛ Kristi i yɛnga a Saagbuablɛisia ti gulɔmɔ wai na hinda yekpei nasia ti welanga a lɛla mu ma mbei ta gbua ngi gaama. Hindei na a saa gbua na mu jumbuisia va, baagɔma lɔ na ma tawao ngi yɛyii i gbekpeni i lewe dunyayei ma; nuuvu gula-wɛlɛ gbatɛngɔ ii le, ii yɛni a hani na i mbei Ngewɔ i tia dunyei gbatɛni.

Ji Kristi i wuaani Saagbuamɛi na i ngelegoohu, i wuaa Lomu Magayemangɔ Wai hu yakpe kunafɔ va, ii lini a njengaa kɛɛ nika-hinangaa ti ŋama gbuava a saa; i ta yekpe ngi ŋamɛi lɔ veni i pie mu wote a mahaleengaa kunafɔ va.

Saagbuablɛisia ta njengɛisia kɛɛ nika hinangɛisia ti ŋamɛi lɔ wumbu kɛɛ nika lɔgbɛ gewengɔi yeenduvui ti falifali nungei nasia ma ti nɔhɔngɔ hɛɛva Ngewɔ Wɛlei bu tawao ji a pielɔ ti yɛ sɛwɛ i yeemanɔhɔi na gbua ti ma.

Ina tohaningaa ti ŋama a gulɔ i nungaa yɛ sɛwɛ, kpayei na i Yesu ŋamɛi hu mu liisia yɛva sɛwɛ i leweni polouŋ na ma. Ngewɔ Yafei na i na kunafɔ va ngi sabui hu, Kristi i ta yekpe veilɔ Ngewɔ wɛ a saahani na mbɛ gbi ii ma ji i haani krɔsii ma. Hee na Kristi i pieni ji i ta yekpe gbuani a saa, a manɔhɔ mɔni na wualɔ i loni mu ma ji mu yɛ saa gbamɛi nasia gbua tɛɛ gu a gbɛogbɛ wiela, aako mu na wie Ngewɔ vulungɔi longɔ mu pie.

Sabui na va lɔ Kristi i hinda yangilingɔ nina hugbatɛma aako nungei nasia Ngewɔ i ti lolinga yɛva a ngi woo ti lubɛi na majɔɔ kunafɔ va i yɛ Lahei wumbuni fa. Ji a gulɔ a wiela ajifa Kristi i haailɔ tawao yeehei ji lɔ a nungaa wumawo jumbui nasia hu ti pieni ji hinda yangilingɔi yeehaalayei i yɛ hu.
Ji numu a ngi woohani gɔlɛkɔlɛyii wu kɔlɔ ma, numu ba kɛ pɛiŋ kɛ yeekɔlɛi na gbatɛmɔi i haanga,
ajifa numu gbi ɛɛ gu aa yeekɔlɛi na yayenge ina lekee yeekpatɛmɔi lɔ heini; numu a gulɔ lekee a ngayengela, yeekpatɛmɔi haangɔi wooma.
Na vamia kpaya gbi ii yɛ hinda yangilingɔi yeehaalayei vulii bɛɛ hu kɛlee ji nungaa ti yɛ tohanisia ti ŋamɛi gbua a saa Ngewɔ ma.

Haala hindei Mojisi i pieni tamia a ji sawa ngilangilɛi kpɛlɛɛ Ngewɔ longɔ nungaa ti hou i hugɛni gbalauŋ a nungaa gbi kia nyɛingɔ la Sawa-gɔlɛi hu. Na wooma i nika-lɔgbɛisia kɛɛ njengɛisia ti ŋamɛi wumbuilɔ, i ngahupu a njɛi, i falifali Sawa-gɔlɛi ma kɛɛ nungaa kpɛlɛɛ ma a hisɔp wulii yeembekeisia, ngilingɔ a mbaala-yombo gbɔugbɔi.
Kɛ i ndenga yɛ, “Ŋamɛi ji lɔ i kpaya wuaanga hinda yangilingɔi na hu Ngewɔ i ndea yɛ waa nganyani.”
Hii lɔ Mojisi i ŋamɛi valifalini Lomu Magayemangɔ Wai bu gbi kɛɛ hani gbi i yengeni la saagbuamɛi.
A tɔnya, kia ndengɔ la Sawa-gɔlɛi hu, ŋama wula lɔ a hani gbi yɛ sɛwɛ tawao Ngewɔ a manulɔ lekee jumbui ma ji ta tohani waa ti yeeŋamɛi gbua a saa.
Hinde jisia ti yeenasia vuii lɔ wokɔɔma ti ngelegoohu. Faale mahoungɔ yɛla ti yɛ sɛwɛsɛwɛ kia lekee ngi ndeni la. Kɛɛ ngelegoohu haakeisia vulii mahoungɔ saa yekpe gbuava ti va.
Ajifa Kristi ii wuaani Lomu Magayemangɔ hu nuuvu i kpatɛni, na kpuangɔ vulii a yeekpekpei. I lini ngelegoohu vulii lɔ, tawao taa naa na a mu jɔngɔ Ngewɔ gulɔ.
Juubleisia ti Jaabuablɛisia ti gulɔmɔ wai a wuaalɔ Lomu Magayemangɔi Wai hu foo gbi a hua ŋamɛi i haaka hu. Kɛɛ Kristi ta ii wuaani na ta yekpe gbuava a saa Ngewɔ ma heima gboto va,

ajifa aa na wie, a yɛlɔ a mɔnɛ heima gboto va i hiye lekee wɔɔ dunyei gbatɛ-gbelei ma. Kia na aa wie, kia na hindei kpɛlɛɛ ti gbɔyɔ-gbelei i lukpenga kpla, i wanga heima yakpe kunafɔ va aako i pie manuma i jɔɔ nungaa ti jumbuisia va a ji i ta yekpe veni ti ngi waa kia saahanii.
Numu gbi a haalɔ huɛɛŋ heima yila, na wooma Ngewɔ i ngi gbɛmbo.
Hii lɔɔ Kristi i ta yekpe gbuani a saa heima yakpe numu gboto waa ti jumbuisia gbuava ti ma. A walɔ gbɔma kɛɛ jumbu gbuava ii le hu, kɛɛ kɔɔ i nasia ti bawo ti ngi gulɔgbema.

Juubleisia ti jawei ii gbuani waa vuli a hinda yekpei nasia ti wama wama; ti yɛni lekee a yeenɛnɛ magbindingɔ lɔ. Saa nasia saweisia ti kɛni, Saagbuablɛisia lɔ kunafɔ ti gbuama foo gbi. Sawei nasia ta saasia gbuayii hugɛ, ta yee gu ti jumbui gbua nungei nasia ma ta wa Ngewɔ gaama?
Ina nungei nasia ta hɛɛ Ngewɔ ma ti jumbuisia gbuangɔi vulii ti ma, ti lii i yɛ yaa mɔnɛ jumbui nasia va ti pienga tawao saa gbualei aa gɛlɛlɔ.
Kia hindei yɛyii i na kiahuna, saasia lɔ ta nungaa ti jumbuisia hitɛ ti nɛmahu foo gbi.
Ajifa nika-hinangaa ti ŋama kɛɛ njengaa ti ŋama ɛɛ gu fɔ a jumbu gbuala numu ma.
Na vamia ji Kristi i yɛ wama dunyei hu, i ndeilɔ Ngewɔ ma yɛ, “Bii gbeweni saa gbuala va kɛɛ saahaningaa kɛɛ bi nya gbuhɛi gbatɛnga.
Tohani nasia ta ti gbuhɛi mɔ saagbuamɛi ɛɛ bi lii lɛli ɔɔ saasia jumbuisia wuava nungaa ma.
Kɛ ngi ndenga ngɛɛ, ‘Nya gbe bi liimɛi wieva, Oo Ngewɔ, kia lɔɔ nyɛingɔ la sawa gɔlɛi hu kɔloongɔ nya ma.’ ”

Haalɛi hu i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Bii gbeweni tawao bi goohu ɛɛ nɛɛ saa gbuangɔngaa va ɔɔ saahaningaa ɔɔ tohani nasia ta mɔ saagbuamɛi kɛɛ saasia jumbuisia wuava nungaa ma.” I ji leilɔ kia bɛɛ ta saa jisia kpɛlɛɛ gbua a pelei na lɔ Sawei kɛni.
Na wooma kɛ i ndenga yɛ, “Nya gbe, Oo Ngewɔ, bi liimɛi wieva.” Faale Ngewɔ lɔ ndema yɛ kpaya gbi ii yaa sawa woveisia kpɛlɛɛ hu, i Kristi jaa gbuangɔi wunga yeepomɛi.
Ajifa Yesu Kristi i na wieni Ngewɔ longɔ i pie, saa yakpei na i kpuani kunafɔ va a ngi gbuhɛi vulii i pienga jumbui i wuanga gbɛlɛŋ mu ma.
Juu Jaagbuamɔ gbi a ngi yengei wielɔ folo gbi tawao a saa laasi yilei gbualɔ wɔɔ heima gboto; kɛɛ yeesaa jisia tɛɛ gu kunafɔ taa jumbu gbua numu ma.
Na hu gbi Kristi i saa yakpe lɔ gbuani jumbuisia va, tawao yeesaa na laahoungɔe kunafɔ va, na wooma i heiilɔ Ngewɔ yejahui.
Taa na mawuloma na haaŋ Ngewɔ i ngi juwuisia wuaa ngi gɔwɔbu i gɔwɔ lo ti ma.
Saa yakpei Kristi i ta yekpe gbuani la i jumbui gbuanga kunafɔ nasia ma Ngewɔ i ti yɛnga a ngi woo.
Tawao Ngewɔ Yafei bɛɛ i seli wuanga mu gama. Haalɛi hu i ndeilɔ yɛ,
“Ji lɔ hinda le mua tieni ma ngangili kulɔmɛi, hii Ndemɔi i ndenga yɛ: Nga nya jaweisia wulɔ kpaŋ ti liisia hu ngi ti nyɛi ti nɛmahuisia.”
Kɛ i ndenga yɛ, “Ti jumbuisia kɛɛ ti hinda nyamuisia tɛɛ yaa hitɛ nya wɛ kunafɔ.”
Faale Ngewɔ i manunga ti jumbuisia ma kɛɛ ti hinda nyamuisia, sabu gbi ɛɛ yɛ na saa gbuava jumbungaa gbuava nungaa ma.
Faale, nya Kristimableisia, hei na Yesu i pieni i mu liigbanga wuava, Lomu Magayemangɔ Wai na hu Ngewɔ i yɛ wɔɔ na.
Kristi i ngi gbuhɛi gbuailɔ a saa aako i pele nina la nungaa ta ndɛvu nina majɔɔ la. Ngi gbuhɛi wiengɔe kia kula kpɔtukpɔtui na i yɛ na i yɛ hɛlɛni Ngewɔ Wɛlei bu a Ngewɔ yɛmɛi maalɔɔwu.
Saagbuamɔ waa lɔ mu yeya ngelegoohu wɛlei bu mia Ngewɔ gama.
Faale a mu lukpe Ngewɔ gbla a mu lii gbi mu liilo ngi ma, mu wa ngi gaama a ndii nasia Kristi i nguanga fo a njaa sɛwɛsɛwɛ.
Faale a mu lo kpaŋ, maa gbe kulo bɛɛ hani nasia ma Ngewɔ a fe mu wɛ, gbamaile ma gulɔ a liilola Ngewɔ ma jifa hinda gbi i Lahei wumbungaa pieva a pielɔ huɛɛŋ.
A mu gbewe mu nyɔunyɔu va, mu gbɔ mu nyɔunyɔu ma ndoma gɛva kɛɛ hinda yekpe wieva.
Maa gbe a yandɔla a lenga hinda yila, kia nungaa lɛɛngaa ti piema la. Kia maa na wie, a mu mu nyɔunyɔu lii gba i lewe yeengovei ma, jifa wuaa tɔma Ndemɔi wa-volei lukpenga kpla.
Saa gbi ii yaa na aa jumbu gbua numu ma ina mu liilɔ lekee a jumbu wie a kɛwɛ tɔnyɛi gɛngɔi wooma a mue.
Kia maa na wie, na lekee mahoungɔ mu pie ta lɔ a Kpɛmbo-Volo maluwangɔ wai mawulola nduwa hu, kɛɛ ngɔmbu yagbalɛngɔ wai na a nungei nasia gbi gewe ti gangangɔ a Ngewɔ.
Numu gbi lekee a sawei nasia nyani a kɛwɛ Ngewɔ i feni a Mojisi loko, seli fele ɔɔ sawa tɛɛ ti ngi lɔilɔ i pie, Kotii mahublɛisia ta pielɔ ti ngi waa, tɛɛ manu gbi ngi ma.

Gbɔɔ hɔɔ a numui na ii Ngewɔ Hindoloi lɔni a gbɛogbɛ? Yemia a numui na a Kristi haalɛi wumbu a baabaa-hinda, Kristi haalɛi na i pieni Ngewɔ i hinda nina yangili, i yama i yeenumui na vulii gbua jumbui yeenjiɛi hu, numui na a njia nyamu le ngauwanda Yafei ma? A gili lɛɛ a kpaalɛi ya wɔlɔyii i piema Ngewɔ a nda ngi ma!
Ajifa mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ vulii lɔ i ndeni yɛ, “Gbema nya wɛ hunyɔu va, nga kpɛi gbualɔ;” tawao mu gbɔma kɔɔlɔ ye lɔ i ndeni yɛ, “Nga nya nungeisia gbɛmbolɔ.”
Hinda maaluwangɔ waa le wuava Ngewɔ vulungɔi gbɛmboi bu.
A gili lɛɛ a na wɔɔ i yɛ wu wie ngovama. Watii na, ji wu lani a Ngowili Yekpei a nina, hinda yagbalɛngɔ gboto i lailɔ wu ma, kɛɛ na hu gbi wu yeendapii na gɔilɔ wuii gbahani.
Watii lɛɛngaa nungaa ti yɛlɔ a njia nyamungaa le wu ma faha hu, ta kpaalɛ la wu ma tawao watii lɛɛngaa wu yɛlɔ a gbɛɛ nasia ma a wu nyɛkɛ nungaa ti yɛ njia nyamungaa le ti ma, ta kpaalɛ la ti ma.

Wu yɛlɔ a gbɛɛ yeenasia ma ti yɛ kpindi-wɛlei bu kpaalɛɛngaa ta la wua tieni ma, tawao watii na ti wu yeya- hanisia kpɛlɛɛ houni wu yeya a kpaya, yeembɔnɛi na i guilɔ wu hu tawao ii wu goohunɛɛi nyanini, ajifa wu yɛ kɔɔlɔ kɛ hani lɔ lɛ wu yeya kpekpengɔ na kpɛlɛɛ ma, tawao a lo wu yeya kunafɔ.
Faale yeehinda gbangɔi jisia taa pie waa gbaha ajifa ndiiloi a walɔ a mawaa wa.
Mahoungɔ wu mawulo a ndiilo, aako wu Ngewɔ liima hindei wie, wu mawaa na majɔɔ i Lahei wumbuni feva wu wɛ.
Gbamaile Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi lɔ ndema yɛ, “I longa kulo te, numui na i wama a walɔ, ɛɛ lɛmbi hu;
Na hu gbi, nya nungaa wɔnangɔisia ta bawo lanaya wooma lɔ; kɛɛ ti yilayee gbi i yamangaa a wooma wee, ngi hinda ɛɛ nɛɛ nya wɛ.”
Kɛɛ muii yɛni a nungei nasia ta yama a wooma wee tawao ta jukulu. Mua mu langɔe a Ngewɔ tawao mu bawongɔe.
Lanaya mia a lala la kɛ hani nasia mu lii i ti ma tiaa na, kɛɛ lala vulii kɛ hanii nasia muɛɛ ti lɔ tiaa na.
Jifa wɔwɔmablɛisia ti lani a Ngewɔ famia ti hinda i nɛni ngi wɛ.
Jifa mu langɔ a Ngewɔ famia mu kɔɔnga gbalauŋ kɛ Ngewɔ laayiɛi lɔ i dunya wai ji gbatɛni la, aako na ma gu a tɔla i gbuani na hu lɔ numu ɛɛ gu a tɔla.

Ebɛl lava lɔ a Ngewɔ i saa gbuani Ngewɔ ma kpekpengɔ tewengɔ Ken ndɛi ma. Ngi lava a Ngewɔ, ngi hinda i nɛilɔ Ngewɔ wɛ i ngi wumbu a pɔɔnamɔ a ji i ngi jaa-hanisia guluni. Tawao Ebɛl lava a Ngewɔ, a yɛpɛlɔ tuuŋ mu gama kia bɛɛ ii ndɛvu hu.

Jifa Inɔk langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia ii haani. Kia aa haa, Ngewɔ i ngi wumbuilɔ i lɛ a ngie, tawao numu gbi ii guni a ngi lɔla, ajifa Ngewɔ i lɛnga a ngie. Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yɛ pɛiŋ Ngewɔ i yaa lɛ a Inɔk ngelegoohu, i pieilɔ ngi hinda i nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ.
Numu gbi lekee ii lani a Ngewɔ ɛɛ gu aa ngi liima hinda wie, ajifa numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ i hɛɛ Ngewɔ ma, mahoungɔ i la la vulii kɛ Ngewɔ lɔ na tawao a kpekpe wielɔ a nungei nasia ta wa ngi gama.

Jifa Noa langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i woloni ndahii na ma Ngewɔ feni ngi wɛ kɔlooni kulɔma hindei nasia ma ii yɛ gu a tɔla. I goloilɔ Ngewɔ laayiɛi bu, i nja-ya-lɛndɛ yila gbatɛ, taa ngi nyahɛi kɛɛ ti leengeisia ti bawo hu. Noa wiehindei ji i kɛilɔ kɛ dunyableisia ti nyamungɔe, tawao Ngewɔ i ndeilɔ yɛ pɔɔnamɔ lɔ a Noa jifa ngi langɔ a Ngewɔ.

Jifa Ebraham langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, i goloilɔ Ngewɔ laayiɛi bu ji Ngewɔ i ndeni ngi ma yɛ i gbua ngi nda lɔlei hu i li ndɔlɔ weka hu i yɛ Lahei wumbuni feva ngi wɛ. Kia bɛɛ ii yɛ mia gɔɔ i lima na, i gbuailɔ ngi nda lɔlei hu, i li.

Jifa ngi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, i heilɔ kia hota ndɔlei na hu Ngewɔ i yɛ Lahei wumbuni feva ngi wɛ. Taa ngi mablɛisia ti yɛ yii kula-wɛleisia bu lɔ, kia ngi loi Aisaki taa ngi nda loi Jekɔpi ti pieni, jifa Ngewɔ i yeelahei yakpei na wumbuilɔ tia bɛɛ gaama.
Gbamaile Ebraham lii i yɛlɔ ma heiva tɛi na hu Ngewɔ i humanga i tonga, tɛi na a yɛ na kunafɔ ɛɛ wolo.
Jifa Ebraham langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i guni a ndo lela kia bɛɛ ngi wovangɔ waa yɛla tawao Sera bɛɛ ngi lewengɔ ndole gbelei ma. I yɛ kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ Lahei wumbungɔi hu ɛɛ nyani.
Kia bɛɛ Ebraham haangɔ jɔngɔ yɛla, na hu gbi ndeengaa ti gbuailɔ ngi hu ti gbotongɔ kia tumbekeisia na ti ngelei ma, ti vahangɔ kia ŋanya gate ngilangilɛi nasia na ti ŋanyakpaa ma.
Nungɛi jisia gbi ti loni lamaa a Ngewɔ ti haa. Tii hani nasia majɔɔni Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni fa, kɛɛ ti loilɔ kuhama ti tɔ ti goohunɛɛ ma, ta hugɛ a nungaa foofo hu kɛ hotangaa lɔ a tie dunyei ji hu.
Nasia ta njɛpɛ bondɛi nasia le tiaa ndama leiŋ kɛ ti nda lɔlei mia ti kɔkɔlima.
Tii lɛmbini gilima a ti lɔlei na ti gbuani hu; ina ti lɔlei yeemani i ti lɔilɔ, gbɛogbɛ ii yɛ aa ti huhou yamava na.
Kɛɛ tɔnyɛi a ji lɔ kɛ ndɔlei na kpekpengɔ na mia yeemani i ti ma, ndɔɔlɔ weka gbi ii le kɛlee ngelegoohu. Faale na ii wufeni Ngewɔ wɛ ji ta ngi loli a ti Yewɔɛi, jifa i taa waa loonga ti wɛ.

Jifa Ebraham langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i yɛ ngi hindoloi gbuama a saa, ji Ngewɔ i ngi hugɔɔni. Ebraham lɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni ngi gama, na hu gbi ngi magbatɛngɔ yɛla ngi hindolo yakpei Aisaki gbuava a saa.
Ngewɔ i yɛ ndeilɔ ngi ma yɛ, “Bi bɔɔsɔ vaha wai nasia ngi yeelahei wumbuni bi gaama, ba ti majɔɔ a Aisaki lɔ.”
Ebraham i kɔɛilɔ nɛmahu kɛ Ngewɔ a gulɔ i Aisaki vulu i ngi wumbu hee hu tawao Ngewɔ i pieilɔ Aisaki i yama ngi ma bi tɔaa bɛɛ i gbuanga hee hu lɔ.
Jifa Aisaki langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i Lahei wumbuni yɛ a ngi leengeisia luba lɔ, Jekɔpi kɛɛ Isɔ.
Jifa Jekɔpi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i Josɛfi leengeisia lubani a ngilangila ji ngi haalɛi i loni te. Ngi valangɔ yɛla ngi likpɔi ma i hɛɛni Ngewɔ ma.
Jifa Josɛfi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia ji ngi haa-gbelei i loni te, i yɛpɛilɔ kɔlooni Isrɛelblɛisia ti gbualei ma Ijipt, i yama i hugɛ a nungeisia gbɔɔ mahoungɔ ti pie a ngi womɛi.
Jifa Mojisi leblɛisia ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia ti ngi lɔwuilɔ ngawu sawa va ngi lengɔi wooma. Ti tɔilɔ kɛ ndoi nyandengɔ waa le famia tii luwani a mahɛi jawei nyanila.
Jifa Mojisi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia kia i lakpani, ii yɛ luma numu aa ngi loli a mahɛi nyahaloi goohu hindoloi.
Ji wɔɔ a gbɛɛ Ngewɔ nungeisia ma kɔɔ kpaalɛ i la taa tieni ma, manɛngɔ yɛla ngi wɛ i lewe ji a goohunɛɛ jumbu ma watii hugutungɔ va.
I tɔilɔ kɛ ji mbɛnyani a numu maale Kristi va, nafa i hu i lewe polouŋ kpatɛi kpɛlɛɛ ma i Ijipt lɔlei hu, ajifa ngi lii i yɛ mawaa na lɔ ma i wama sɔɔma kulɔma.
Jifa Mojisi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia i gbuani Ijipt ii luwani ndiilewei na ma mahɛi i pieni; i gangailɔ a yamala, bi tɔa bɛɛ i Ngewɔ na lɔilɔ numu ɛɛ ngi lɔ.
Jifa ngi langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, i Tewema Gomɛi gbɔkuilɔ tawao i nde yɛ ti yeembala ŋamɛi jia ti wɛleisia lama aako Numu-waa malikei aa Isrɛelblɛisia ti gbla-lengeisia waa.
Jifa Isrɛelblɛisia ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia ti guni a jiala ndɔma bengɔi ma ti gbooyɛi na lewe ta toli a Rɛd Sii; kia Ijiptblɛisia ti hitɛni ti wooma, njɛi i yeilɔ a tie ti lo hu.
Jifa Isrɛelblɛisia ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, i pieilɔ Jɛliko yeegɔlɔi i gula ji ti yɛ jia ta kaala heima yila folo ma njii wɔfla va.
Jifa hitɛ-nyahɛi Rehab langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ famia Isrɛlbleisia tii ngi waani taa nasia ti gangangɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, ajifa i loko heiilɔ pandaa Isrɛlbleisia ti nɛnɛjiagablɛisia bu.
Ngi nungei jisia yeepekeisia gbi ti hinda hugɛ? Watii ii nya yeya ngaa gu Gidiɔn hinda hugɛva kɛɛ Berak kɛɛ Samisi kɛɛ Jɛfta kɛɛ Devidi kɛɛ Samuɛl kɛɛ Ngewɔ lutuisia.
Jifa ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, ti gɔilɔ a kɛnyɛ wekangaa ti ti vaya. Ti pɔɔna hindei lɔ wieni tawao ti na majɔɛilɔ Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni fa. Ti pieilɔ njalɛisia ti londo,
ti ngɔmbu maaluwangɔngaa lufe, ta bawo kɔbowei yeya. Kaahu gbi ii yɛ ti ma kɛɛ ti gbayailɔ; ti gbayangɔ yɛla kɔi hu tawao ti kɛnyɛblaa wekeisia ti gɔblɛisia vayɛilɔ.

Jifa nyahangaa lɛɛnga ti langɔ yɛla a Ngewɔ, ti lenyɔuisia ti yɛ hiyelɔ hee hu ta yama ti ma. Pekei nasia tii lumani taa gbe a laala a Ngewɔ aako ti gbe ti ma, ti ngagbalɛ haa wieilɔ aako ti hiye hee hu ndɛvu yekpe majɔɔva.
Nungaa ti yɛlɔ a ti lɛɛngaa gbafa, ta ti lewe, ta ti lɛɛngaa wu jɔɔwɔisia ya, ta li a tie kpindi-wɛlei bu.

Ti yɛlɔ a ti hɔwɔhɔwɔ a kɔtiisia ta haa, ta ti lewendia, ta ti waa a kɔbowei. Ti yɛlɔ a lewetewe mbala-kɔlɛisia ɔɔ nje-kɔlɛisia ti ti ma a kula, ti vɛlingɔ hulewengɔ, juwuya i ti ma, ta ndoli nyamunyamungaa wie a tie.
Ti gbekpengɔ waa yɛla na hii dunyei ji ii yɛ gbekpeni ti heiva hu. Ti yɛlɔ a lewetewenga ndɔgbɔlambɛisia ma kɛɛ ngiyeisia hu ta yii puisia hu kɛɛ ndoweisia ndɔwu.
Nungɛi jisia gbi ti hinda i nɛɛilɔ waa Ngewɔ wɛ ajifa ti lani a ngie; na hu gbi tii hani na majɔɔni Ngewɔ i yɛ Lahei wumbuni feva ti wɛ,
ajifa i yɛlɔ Ngewɔ nɛmahu hinda hugbatɛva mu va kpekpengɔ tewengɔ yeengovei ma. I yɛ ngi lii hu lɔ kɛ ɛɛ tia lekee wote a pɔɔnablaa mu wooma.

Mua bɛɛ, kia seli vaha wai nasia ti mu galangɔ, mahoungɔe mu loko gbua hinda gbi a mu gbaha hindei nasia ma mahoungɔ mu pie, kɛɛ jumbui na fɛɛfɛngɔ kpauŋ mu ma, mu mu lii huyili hindei wieva kia mahoungɔ mu pie ndɛvui yeena hu mu wama majɔɔma.

A mu yɛ a gili tuuŋ a Yesu na i pienga mu langa a Ngewɔ i hiye watii na ma mu lani a ngie. I yɛ kɔɔlɔ kɛ na i wama piema dunya a pielɔ ti ngi waa krɔsii ma kɛɛ ii gbeni na va. Koohunɛɛ na Ngewɔ i yɛ wama fema ngi wɛ, ii krɔsi-ma-hee yeembɛnyanii lɔni a gbɛogbɛ, tawao taa na heini Ngewɔ maha-heimɛi yeengejahui.
A gili lɛɛ a kpaalɛi na kpɛlɛɛ i lani ngi ma; a gili a kpaalɛi kinɛiŋ jumbublei nasia ti lolongɔ yɛla a ngie ti ndani ngi ma i guni mbu! Faale waa luma wu gahu aa gbɔyɔ wa gbe a lala a Ngewɔ.
Ajifa magawoi ji hu wu wu magawoma la jumbui yeya, wuii yaa foni lɛ mia wa lo wu magawoma na ti wu waa.
Wu lemanga numu liigba yɛpɛi nasia ma Ngewɔ a nde wu ma jifa ngi leengeisia a wue yɛ, “Nya loi, wolo Ndemɔi ma i bi lo pele ma, tawao bi lii aa lewe ji a lumbe bi laa.
Jifa numu gbi lekee Ndemɔi longɔ la a ngi loolɔ pele ma, tawao a numu gbi liima belɔ ji a ngi wumbu a ngi loi.”

A gu kpaalɛi nasia bu ta la wu ma kia kpaalɛi na na kɛkɛi a nda ndoima ji a kpulanga wie; gbamaile wu gbalei a kɛlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ lɔ wu houma kia ngi leengaa. Ndo lɔ na wɔɔ na ngi kɛkɛ ii kpaalɛ lani ngi ma?
Ngewɔ a kpaalɛ lalɔ ngi leengeisia kpɛlɛɛ ma ti loova pele ma, faale ii kpaalɛ lailɔ wu ma, na a kɛlɔ kɛ ngi leengaa vulii yaa a wue, kɛ pue-leengaa mia a wue.

Mu kɛkɛ nasia ti mu leni dunyei hu, ti kpaalɛ lailɔ mu ma mu makɛva tawao mu wuaailɔ ti bu. Faale mahoungɔ waa le mu gu kpaalɛi na bu mu Kɛkɛ na i ngelegoohu a pie i la mu ma aako mu ndɛvu majɔɔ a ngie!
Mu kɛkɛ nasia ti yɛ dunyei hu ti kpaalɛ lailɔ mu ma hinda hugutungɔ va kia pɔɔnangɔ yɛla ti yaama; kɛɛ Ngewɔ a kpaalɛ la mu ma mua yekpe mu gbekpeyɛi va lɔ, aako mu gbua a ngie.

Ngewɔ i kpaalɛ langaa mu ma, a wielɔ mu gama bɛɛ i pienga mu lii nyaniva lɔ, mu goohu nɛva ii le. Kɛɛ pooma, nasia yeekpalɛi na a pie ti makɛ ta mawaa majɔɔlɔ, ta mia a ji ta wote a pɔɔna wieblaa, ti ndiilɛlihu.
Faale, a wu loko huhaangɔisia lɛ ngelema, wu wu wombii nasia hulata ti gbɛlima wu bu!
A yɛ tuuŋ a jia a pele wɔnangaa kɔɔ wu gɔwɔ gbalɛngɔisia taa haa, ti bawo.
A lapi wua numui gbi wu hei ndiilɛli hu, tawao a lapi wu luva kia numui na na ngi lɛɛvui vengɔ Ngewɔ wɛ, ajifa wuii na wieilɔ, wuɛɛ Ndemɔi lɔ.
A wu mahugbe waa wounve Ngewɔ yauwandei ma. Numu gbi aa wie kia tuhani ŋɔnangɔ, na a lakpa i numu gboto hubɔnɔ.
Numu gbi aa yɛ a puegbua kɛɛ numui na ii baagɔɔ hani nasia ma Ngewɔ woo le kia Isɔ i pieni, i ndewewayɛi majiɛilɔ mɛhɛɛ wulo hii va, i baa a poohani na kpɛlɛɛ i yɛ looni kulɔ.
Wu hugɔɔlɔ kɛ na wooma ngi longɔ yɛla ngi kɛkɛ i hɛɛ ngi wɛ, hindei yangamava i pieni wɔɔ, kɛɛ ii guni a bɛla ma kia bɛɛ i yɛpɛni kaka a wɔɔ.
Wuii wani kia Isrɛelblɛisia ti wani hani na gama wa gu a ngati gɔlaa ngiyei na ti yɛ toli a Sainai, ngɔmbu waa a vo ngumba, kpindi nilinili waa i heini ma kɛɛ ma yaa pumulu, viivii a wa na,
bulii a vɛ na, Ngewɔ yɛpɛwoi a gbua na. Kia nungeisia ti Ngewɔ yiawoi mɛnini, ti manɛnɛ wuaailɔ tɛɛ Ngewɔ aa njɛpɛ yakpe bɛɛ le gbɔma ti ma,
ajifa tii yɛ gu sawei na bu Ngewɔ ndani yɛ, “Ndɔgbɔ-hua bɛɛ i gbitingaa ngiyei na ma, mahoungɔ ti lo hɔwɔhɔwɔma ti paa.”
Hindei na i yɛ wie Sainai yiyei hu i nungaa huluwailɔ hulewengɔ kɛ Mojisi i ndenga yɛ, “Ngi luwanga nya maa lɔ gbɛlima.”
Wuii lini Sainai Yiyei gama, wu wanga Sayɔn Yiyei lɔ hu kɛɛ Ngewɔ vulungɔi laa wai, Jelusalɛm, na i ngelegoohu, taa ngi malika tauji gboto wai.

Wu wanga komɛi na hu lɔ Ngewɔ gblalengaa goohu nɛngɔisia ti pienga, nasia ti lɛisia nyɛingɔ ngelegoohu. Wu wanga Ngewɔ gama, na nuuvu gbi ti gbɛmbomɔi a ngie, tawao wu wanga numu yekpei nasia gama lɔ Ngewɔ i ti yɛni wɔɔ a pɔɔnablaa.
Wu wanga Yesu gama, na yɛni a sabu hinda yangilingɔ ninɛi hu i gbatɛni, tawao ngi ŋamɛi na i wuni i yɛnga a Lahei haningaa veva mu wɛ ti gbekpengɔ tewengɔ polouŋ na ma Ebɛl ŋamɛi a gu a fela.

Faale, a tɔ vulii wu wolo pandawanda numui na ma i yɛpɛma. Nasia ti gangani a wolola numui na ma i Ngewɔ wowili leni dunyei hu tii bawoni. I laailɔ ke kɛ muɛɛ bawo ina mu wounveilɔ numui na ma i ngelegoohu a yɛpɛ.
Ngewɔ woi i dunyei gbɛlilɔ a watii na, kɛɛ i Lahei wumbunga na yɛ, “Nga gbɔma dunyei jɛsialɔ kɛɛ ta lekee ɛɛ yɛla, taa ngelegoohu a yɛla.”
Ji i ndeni, “Yɛ gbɔma” a dunyei jɛsialɔ, i kɛ maa a mue leiŋ kɛ a ngi gbatɛhanisia jɛsialɔ i ti gule, aako hanii nasia tɛɛ jɛɛsia ti lo.
A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma ajifa mua tieni ma yɛlɔ mahayɛi na hu ɛɛ jɛɛsia. A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma mu hɛɛ ngi ma a pelei na a nɛɛ ngi wɛ, a baagɔma waa kɛ nduwahu,
ajifa mu Yewɔɛi gbuangɔ vuli a hinda hunyani yɔmbu lɔ.
A yɛ tuuŋ a lo a wu nyɔunyɔu kia mahoungɔ Kristi lehubleisia ti pie.
Waa lema a hotangɛisia gulula wu wɛleisia bu. Nunga lɛɛnga ti loilɔ wɔɔ ji wiema ti gbekpe a malikangaa tii kɔɔ kɛ malikangaa mia.
Nasia ti kpindi wɛlei bu ti hinda i yɛ tuuŋ wu nɛmahu bi tɔa bɛɛ wua tieni mia wu na. A gbewe tuuŋ nasia va kpalɛ i ti ma bi tɔa bɛɛ yeekpalɛi i wua tieni lɔ ma.
Mahoungɔ numui gbi ti baa gɔɔ nyaha-jɔɔ taa hini-jɔɔ ma, tawao maa ii houni nyahamɔ ɔɔ hinimɔ gbi taa numu weka ti la. Ngewɔ a nasia gbɛmbolɔ ta manɔhɔ kɛɛ puegbua hindeisia wie.
Navoo-mani aa yɛ wu hu kulo bɛɛ, tawao wu lii i lɛli a na i wu yeya. Gbamaile Ngewɔ i ndenga yɛ, “Ngɛɛ gbe bi ma tawao ngɛɛ gbua bi woohu.”
Faale, a mu nde a ndiilo muɛɛ, “Ndemɔi lɔ a gbɔ nya ma, ngɛɛ luwa. Gbɔɔ numu gbi a gu i pie a nge?”
A gili a wu mahublɛisia wɔɔ, nasia ti Ngewɔ wowili hugɛni a wue. A gili lɛɛ a ti luvayii wɔɔ kɛɛ ti haayii, wu ti wokɔɔ a ti layii hu a Ngewɔ.
Yesu Kristi ɛɛ wotewote, kia i yɛ na wɔɔ, hii i na kiahuna tawao hii a yɛ na kunafɔ.

Waa luma kaa gɛwɛgɛwɛ laasii kpɛlɛɛ taa wu yaka wu gbua tɔnya welei ma; nyandengɔ waa le ji Ngewɔ a mu liisia gbaya a ngi yauwandei hu we, i lewe sawangaa houla ma kɔloongɔ mɛhɛɛngaa ma; yeesawei jisia tii yɛ gbɔni nasia ma ta ti hou.
Saagbuablei nasia ta saa gbua Juubleisia ti hɛɛmɛi, ii wɔnani ti va saahanii na mɛva ma kpua a saa mu nda jaa gbuamɛi.
Juu Jaagbuablɛisia ti gulɔmɔ wai a walɔ a huangaa ti ŋamɛi Lomu Magayemangɔ Wai na bu Ngewɔ a yɛ na kpuava a saa nungaa ti jumbuisia va; kɛɛ ta gbualɔ a yeehuangɛsia ti woomɛi tei hu ti mɔ.
Na vamia Yesu bɛɛ i gbuani taa wai hu i haa aako i jumbuisia wua nungeisia ma a ta vulii ngi ŋamɛi.
Faale, a mu li ngi gama tei wooma ngufei na i lɛni ngi ma i lɛ mua tieni ma.
Gbamaile taa gbi ii na mu va mbei dunyei ji hu a yɛ na kunafɔ; mu taa wai na lɔ gulɔgbema i wama wama kulɔmɛi.
Faale a mu yɛ a Ngewɔ lato kpele gbi, yeetatoi i yɛ a mu jaahani Yesu sabui hu, tawao yeetatoi ji lɔ saahanii le ndaguli nasia ta nde tɛɛ Yesu lɔ Ndemɔi le.
Waa lema a kpekpe kɛɛ kpɔma wiela wu nyɔunyɔu ma, ajifa saa jisia lɔ a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ.

A golo wu gulɔbleisia wɛ, wu yɛ a na wie ta nde wu ma pieva. Tia mia ta wu yafeisia mahugbe ndɛvu ii ti ma, jifa i ti ma a kpa lɔ gonava Ngewɔ ma a ngengei na ti pienga. Wu golongaa ti wɛ, ta ti yengei wielɔ a kohunɛɛ; wuii goloilɔ ti wɛ, ta ti yengei wie a ndiinyani lɔ, tawao na ɛɛ wu nafa.
A yɛ a Ngewɔ vɛli mu va tuuŋ. Mu kɔɔlɔ vulii pandawanda kɛ mu hinda nyamu wova gbi ii na aa yɛ wu lii mɔnɛma, ajifa ma hindei yeepɔnɛi lɔ wie watii gbi.
Nyaa wu manɛnɛma vulii a kɔnɛkɔnɛ wu Ngewɔ vɛli kɔɔ i nya yama gbɔma wu gama hugutungɔ.

Ngewɔ i pienga mu Lemɔi Yesu na mbalangɛisia ti Mahugbemɔ Wai a ngie i vulunga i hiyenga hee hu ajifa i ta yekpe gbuani a saa i haa, yeehɛi na i kalɛ wuaa kunafɔ hinda yangilingɔi hu. Ngewɔ na a ndiilɛli ve mu wɛ i hani yekpe gbi ve wu wɛ wu gbewengɔ fa aako wu ngi liima hindei wie, tawao Yesu Kristi sabui hu, i ngi liima hindei wie mu hu. Tato i yɛ Yesu Kristi ma kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ va! Amiina.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, nyaa wu manɛnɛma kɔɔ wu ndahii ji mɛni vulii a ndii yekpe; gbamaile kɔlɛi ji ngi nyɛinga wu gama hu ii guhani wa.
Nya longɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ ti mu ndewei Timoti gbuanga kpindiwɛlei bu. I humbungaa a wa mbei, mua ta lɔ ma wa wu gama.
Ma va wu lokulɔisia gbi ma kɛɛ Ngewɔbleisia kpɛlɛɛ. Mu mbaa Kristimablei nasia Italiblaa a tie tiaa vama wu ma kaka.
Ngewɔ i ngauwanda gɛ a wu kpɛlɛɛ.
Nya Jemisi, Ngewɔ yengemɔ a nge kɛɛ Ndemɔi Yesu Kristi bɛɛ, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji yoyoma Ngewɔ nungei nasia kpɛlɛɛ gama ti vayafayangɔ dunyei hu gbi. Nga va wu kpɛlɛɛ ma.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a koohunɛɛ waa wie ji hinda gbɔugbɔu gɛwɛgɛwɛngaa ta wu male,
ajifa wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ wu longaa houni wu lalei ma wu yeehinda gbɔugbɔisia huvo, kɛ wu kɛnga kɛ wa gulɔ hinda gbɔugbɔu bu.
Tawao a pie wu hinda gbɔugbɔu huhoulɛi hu aa lewe tawao waa gbaha, aako wu yɛ a Kristimablaa lavengɔngaa, wu nyamu gbi aa yɛ na!
Nɛmahulewe ii yɛlɔ wu yilaye wɛ, i Ngewɔ vɛli, na ngi lokohu lambongɔ hani majiava numu gbi ma, kponyɛ wooma ii le, Ngewɔ a nɛmahulewe velɔ ngi wɛ.

Kɛɛ mahoungɔ i Ngewɔ vɛli ngi langɔ la vulii kɛ Ngewɔ a ngi hɛɛwoi mɛnilɔ, tawao sekahu gbi aa yɛ ngi lii hu, gbamaile numui na a sekahu wie ngi gbuangɔ a gboyei yeenjagatei lɔ fɛfɛi a ngi hɔwɔhɔwɔ hu.
Yeenumui na nyɔkɔ, a wotewote ngi giliyii hu kɛɛ ngi wiehindei, aa gili la kɛ a hani gbi majɔɔlɔ a Ndemɔi.
Mahoungɔ Kristimamɔi na ngi vɛlingɔ i goohunɛɛ ji Ngewɔ a ngi lɛ,
tawao Kristimamɔi na ngi gbatɛngɔ i goohunɛɛ ji Ngewɔ a ngi yei. Ajifa kpatɛblaa ta haalɔ hugutungɔ kia kpitii yeepuɛi a haa.
Gbamaile folei a gbualɔ kpandingɔ waa i kpitii mɔ kɛ yeepuɛi i logbonga i gula, kɛ ngi nyandei i jukulunga. Hii kpatɛblaa jukulu watii na ti wugbakpangɔ a yɛla ti navoo gɔlilei hu.

Numui na goohu nɛngɔe ɛɛ gbe a lala a Ngewɔ ji hinda gbɔugbɔngaa ta ngi male, ajifa i hugɔɔmahindei nasia huvoongaa pandaa, Ngewɔ a ngi pawalɔ a kunafɔ lɛɛvui na i Lahei wumbunga feva nasia wɛ ti longɔ a ngie.
Hinda gbɔugbɔu bondɛi nasia ti numu gɔlɛngaa jumbu hinda wieva, maa ii houni i nde yɛ, “Ngewɔ mia i nya gɔlɛma;” ajifa numu gbi ɛɛ gu aa Ngewɔ gɔlɛ hinda nyamu wieva, tawao ta vulii ɛɛ numu gbi gɔlɛ.
Kɛɛ numu gbi ngi liima hinda nyamuisia mia ta ngi laala ti ngi wili jumbui hu.
Kɛɛ numu i golongaa ngi liima hinda nyamui wiela wɛ, a jumbui lɔ wie tawao numu i nɔɔngaa jumbui wiela ma, ngi yafei a haalɔ kunafɔ va.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, numu gbi aa wu wɛlɛ.
Mboya hani yekpe gbi kɛɛ hani gbi lekee ma majɔɔ gbama, a gbua ngelegoohu lɔ; a gbua mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ gama lɔ na i ngelema voofoisia gbatɛni, ɛɛ wotewote tawao ɛɛ wounve mu ma aa mu lo kpindi hu.
I nɛni Ngewɔ vulii lɔ wɛ pieva ngi wowili lɔnyangɔe i pie ti mu le a nina jifa ngi longɔ mu gbekpe mu lewe ngi gbatɛ-hanii kpɛlɛɛ ma.
Ji i yɛ wu nɛmahu, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, numu gbi ngi hu i vula a wolola, kɛɛ ngi hu i lɛli a yɛpɛla kɛɛ liileweva.
Ndiilewe ɛɛ gu a wala a pɔɔnɛi na Ngewɔ lii i ma ngi nungeisia va.
Faale a gbe numu nɔhɔ hindei nasia kpɛlɛɛ ma piela gungɔ wu hu kɛɛ tuva nyamui gbi. A golo Ngewɔ wɛ wu njɛpɛi na gulu i hiima wu liisia hu, njɛpɛi na a gu a wu bawola.
Waa wua yekpe wɛlɛ a ji wa wolo lekee Ngowili Yekpei ma; kia aa yɛ hii, a na wie Ngowili Yekpei a wu gaa la.
Numu gbi lekee a wolo gbama Ngowili Yekpei ma kɛɛ ɛɛ na wie a nde, ngi wiengɔe kia numui i na a mɛmɛɛ hugbee i ngi yɛyii yeetɔnyangɔi lɔ.
A ta yekpe gbelɔ vulii pandawanda kɛɛ ngi gbuangɔ lekee kɛ i lema ngi yɛyii ma ngaama.

Kɛɛ numui na a sawei gaa vulii pandawanda kpekpengɔ tewengɔ sawei gbi ma, sawei na a nungaa gbua nduwɔya hu, i nɔɔ kaala ma tawao ɛɛ mɛni lekee gbama aa lema ma, kɛɛ a na wie yeesawei i ndeni, Ngewɔ a ngi nafalɔ hinda gbi hu a pie.
Numu gbi langɔe la yɛ Kristimamɔ yekpe lɔ a ngie? Ina yeenumui na ii guni ngi nɛi ma, kɛ baabaa-hinda gbama mia a ngi Yewɔ-hindei tawao kɛ taa ta yekpe wɛlɛma.

Ngewɔ-hindei na sɛwɛsɛwɛngɔ tawao kpekpengɔ mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ yaama ta lɔ a ji: poleengeisia tia ponyahangeisia mahugbela ti hinda gbɔugbɔi hu kɛɛ numu bia yekpe mahugbela aako baa yɛ a dunyei ji yeejumbu wieblɛisia yilayee.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, kia wu langɔ a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi, Ngɔlɔya Lemɔ wai, waa nungaa huwɔyɔ ti yɛyii va ti luwui ma.
Gbamaile wu gomɛngaa mia kpatɛmɔ a wa na, kanigbɔli i ngi lokohu kɛɛ ndoma nyande waa i ngi ma, kɛ fɛɛlimɔi bɛɛ i wa na ndoma hawei i ngi ma,
bi baagɔma vengaa kpatɛmɔi wɛ bi nde ngi ma bɛɛ, “Hei heiwulii yeekpekpe wai ji ma mbei,” kɛ bi ndenga fɛɛlimɔi ma bɛɛ, “Li bi lo mia,” ɔɔ “Hei mbei ndɔmɛi nya gɔɔbu,”
kɛ wua wua yekpe luahu gɔlɛma, wa kiti lewe la nungaa ma a ndii nyamui.

A wolo, nya mbaa Kristimableisia! Ngewɔ i nasia lɔ wumbuni ti vɛlingɔ dunyei ji hu i ti wote a kpatɛbla ti layii va a ngie tawao i ti gbɛɛ nasia ma ti ngi mahayɛi na bu i Lahei wumbuni feva nasia wɛ ti longɔ a ngie.
Kɛɛ wuaa fɛɛliblɛisia bɛlɛ nyanima. Yeeni lɔ ti ngulu liigbama wu bolowooma, ta li a wue kootiisia gulɔ a kpaya? Kpatɛblaa le!
Tia lɔ ta baa gbua mbiyɛ yekpei na ma ti fenga wu wɛ.
Hindei yeepɔnangɔi mia wa pie ji wa jia a Mahɛi Ngewɔ jawei na i ngi Gɔlɛi hu i ndeni yɛ, “Lo a bi heinyɔui kia bi longɔ a bia yekpe.”
Kɛɛ bi nungaa luahu gɔlɛngaa, bi longɔ a ti lɛɛngaa tewengɔ yeepekeisia ma, kɛ bi jumbu wulinga tawao Sawei a bi wumbu a sawa-nyanimɔ lɔ.
Numu na a Sawei yeengila nyani, i sawei kpɛlɛɛ lɔ nyanini.
Gbamaile numu yakpei na i ndeni yɛ, “Baa puegbua,” ta lɔ gbɔma i ndeni yɛ, “Baa numu waa.” Faale kiaa bɛɛ bii puegbuani, kɛɛ bi numu waangaa, kɛ bi sawei kpɛlɛɛ nyaninga.
Faale a yɛ a yɛpɛ, wa hinda wie kia nungei nasia na Ngewɔ i wama ti gbɛmboma a sawei na a mu gbua nduwɔyahu.
Ajifa Ngewɔ ɛɛ manuma wie ji a yɛ numui na gbɛmboma ii manuma wieni; kɛɛ manuma a temaya jɔlɔ kitilewela maahu.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, gbɛ nafa le jii numui a nde yɛ ngi langɔe a Kristi a sɔbɛ ina ngi wiehindeisia tii kɛni kɛ ngi langɔe a Kristi? Ngi lalei na a Kristi a ngi bawolɔ?
Ina bi ndehingɛisia lɔ na ɔɔ bi ndenyahaleengeisia kula ii ti ma tawao mɛhɛɛ yekpe ii ti yeya;
a yee ti nafa ina bi ndeilɔ lekee ti ma bɛɛ, “Ngewɔ i wu luba! Kɔlɛ-vɛfɛ aa wu vɛ tawao a mɛhɛɛ mɛ kpoto wu goo i ve!” Ina bii hanii nasia veni ti wɛ ti haamingɔ fa ti lɛɛvui yeva na?
Faale lanayei lekee yaa numu wɛ kɛɛ kpekpeya wiela gɛngɔ ii le ma kɛ hu haangɔi.

Kɛɛ tɛngaa numu yila a ndelɔ yɛ, “Numu yila langɔe a Ngewɔ kɛɛ yee pekei ta a hinda yekpe lɔ wie.” Kɛ a nge kɛ bɛɛ hinda yekpe wie kɛɛ bi langɔe a Ngewɔ, nya bɛɛ nga kɛlɔ a bie kɛ kpekpei na nga pie a kɛlɔ kɛ nya langɔe a Ngewɔ.
Bi langɔe la kɛ Ngewɔ i yakpe? Na nyandengɔe. Ngafa nyamuisia vulii bɛɛ ti langɔe a Ngewɔ tawao ti maa a gbɛli lɔ a nduwɛi.
Bia bi kpowamɔi ji! Bi longɔe ngi kɛ a bie kɛ lala lekee a Ngewɔ ii gbekpeni hinda yekpe wiela wooma?
Ngewɔ i yee mu maada Ebraham woteni a pɔɔnamɔ, i tia ta luahu gbatɛ? I ji wieni Ebraham wiehindeisia lɔ va, ji i ngi hindoloi Aisaki veni Ngewɔ wɛ a saai hani.
Bii tɔma? Ebraham layii a Ngewɔ kɛɛ ngi wiehindeisia ti makpɔilɔ ti yenge; ngi wiehindeisia lɔ ti ngi lalei a Ngewɔ yakpani.
Tawao Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi layie i longa ma ji i ndeni yɛ, “Ebraham lailɔ a Ngewɔ, tawao jifa i lani a Ngewɔ, Ngewɔ i ngi wumbuilɔ a pɔɔnamɔ.” Faale ti Ebraham loliilɔ a Ngewɔ ndiamɔ.
Bi tɔnga na kɛ numu wiehinda yekpeisia lɔ ta pie Ngewɔ i ngi wote a pɔɔnamɔ, ngi lalei lekee ii le a Ngewɔ.

Hii lɔɔ i wieni a hitɛ-nyahɛi Rehab. Ngewɔ i ngi woteilɔ a pɔɔnamɔ, i taa ta luahu gbatɛ hinda yekpei nasia va i pieni ji i loko heini Juubleisia ti nɛnɛjiagablɛisia bu, i gbɔ ti ma ti yama a pele weka tawao tii ti houni.
Faale le kia lɔɔ ngafei ii yɛlɔ numu gbuhɛi hu yeekpuhɛi haangɔ a yɛla, hii lanaya bɛɛ haangɔ a yɛla ina hinda yekpe wiela ii pooma.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wua wu longɔ wu yɛ a Ngewɔ hindei yeekaamɔngaa, waa gboto, ajifa wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ a mua mu kaamɔisia gbɛmbo a ndiimabe lɔ i lewe nungaa wekeisia ma.
Mu gbi ma kpulanga gboto wielɔ. Kɛɛ numui na ɛɛ kpulanga wie wɔɔ gba njɛpɛi nasia hu a nde, kɛ nyamu gbi ii ngi hu tawao kɛ a gulɔ a tayekpe huhoula.
Ma kɔlii wuaalɔ soi baahu aako i golo mu wɛ, mu gu mu pie i li mia mu longɔ a na.
Ɔɔ a gili a njaya-lɛndɛi: kia bɛɛ ngɔlɔngɔ waa tawao kɛ fɛfɛ gbayangɔ waa lɔ a gu i jia a ngie hani wulo lɔ a ngi lo pele ma, a pie i li mia gbi ngi njiamɔi longɔ i li na.
Hii lɔɔ numu nɛi i na: kia bɛɛ kulongɔ, a lawolɔ yɛ a gulɔ a hinda waawanga wiela. A gili lɛɛ kia ngɔmbuvo wulohii a gu a ngola lakpa waa mɔla.

Numu nɛi wiengɔe kia ngɔmbui i na. Piengɔe gbɔma kia dunyei na hinda nyamu wiela lekee i na, i heini ngi nda yɛmɛi mu luwui hu, a pie mu gbuhɛi gbi i nyamu. A ngɔmbu yatɛlɔ mu lɛɛvui hu hindei kpɛlɛɛ ma, ngɔmbui na a wa ngi gama a gbua jahama vulii.
Nuuvu a gulɔ tawao i gunga a fuuhani wekeisia gbi makɛla, ndɔgbɔ-huangaa kɛɛ ŋɔningɛisia kɛɛ ndala-hanisia kɛɛ nyɛngɛisa.
Kɛɛ numu gbi ii yaa wɔɔ gba guni a nɛi makɛla. Hani nyamu lɔ a ngie, numu gbi ɛɛ gu a ngi makɛla, a gu a numu waala kia kaali nyamunyamu.
Mu nɛi lɔ ma siɛgbua la mu Lemɔi kɛɛ mu Kɛkɛ ma, ma gbɔma mu mbaa nuuvuisia jondu la, na Ngewɔ i kpatɛni gbuava a ngie.
Nda yakpei lɔ njia yekpei a gbua hu kɛɛ njia nyamu. Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, maa ii houni ji i wie.
Nja nɛnɛɛ kɛɛ nja ŋɔnaŋɔna tɛɛ gbua ndowa yakpei hu.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, figi wulii ɛɛ gu aa wua a ɔlivi; glepii ɛɛ gu aa wua a figi, tawao nja nɛnɛɛ ɛɛ gu a gbuala njalowɛi na hu a kpolo-yɛi ve.
Numu lɔ wu lia ngi nɛmahu lewengɔ tawao i hinda hugɔɔngɔ? Mahoungɔ i ji magɛ a tuva yekpei na a pie kɛɛ hinda yekpei nasia a pie a nɛmahulewe tawao ngi yaama ɛɛ lɛ.
Kɛɛ ina toloi lɔ wu liisia hu kɛɛ ndiimanyamu tawao wu longɔ a kpekpeyei gbi wua yekpe lekee va, wuaa lawola tawao wa ndɛɛ gula tɔnyɛi ma.
Nɛmahulewei na bonda ii gbuama Ngewɔ gama, dunyei ji woo mia, Ngewɔ Yafei ndɛi ii le, ngafa nyamuisia ti nde mia.
Gbamaile mia nungaa ti yɛngaa na wu lia ti lolongɔ tawao ta tia yekpe lekee ti gbekpeyɛi gɔli, ngo-ya-vayei a yɛlɔ na kɛɛ hinda nyamui yeelasii gbi.

Kɛɛ nungei nasia Ngewɔ a nɛmahulewei na ve ti wɛ a gbua ngi gama, nyamu ii ti hu, ta nungaa luahu gbatɛlɔ, tɛɛ jɔlɛ, ti longɔ a ndiamɔya; ta manu nungaa ma tawao hinda yekpei yeelasii gbi wiela i ti gɔɔngɔ; tɛɛ topooma wie tawao tɛɛ baaya hinda wie.
Tawao tuhani gaalɛi na nduahugbatɛbleisia ta hii wava a ndiilɛli, a wa kpekpeya lɔ.
Ndapi jisia kpɛlɛɛ kɛɛ njianjiɛisia ti wu luahu ti gbuama gbɔɔ hu? Tii gbuama nɛnɛɛisia yeemanii nasia hu lɔ ti lapima wu liisia hu?

Wu longɔe a haningaa kɛɛ wuɛɛ gu a ti majɔɔla, faale wu magbatɛngɔe numu waava. Wu haamingɔ waa le haningaa va kɛɛ wuɛɛ gu waa ti majɔɔ, famia wa yia, wa lapi. Wuɛɛ hanii nasia majɔɔ wu haamingɔ fa jifa wuɛɛ fɛli Ngewɔ ma.
Tawao wu ti vɛli bɛɛ Ngewɔ ma wuɛɛ ti majɔɔ ajifa wa ti vɛli hinda nyamu lɔ va. Wa haningaa vɛli Ngewɔ ma nguava wu liima hinda nyamuisia hu lɔ.
Wua wa Ngewɔ wekeisia vɛli! Wuii kɔɔ kɛ bi yɛngaa a dunyei ndiamɔ kɛ bi yɛnga a Ngewɔ juwu lɔ? Numui na lekee gbi ngi longɔ i yɛ a dunyei ndiamɔ, i ta yekpe yɛnga a Ngewɔ juwu.
Waa gili la kɛ Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ii tɔnya yia leni ji i ndeni yɛ, “Ngafei na Ngewɔ i puni mu hu, ngi longɔ waa le la tawao a malolo gbualɔ waa.”
Kɛɛ ngauwandei na Ngewɔ piengɔ a mue i leweni na ma. Famia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni yɛ, “Ngewɔ ɛɛ luma mamaniblɛisia wɛ taa ti liimɛi wie, kɛɛ a ngauwanda velɔ nungei nasia wɛ ta tia yekpe mayei.”
Faale na, a golo Ngewɔ wɛ. A lapi a Seitana kɛ i lewenga a piimɛ i gbua wu gama.
A lukpe Ngewɔ gbla, ta bɛɛ a lukpelɔ wu gbla. A wu yeyɛisia wua ti yɛ sɛwɛ, wu jumbublɛi jisia! A wu liisia hu yɛ sɛwɛsɛwɛ, wu baayablɛi jisia!
A wu mamamau, wu wɔlɔ kaka; a gbe a yɛlɛla wu tɔtoo a wɔlɔla, wu gbe a goohunɛɛla wu lii i nyani.
A wua yekpe mayei Ndemɔi gulɔ, a wu yalɛlɔ.

Waa njia nyamu le wu nyɔunyɔu ma, nya mbaa Kristimableisia. Numu gbi lekee a njia nyamu le kɔlooni ngi mbaa Kristimamɔ ma yɛ ngi nyamungɔe, i njia nyamu lenga Sawei ma yɛ Sawei nyamungɔe. Bi ndengaa bɛɛ Sawei nyamungɔe, kɛ bii yɛni gbɔma a Sawei houmɔ, bi yɛnga na a kiti lewemɔ lɔ Sawei ma.
Ngewɔ yakpe lɔ Sawa lamɔ a ngie kɛɛ kiti lewemɔ. Ta yakpe lɔ a gu a numu bawola ɔɔ numu nyanila. Bi langɔ la yelɔ a bie ba nde bɛɛ bi mbaa nuuvu nyamungɔe?
A wolo ji ma, wua wa nde wuɛɛ, “Haa ɔɔ sina ma lilɔ tei na bonda hu, mu foo yila gbɔyɔ na, mu fele gɔ na, mu navoo gboto jɔɔ.”
Wuii kɔɔ vulii wu lɛɛvui a yee yɛ na sina! Wu wiengɔe kia ndulii na a hɛlɛ kulo kɛ i longa hu fulo.
Na mahoungɔ wu nde ta lɔ a ji: “Ina Ndemɔi i lumangaa, ndɛvu a yɛlɔ mu hokpala ji bonda wieva ɔɔ na.”
Kɛɛ kiahuna wu mamaingɔ, wa lawo; tawao ndawoei na bonda kpɛlɛɛ nyamungɔe.
Faale na, numu i hindei na gɔngaa mahoungɔ i pie, ii pieilɔ, kɛ yeenumui na lɔ jumbu wiema.
A wolo naa ji ma, wu kpatɛbleisia! A wɔlɔ, wu yelei gula kpaalɛi nasia va ti wama lama wu ma.
Wu gbateisia ti lulanga, gilingɛisia ti wu magulɛisia mɛnga.

Kaayei i wu ganigbɔli nyaninga kɛɛ wu gani-golei, tawao Kpɛmbo-Volei ma yeekaayei ji a selilɔ kɛ wu gbewengɔ wɔɔ wua yekpe lekee lɔ va tawao a wu luwui mɔlɔ kia ngɔmbui na. Wu kpatɛ gboto lɛnga ma dunyei ji hu i wama gbɔyɔma.
Wuii yaa pawa gbi veni ngengeblɛi nasia wɛ ta yenge wu gbalɛisia hu. A wolo lɛɛ ti gboonyɛwoisia ma! Nasia ta wu luhanisia lewe, ti wɔɔwoi i fonga Ngewɔ ma, Ndemɔi na kpayei gbi i ngi wɛ.
Wu yɛngɔi hu dunyei hu, wu koohunɛɛ hu lɔ tuuŋ, wa nɛnɛɛ lekee mɛ, wu wua yekpe wulɔnga kia fuuhanii nasia ta ti wulɔ ti waava.
Wu nungei nasia lɛɛnga tii hinda nyamu gbi wieni, wu ti waanga, tawao tii lapini a wue.
Faale a liilo, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, haaŋ Ndemɔi i yama mbei. A tɔ lɛɛ kia kpaa lamɔi a liilo ji a yɛ tuhani yekpe mawuloma majɔɔva ngi lɔlɔmɛi. A haama-yɛi mawulolɔ a ndiilo haaŋ i wua.
Mahoungɔe wua bɛɛ wu liilo. Wu gahu aa gbɔyɔ gbamaile Ndemɔi wa-Volei magutungɔe.
Waa gboonyɛ a wu nyɔunyɔu, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, aako Ngewɔ aa wu gbɛmbo. Numui gbi ti Gbɛmbomɔi wala hugutungɔe.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a gili a Ngewɔ lutui nasia ti yɛ Ndemɔi wowili le nungaa ma. Ti guyii hinda gbɔugbɔu bu i yɛni a tɔmaseli lɔ mahoungɔ wu pookɔɔ.
Ma ndelɔ muɛɛ mahoungɔe mu nasia lato ti guni hinda gbɔugbɔu bu. Wu mɛninga kia Job i liiloni, tawao wu kɔɔlɔ gbɔɔ Ngewɔ pieni ngi wɛ kɛlɛmɛi. Ajifa Ndemɔi manumangɔ tawao ngi hindawandangɔ.

Tewengɔ ji kpɛlɛɛ ma nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu yaa Lahei wumbuma waa jondu ngelegoohu ma ɔɔ dunyei ɔɔ hani weka gbi. Luma lekee ji bi lii a yɛ tumɛi ma, bi mawali ji bi lii a mawali ma, na lɔ a wie Ngewɔ ɛɛ bi lɛɛ.
Numu lɔ wu lia hinda gbɔugbɔu i ngi ma? Mahoungɔ i Ngewɔ vɛli. Numu lɔ na ngi goohunɛngɔ? Mahoungɔe i siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma ngule hu.
Numu lɔ wu lia ngi heegbɛngɔ? Mahoungɔ i Kristimableisia yeekpakoleisia loli ti Ngewɔ vɛli ngi va, ti ɔlivi wulɔi jia ngi ma a mu Lemɔi biyeihu.
Kristimableisia yeekpakoloisia ti langɔ yɛngaa la kɛ Ngewɔ a ti hɛɛwoi mɛnilɔ, heegbɛmɔi na a bawolɔ; Ndemɔi a kahugbua velɔ ngi ma, i manu ngi ma jumbui nasia va i pienga.
Faale na, a gaye a wu jumbuisia wu nyɔunyɔu gama, wu Ngewɔ vɛli wu nyɔunyɔu va aako Ngewɔ i wu bawo. Hɛɛ na numu yekpei a pie Ngewɔ ma a gulɔ a hinda waawaa wiela.
Ilaija i yɛni wɔɔ a nuuvu lɔ kia mu na. I nɔɛilɔ Ngewɔ vɛlila ma yɛ nja gbi aa wua, tawao nja gbi ii wuani aa wu ndɔlei ma foo sawa kɛɛ yeekutu va.
Na wooma i gbɔma Ngewɔ vɛlilɔ kɛ njɛi i tɔtongɔ a wuala, tuhanisia ti gbɔma gbekpe kpaalɛisia hu.
Nya mbaa Kristimableisia, wu yilayee i gbuangaa tɔnya welei ma, numu wekei i yama a ngie tɔnya welei ma,
a ji la nɛmahu; numu gbi lekee a jumbumɔi gbua kaka-welei ma i ngi yama tɔnya welei ma, a yeejumbumɔi na yafei mabawolɔ kunafɔ hee yeya, i pie Ngewɔ i manu jumbu gboto ma.

Nya Pita, tomɔ a nge Yesu Kristi va, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji nyɛinga Ngewɔ nungaa wumbungɔi nasia gama ti gbuanga ti yee ti heiheini hotaya hu Pɔntɔsi plɔvinsi hu, kɛɛ Galesia kɛɛ Kapadosia kɛɛ Esia kɛɛ Bitinia.

Mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ i wu wumbuilɔ kia hugbatɛngɔ yɛla ngi nɛmahu, Ngewɔ Yafei i pie wu wote a pɔɔnablaa aako wu golo Yesu Kristi wɛ, tawao wu yɛ sɛwɛ a ngi ŋamɛi. Ngauwanda kɛɛ ndiilɛli i yɛ wu hu ndavengɔ kpauŋ.

A mu siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma, mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi ngi Kɛkɛ! Jifa ngi manumangɔ waa, i ndɛvu nina veilɔ mu wɛ a ji i Yesu Kristi vuluni i ngi wumbu hee hu. Na Ngewɔ i pieni, ta lɔ i pienga mu liilomɛi na gulɔgbema i yeya mu va na ɛɛ gbɔyɔ;
famia mu lii lɔ ma kpekpeya wai nasia majɔɔva Ngewɔ i ndamagbatɛnga feva ngi nungeisia wɛ. I ndamagbatɛnga ngelegoohu wu va tawao ɛɛ lula, ɛɛ nyani tawao ɛɛ lohu.
Ti na wu va lɔ, wua Ngewɔ gbayei i wu mahugbema jifa wu langɔ a Kristi aako wu mbawoyei na majɔɔ Ngewɔ magbatɛngɔ na magɛva kɛlɛma volei ma.
A goohunɛɛ ji va, kia bɛɛ kiahuna hinda hugutungɔ va hinda gbɔugbɔu laasi gbotoi nasia va ti lama wu ma.

Kpaalɛi jisia ti lama wu ma gbuava pooma mia ina wu langɔe a Kristi a tɔnya. Nungaa ta gulɔ a kanigbɔlui vulii nyanila, kɛɛ ta gbua pooma a ngɔmbui lɔ tɔva ina kpekpengɔe; hii mahoungɔ gbuava wu lalei wooma na baagɔma i ma tewengɔ kanigbɔlui ma, aako i lɛmbi. Na wiengaa, wa tato majɔɔlɔ kɛɛ ngɔlɔya kɛɛ mbɛlɛhei Folei na ma Yesu Kristi a ta yekpe gɛ a numui gbi.
Wu longɔe a ngie kia bɛɛ wɔɔ gba wuii yaa ngi lɔni, tawao wu langɔe a ngie, kia bɛɛ wuɛɛ gu a ngi lɔla kiahuna. Faale wa koohunɛɛ lakpa waa wielɔ na numu gbi ɛɛ gu i hungɛ,
ajifa wu langa a ngie, na vamia wu yafeisia ti mbawoyei majɔɔnga.
Ngewɔ lutuisia ti mbawoyei ji hinda hugbɛkpɛilɔ a, tɔmbɛyama wee, tawao i loni kulɔma lɔ ti mbawoyei na hinda hugɛ Ngewɔ a fe wu wɛ gbama.
Ti lapilɔ kɔɔva migbe lɔ mbawoyei ji a wa tawao a yee wa. Watii ji lɔ Kristi Yafei na i ti hu i loko loni ma ji i yɛ kpaalɛi nasia hinda hugɛma i wama lama Kristi ma kɛɛ ngɔlɔyɛi na a majɔɔ na wooma.

Ngewɔ kɛilɔ a ngi lutui jisia kɛ tii ti yengei wiema ti yekpe nafava kɛlee wua, ji ti yɛ yɛpɛ kɔlooni hindei nasia ma wu mɛninga na a nasia ti Ngowili Yekpei hugɛni a wue Ngewɔ Yafei na Ngewɔ i ngi yoyoni a gbua ngelegoohu ngi gbayei hu. Jisia ti yɛni a hindangaa lɔ malikeisia vulii bɛɛ ta yɛ loni ti mbugɔɔ.
Faale naa, a wu lii huyili yengeva. Wu ya aa lema, wu valangɔ i yɛla, wu mbawoyei na yakpe gulɔgbe Yesu Kristi a fe wu wɛ gbama watii na a ta yekpe magɛ a numui kpɛlɛɛ.
A golo Ngewɔ wɛ tawao waa luma mani nyamui nasia ti yɛ wu lɔ watii lɛ wɔɔ wuii yɛ Ngowili Yekpei hinda hugɔɔ kɔlooni Kristi ma.
Kia waa na wie, a joowi hinda nyamu laasi gbi ma wu wiehindei kpɛlɛɛ hu kia lɔɔ Ngewɔ na i wu lolini ngi yengei wieva ngi lolongɔ a hinda nyamu.
Ngewɔ ndeilɔ ngi Gɔlɛi hu yɛ, “Jumbu gbi aa yɛ wu ma ajifa jumbu gbi ii nya ma.”
Wa Ngewɔ loli a wu Kɛkɛ, ji wa yɛ ngi vɛlima; ta lɔ a numui gbi gbɛmbo ngi wiehindeisia ma. Ɛɛ topooma wie. Faale naa, a baagɔma waa ve ngi wɛ wu lɛɛvui yeemɔni hu gbi mbei ngelebu.
Gbamaile wu kɔɔlɔ Ngewɔ i yee wu wumawoni i wu gbua wu luvayii wovei hu, tuva huwopongɔ gbamɛi na wu maadani ti ndoni a wue. Ngewɔ ii wu wumawoni a na a nyani kia nyɔkɔ kanigole ɔɔ kanigbɔlu,
kɛɛ i wu wumawoni a saa baagbangɔ waa lɔ i kpuani a Kristi na i wieni kia mbaalɛi na mbɛ gbi ii ma.
Pɛiŋ wɔɔ Ngewɔ i yaa dunyei gbatɛ, i loko loilɔ Kristi ma kɛ ngi sabui hu lɔ a wu bawo; famia Kristi i wani kɛlɛma volei jisia ma kɔɔ i wu bawo.
Ta lɔ i yɛni a sabu wu lani a Ngewɔ na i ngi vuluni, i ngi wumbu hee hu, i ngi gɔ a ngɔlɔya waa; faale wu langɔ a Ngewɔ lɔ, wu lii i looni ngi ma.

Kia naa wu sawei nasia hounga Ngowili Yekpei kɛni tawao na i pienga Ngewɔ i manunga wu jumbui ma wu yafeisia ti yɛnga sɛwɛ, ji lɔ i pienga wu ndoma yekpe wienga a wu mbaa Kristimableisia, a lo a wu nyɔunyɔ a wu lii gbi.
Ngewɔ layia vulungɔe na a yɛ na kunafɔ, i ndɛvu nina venga wu wɛ, wu wienga kia ndeengɛi nasia ti lemɔi ɛɛ haa kunafɔ kia mu nda leblɛisia ta haa.
Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni yɛ, “Nuuvui kpɛlɛɛ ti wiengɔe kia kpitii i na, tawao ti wɔlɔyɛi gbi wiengɔe kia ngulu-wuɛisia ti na. Kpitii a belɔ, tawao ngulu-wuɛisia ta gulalɔ ti nyani,
kɛɛ njɛpɛi na Ndemɔi i ndenga a yɛlɔ na kunafɔ.” Njɛpɛi ji i yɛni a Ngowili Yekpei na lɔ ti ndeni wu ma gbalauŋ.
Faale, a gbe hinda nyamui yeelasii gbi wiela ma; waa gbɔma ndɛɛ guala, waa numu wɛlɛ, waa lolo a numu gbi, waa mbɛlɛnyani yɛpɛ le a numu.
A wie kia ndoola nɛnɛɛngaa ti na, wa wɔɔ nyiniya senyangɔi na va numu yafei longɔ la, aako wu yɛ a kpɔle wu yafeisia ti lakpa tawao ti bawo.
Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “Wua yekpe vulii wu Ndemɔi gbekpeyii lɔnga na.”
A yɛ a lukpe Ndemɔi gbla. Ngi wiengɔe kia pɛlɛ- lo-gɔtii na pɛlɛ loblɛisia ti pilini tɛɛ ii gbekpeni kɛɛ Ngewɔ i mbumbuni a kɔtu baagbangɔ waa.

A wa Ndemɔi gama kia kɔtii yekpengaa, wu luma Ngewɔ Yafei i Ngewɔ Wɛlei lo a wue, wu wote na a Ngewɔ jaagbuablaa Yesu Kristi biyɛi hu, wa saai nasia gbua Ngewɔ ma ngi Yafei a kɛ a wue tawao a nɛɛ ngi wɛ.
Ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeilɔ yɛ, “Ngi kɔtu baagbangɔ wumbuilɔ, tamia ngi ngi yɛma a dɛmɛ gɔtiwai mia Jayɔn; tawao numu gbi lekee a la a ngie, ngi yaa ɛɛ wufe kunafɔ.”
Kɔtii ji baa wɔlɔngɔ waa le wu va wua wu langɔ a Kristi; kɛɛ nasia tii lani a Kristi: “Kɔtii na pɛlɛ loblɛisia ti pilini tɛɛ ii gbekpeni, i woteilɔ a bagɔma gɔtii tewengɔ kɔtii kpɛlɛɛ ma.”
Tawao Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi yeepekei i ndeilɔ yɛ, “Kɔtii ji lɔ nungaa ta lugba la, ta gula.” Ti lugbɛilɔ jifa tii lani a Ngowili Yekpei; namia i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ ti va.

Kɛɛ wua lɔ kɛnyɛi na a wue Ngewɔ i wu mbumbuni, mahɛi jaagbuablɛisia a wue, wu vengɔ Ngewɔ yengei wɛ, tawao ngi nungaa lɔ a wue, i wu wumbuni ngi wiehinda gabandengɔisia hugɛva a numui gbi, Ngewɔ na i wu lolini i wu gbua jumbui yeekpindii hu, i wa a wue ngi bawoyɛi yeefoofo gabandengɔ wai hu.
Watii lɛɛnga wɔɔ, wuii yɛni a Ngewɔ nungaa, kɛɛ kiahuna na ngi nungeisia lɔ a wue; watii lɛɛnga wɔɔ, wuii Ngewɔ manumɛi majɔɔni, kɛɛ kiahuna na wu ngi manumɛi majɔɔnga.

Nya liima ndiamɔisia, nyaa wu manɛnɛma jifa hotangaa lɔ a wue kɛɛ nasia tii wani lɛmbima dunyei ji hu! A loko gbua hindei nasia hu wa pie wu luwui liilɛliva, hindei nasia ta kɔ wɛlɛ numu yafei ma watii gbi.

Wu luvayii i gbekpe nasia ti lia Juublaa yaa tie, nahi ti ndɛɛ gualangaa tɛɛ hinda nyamu wieblaa lɔ a wue, ti hinda yekpei nasia lɔ wa pie, ta lumalɔ tɛɛ numu yekpengaa lɔ a wue, tawao ti Ngewɔ lato folei na ma a wa.
A golo nuuvu lemaya gbi bu jifa mu Lemɔi woomablaa a wue; a golo Rom Maha Wai bu, na ngi lewengɔ ti gbi ma,
kɛɛ Gɔvinɛi nasia i ti heinga kpaalɛ lava hinda nyamu wieblɛisia ma kɛɛ nasia lato va ta hinda yekpe wie.
Gbamaile Ngewɔ longɔ wu yɛ a hinda yekpe wie tuuŋ aako wu kpɔhu wu nguhubaablei nasia laa gbɔwu ta baa wu ma.
A luva kia nasia na tii nduwɔyahu, na hu gbi waa gili la kɛ ji wuii ndɔwuya hu kpaya vengɔi wu wɛ hinda nyamu gbi wieva, kɛɛ a luva kia Ngewɔ luweisia.
A baagɔɔ numu gbi ma, wu lo a wu mbaa Kristimableisia, wu luwa Ngewɔ ma, wu baagɔɔ Rom Maha Wai ma.
Mahoungɔ wua Kristimablaa a wue wu nduwɔya hu, wu golo wu luwɔkɛisia wɛ, wu baagɔma waa ve ti wɛ, nasia lekee ii le ta wu hindawanda ta gili a wue pandaa, kɛ nasia bɛɛ ti yagbalɛngɔ.
Ngewɔ a wu lubalɔ ji va, ina wu liiloilɔ wu gu kpalɛi na bu ta nda wu ma mbaama hu, ajifa wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ hii i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ.
Tatoi yeegbɔɔ wu langɔ la wa majɔɔ ina wu guilɔ ndewe bu hinda nyamu va wu pienga? Kɛɛ kpaalɛ i langaa wu ma ji wa hinda yekpe bɛɛ wie, Ngewɔ a wu lubalɔ fa.
Ji lɔ i wu lolini ma, ajifa kpaalɛ i lailɔ Kristi vulii ma wu bawova, tawao i tɔmaseli longa a wue pookɔɔva.
Ii jumbu hinda gbi wieni tawao ndɛɛ yɛpɛ gbi ii gbuani ngi laa.
Ji nungaa ti yɛ a ngi bɛlɛ nyani, ii hunyɔni a mbɛlɛnyani; ji ti kpaalɛ lani ngi ma, ii ti huluwani kpaalɛ lava ti ma, kɛɛ i ta yekpe loko wuaailɔ Ngewɔ yeya, na a kiti gbi lewe a pɔɔna.

Kristi vulii i numui gbi ti jumbuisia wumbuilɔ ngi luwui hu i li la krɔsii ma, i haa na aako i mu wumawo i mu gbua jumbui luwɔyɛi hu, mu jia a pele wɔɔni na Ngewɔ longɔ la. Jifa ti kpaalɛ lani Kristi ma, mu mbawoya majɔɔnga.
Wu wiengɔ yɛla kia mbalangɛi nasia ta lohu, kɛɛ kiahuna na Ngewɔ i yamanga a wue Kristi gama, na a wu yafeisia mahugbe kia mbala mahugbemɔi a pie a ngi baalangɛisia.
Hii mahoungɔ wu nyahangeisia wu golo wu hiningeisia wɛ aako ina ti lɛɛnga tii lani a Ngowili Yekpei, wu luvayii a pielɔ ti la la kiaa bɛɛ wuii yeenjɛpɛ gbi leni ti ma,
ajifa ta bagɔɔmɛi na lɔlɔ wa fe ti wɛ kɛɛ pɔɔnɛi na wa yɛ hu.
Waa hanihani gboto yilingili wu ma aako wu nyande, kia nyɔkɔ ngundia baagbangɔisia ɔɔ kanigbɔluisia ɔɔ kula baagbangɔisia wa wu mayili la.

Kia waa lapi wu luwuma nyandei va, wu nyandei i yɛ a wu yɛyii yeekpekpei na ndɔwungɔ wu bu numu ɛɛ tɔ. Yeenyandei ɛɛ jambo tawao a yɛ nungei nasia lɔ ma ti lii gɔlɛngɔ tawao tɛɛ jɔlɛ. Nyandei ji nyɔkɔ lɔ Ngewɔ i baa gɔɔngɔ ma.
Gbamaile Ngewɔ vɛli nyahangɛi nasia wɔɔ ti liiloni Ngewɔ ma, ti yɛ a tia yekpe nyande a ji lɔ ti yɛ golo ti hiningɛisia wɛ.
Hii Sera i yɛ na; i goloilɔ Ebraham wɛ, a ngi loli a ngi Kaamɔ. Wu yɛnga na a ngi leengeisia lɔ ina wu pɔɔna hindei wieilɔ tawao wuɛɛ luwa hinda gbi ma ta wu huluwa la.

Wua wu nyahableisia, mahoungɔ wua wu nyahangeisia wu hei wu kɔɔngɔ vuli kɛ hingaa ti gbayani nyahangaa ma. A baagɔma ve ti wɛ ajifa wua tieni lɔ wa kunafɔ lɛɛvui na majɔɔ Ngewɔ a fe gbama. A ji wie aako Ngewɔ i wu hɛisia mɛni.

Njɛpɛi ji yakpuava gbɛɛ ngi ji le wu ma: mahoungɔ wu kpɛlɛɛ wu giliyii i yɛ yakpe, wu lii i nyani ji wu mbaangaa ta wɔɔ, wu goohunɛɛ ji ti goohu a nɛɛ; a lo a wu nyɔunyɔ kia mahoungɔ njekohungaa ti pie, wu gbewe vulii wu nyɔunyɔ va tawao waa wua yekpe huwɔlɔ.

Waa hinda nyamu hunyɔɔ numu gbi ma a hinda nyamu, tawao waa mbɛlɛnyani hunyɔɔ a mbɛlɛnyani; kia waa na wie, a Ngewɔ vɛli i gbekpe a tie, ajifa ji nyɔkɔ wieva lɔ Ngewɔ i wu lolini aako wu poohani na majɔɔ i Lahei wumbuni feva wu wɛ.
Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi i ndeni la yɛ, “Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ i lɛmbi dunyei hu koohunɛ hu, tawao ngi longɔ nɛnɛɛ i lɛ ngi ma, aa njia nyamu le nungaa wekangaa ma tawao i gbe a ndɛisia gualala;
i wounve hinda nyamu wiela ma i pɔɔna hinda wie; i ndiilɛli gɔkɔli i to pooma.
Gbamaile Ndemɔi a kpekpe wieblɛisia mahugbelɔ i woolo ti hɛɛwoi ma; kɛɛ ngi wounvengɔe nyamu wieblɛisia ma.”
Ye lɔ a kpaalɛ la wu ma ina wuaa lapima vulii hinda yekpe wieva watii gbi?
Kɛɛ kia bɛɛ nungaa ta kpaalɛ lalɔ wu ma jifa wa pɔɔna hindei wie, koohunɛɛ a yɛlɔ wu ma. Waa luwa numu gbi ma, tawao wu lii aa hɛlɛ.
Kɛɛ mbɛlɛya waa i yɛ wu liisia hu Kristi va, wu baagɔɔ ngi ma jifa ta yakpe lɔ Ndemɔi a ngie. Numu gbi lekee a wu mɔli gbɔɔ wu kulɔgbema, wu magbatɛngɔ i yɛla watii gbi hugɛva a ngie.

Kɛɛ wu yaa yeemɔli gbɛmboma waa kpɔnda numu gbi ma lava a Kristi tawao wu bagɔɔ na ma a yɛ tia bɛɛ nɛmahu. Wu wiehindei i kɛ kɛ wuii yaa hinda gbi wieni wu lii aa nde yɛ nyamungɔe aako nasia ta nde tɛɛ nungaa nyamungaa lɔ a wue kia bɛɛ wa hinda yekpe lekee wie jifa Kristi woomablɛisia a wue, ti wufe na va ta nde wu ma.
Ajifa fesangɔ kpaalɛ i la numu ma hinda yekpe wieva, ina ji lɔ a nɛɛ Ngewɔ wɛ, i lewe na ma kpaalɛ a la numu ma hinda nyamu wieva.

Mahoungɔe wu luma kpaalɛ i la wu ma ji wa hinda yekpe wie, ajifa Kristi vulii, ii jumbu yakpe bɛɛ wieni, i haailɔ yakpe mu jumbuisia kpɛlɛɛ va. Hee na i pieni ta lɔ i yɛni a sabu Ngewɔ i guni a manula mu jumbuisia ma, faale i pienga mu pele jɔnga livaa Ngewɔ gaama. Nuuvu yɛla a Kristi watii na ti ngi waani; watii na Ngewɔ i ngi vuluni i ngi wumbu hee hu, i yɛni a ngafa lɔ, na ɛɛ haa,
i loni yeengafayei hu lɔ i li i Ngewɔ yiɛi le ngafangei nasia ma ti makpangɔ yɛla.

Ngafangei jisia mia a nungei nasia tii yɛ goloni Ngewɔ wɛ ji i ti mawuloni kaka watii na Noa i yɛ ngi lɛndɛi gbatɛma. Numu sɛkɛngɔi nasia ti yɛ ndɛndɛi hu, ti kpɛlɛɛ ti yɛ wayakpa, ti bawoilɔ njavei yeya.

Njɛi na i yɛni a tɔmaseli lɔ nguɛi na va ta wu wua la tawao i pienga Ngewɔ i wu bawonga na jumbui yeya. Yeenguɛi ji ii yɛni a manɔhɔ wuala lekee luwuma, i yɛni a Lahei na lɔ wu mbumbuni Ngewɔ gama a kiliya sɛwɛsɛwɛ hu we. Yeenguɛi ji a pielɔ wu bawo jifa Kristi i hiyeilɔ hee hu;
na i lɛnga ngelegoohu i heinga Ngewɔ yejei hu, tawao Ngewɔ i ngi yɛnga a Maha malikeisia gbi maahu kɛɛ mahubleisia, kɛɛ nasia kpaya i ti yeya ti ngi bu.

Jifa ti kpaalɛ lani Kristi vulii ma mu va, mahoungɔ wua bɛɛ wu magbatɛngɔ i yɛla kpaalɛ majɔva kia ngi magbatɛngɔ yɛla kpaalɛ majɔva, gbamaile numu gbi lekee kpaalɛ a la ngi gbuhɛi ma kia i lani Kristi ma, i wounvenga jumbu wiela ma.
Faale, i hiye watii ji ma i to wu lɛɛvui gɛlɛmɛi dunyei ji hu, mahoungɔ wu golo Ngewɔ liima hindei wiela bu, waa golo wu liima hindeisia bu.

Wu lɛmbinga wɔɔ hindei nasia wiema nungei nasia tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ti longɔ a piela. Wu wu lɛɛvui kpɛlɛɛ wuaani puegbua hindei hu lɔ kɛɛ hinda nyamu wie-manii kɛɛ ndɔhou pɛɛpɛi kɛɛ ndɔ gbɔle gomɛisia kɛɛ nɔmɔli vɛlila gɛwɛgɛwɛisia.
Kiahuna na kualangɔe nasia ma tii Ngewɔ gɔɔ ji wuɛɛ yaa gbɛɛ ti ma yeehinda nyamu hulewengɔ yakpei jisia wieva, famia ta nde tɛɛ numu nyamungaa lɔ a wue.
Kɛɛ Ngewɔ a ti gbɛmbolɔ ti wiehindeisia va, Ngewɔ na i wama fuublaa kɛɛ haablaa gbɛmboma hugutungɔ.

Sabui na va lɔ Kristi i Ngowili Yekpei leni haablɛisia bɛɛ ma nasia Ngewɔ i ti gbɛmboni pɛiŋ ti yaa haa kia Ngewɔ a nuuvui kpɛlɛɛ gbɛɛmbo la; i Ngowili Yekpei leilɔ ti ma kɔɔ ti yafeisia ti luva kia Ngewɔ a luvala.
Hani gbi ti gɛlɛmɛi hugutunga; faale wu lii aa wulima tawao wu nɛmahui i yɛ wu gbla aako wu gu a Ngewɔ vɛlila a yeepelei.
Tewengɔ hindei gbi ma, a lo a wu nyɔunyɔ hulewengɔ, ajifa wu longaa a wu nyɔunyɔ, wu magbatɛngɔ a yɛla kpele gbi manuva nungaa wekɛisia ma hinda nyamui nasia va ta pie a wue.
A loko hei wu nyɔunyɔ bu a koohunɛɛ wu wɛleisia bu tawao waa gbonyɛ.
Ngewɔ i wu Kristimableisia gbi a ngilangila gɔnga a mboya hanisia tawao mahoungɔ numu gbi i gu a yee mboya hanii na houla pandaa Ngewɔ i fenga ngi wɛ, i ngayenge numui kpɛlɛɛ ti gbekpeyɛi va.

Numu gbi lekee a Ngowili Yekpei le, i Ngewɔ Wowili vulii le; numu gbi lekee tia Kristimableisia ti yengema, i yenge a kaahui na Ngewɔ a fe ngi wɛ aako hinda gbi hu numui gbi ti Ngewɔ lato Yesu Kristi biyɛi hu, na ngi woo a ngɔlɔyɛi kɛɛ kpayei kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ. Amiina.
Nya liima ndiamɔisia, hinda yaagbalɛngɔi jisia ti wu wiema wu hugɔɔva, aa guala wu ma bi tɔaa bɛɛ hinda nina mia i wu wiema.
Kia na aa wie, a goohunɛɛ ajifa kpaalɛ i lama wu ma kia i lani Kristi ma, aako wu goohu i nɛɛ ji a ngi wɔlɔyei magɛ.
Mahoungɔ wu goohu i nɛɛ ji nungaa ta wu bɛlɛ nyani jifa Kristi woomablɛisia a wue; ji a pielɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ Ngewɔ Yafa gabandengɔ wai lɔ heini wu hu.
Nungaa ti kpaalɛ langaa wu yilayee gbi ma, aa yɛ ajifa numu-waamɔ a ngie ɔɔ humamɔ ɔɔ hinda nyamu wiemɔ ɔɔ numui na a loko wili nungaa ti hindeisia hu.
Na hu gbi, nungaa ti kpaalɛ langaa bi ma jifa Kristimamɔ a bie, baa yeengufe wie kɛɛ siɛgbua Ngewɔ ma jifa Kristi biyɛi i bi ma.
Ngewɔ a tɔɔtolɔ hugungɔ a numui gbi gbɛmbola tawao ngi nda nungeisia yese lɔ a ti gbɛmbo. Ina kpɛmboi i lɔɔtoma mua lɔ ma, nasia tii lani a Ngowili Yekpei na Ngewɔ i njoyoni ta yee wie?
Kia Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeni la yɛ, “Ina kpaukpaungɔi pɔɔnableisia va ti bawo, gbɔɔ hɔɔ a jumbublɛi nasia wie tii gbeweni Ngewɔ va?”
Faale naa, nasia kpaalɛ a la ti ma jifa hii i nɛni Ngewɔ wɛ ti va, mahoungɔ kpekpei nasia ta pie a nungaa wekɛisia i pie ti ti yafeisia loko wuaa ti Gbatɛmɔi yeya, na ngi Lahei wumbungɔi hu ɛɛ nyani.

Nya vulii bɛɛ Kristimableisia ti gbakolo a nge, nyaa yɛpɛma a nya lii gbi Kristimableisia ti gbakolei nasia gama ti wu lia. Ngi kpaalɛi nasia hulɔilɔ i lani Kristi ma, tawao Kristi wɔlɔyɛi na Ngewɔ i wama kɛma a numui gbi, nga nya ndɛi majɔɔlɔ. Nyaa wu manɛnɛma,

wu yɛ a Kristimablei nasia mahugbe Ngewɔ i ti veni wu wɛ kia mbala mahugbemɔi a pie a ngi baalangɛisia tawao wu ti mahugbe a koohunɛɛ kia Ngewɔ longɔ wu pie bi tɔaa bɛɛ ti kpɔndangalɔ wu ma. Waa Kristimableisia ti mahugbe yengei ji wie aako ti wu pawa a navoo, a pie jifa mani vulii i wu ma gbɔva ti ma.
Waa lapi mahaya mɛva nasia maahu Ngewɔ i ti loko wuaanga wu yeya ti mahugbeva, tawao wu luvayii i yɛ a tɔmaseli ta lo ti pookɔɔ.
Tawao watii na Mbala Mahugbemɔi na tewengɔ mbala mahugbeblɛisia kpɛlɛɛ ma a gbua nga, wa ngɔlɔya maha-bɔlɔ gabandengɔi na majɔɔlɔ a lo vooma kunafɔ.

Wua wu kɔɔngɛisia bɛɛ, mahoungɔe wu golo kpakoleisia wɛ, tawao mahoungɔe wu Kristimableisia gbi wu yɛngaa hinda yekpe wiema a wu nyɔunyɔ wu wua yekpe mayei tawao waa pie a mamani; ajifa Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi ndeilɔ yɛ, “Ngewɔ a mamaniblɛisia ti ma hindei hunyanilɔ, kɛɛ a kpekpe lɔ wie a nasia tii mamanini.”
Faale a wua yekpe mayei Ngewɔ gulɔ, Ngewɔ na ngi gbayangɔ wu mahugbeva, aako i wu lɛ watii na ma i kɛnga.
A wu liihɛlɛmɛisia kpɛlɛɛ lukpe ngi ma ajifa ngi gbewengɔi wu va.
Wu magbatɛngɔ i yɛla na gbi va a wie! Wu juwui Seitana lɔ lewetewema ngi laawongɔ kia njalɛi a yɛ gbelema a numu gɔkɔli hunyivinyivi va.

Gbɛogbɛ aa pie wu layii a Kristi maahu aa gbua, tawao waa hinda gbi wie Seitana a wu lo piema ajifa wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ kpaalɛi nasia ti lama wu ma, yeekpaalɛ yakpei lɔ lama wu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ma ti vayangɔ dunyei hu gbi.

Kɛɛ kpaalɛi i langaa wu ma watii wulo va, Ngewɔ na ngi yauwandangɔ a wue hulewengɔ, tawao i wu lolinga kunafɔ wɔlɔyɛi wu ndɛi majɔva jifa wua Kristi-ni wu wilingɔ hu, a wu hinda hugbatɛlɔ a nina, i pie wu layii a Kristi maahu aa gbua, i wu liisia gbaya, i pie wu hapi wuaa, waa jɛɛjia wu lalei hu a Kristi.
Ngewɔ i lo ngi mahayɛi ma kunafɔ kɛɛ kunafɔ va! Amiina.

Sailas na ngi mbumbunga a nya ndewe jifa nya longɔ a ngie, tamia i gbɔni nya ma kɔlɔ gutui ji yoyova wu gama. Nya longɔ ngi wu lii nɛpɔ tawao nyaa seli wuaama kɛ ji kpɛlɛɛ ngi punga kɔlɛi ji hu kɔloongɔ ngauwandei na ma lɔ Ngewɔ a pie a wue jifa ngi longɔ a wue hulewengɔ. A hou kpaŋ wu lalei ma a Kristi, waa yɔkɔ.
Wu mbaa Kristimablei nasia ti heini Babilɔn, Ngewɔ i tia bɛɛ wumbuni, tɛɛ ta va wu ma; tawao nya hindoloi Maaki bɛɛ yɛ a va wu ma.
A va wu nyɔunyɔ ma, wu wu nyɔunyɔ gulu kɛva kɛ wu longɔe a wu nyɔunyɔ. Ngewɔ i ndiilɛli ve wu kpɛlɛɛ wɛ Kristi woo a wue.
Nya Saimɔn Pita, Yesu Kristi yengemɔ a nge kɛɛ tomɔ, nya mia ngi kɔlɛi ji yoyoma, wu kpɛlɛɛ gama wua wu lanaya majɔɔnga kia mua vulii mu ndɛi na jifa mu Yewɔɛi kɛɛ mu Bawomɔi Yesu Kristi wɔnangɔ;
Ngewɔ yauwandei kɛɛ ngi liilɛli wu gama maa i yɛ a to tuuŋ jifa wu Ngewɔ gɔnga tia mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi.

Ngewɔ gbayei lɔ Yesu Kristi hu tawao i hani gbi venga mu wɛ mu gbewengɔ fa kɔɔ mu yɛ a jia a Ngewɔ liima welei jifa mu Kristi gɔɔlɔ vulii pandawanda, Kristi na i mu lolini aako i mu gɔ ngi nda wɔlɔyei hu kɛɛ ngi gbekpeyii.

Ji kpɛlɛɛ yeehuvɛi lɔ a ji i hani baa gbangɔ wai nasia venga mu wɛ i Lahei wumbuni fa aako mu bawo numu yafei jukulu hinda nyamui nasia yeya nungaa ti maningɔ ma dunyei hu, tawao wu yɛyii i wie kia Ngewɔ yɛyii i na.
Sabui ji vulii va, a lapi a wu sɛmbɛi gbi wu wu layii a Kristi mato a hinda yekpe wiela, wu wu hinda yekpe wielei mato a Ngewɔ liima hindei gɔɔla;

wu wu Yewɔ liima hindei gɔlɛi mato a joowila wu liima hinda nyamuisia ma, wu wu joowilɛi wu liima hinda nyamuisia ma mato a gula hinda gbɔugbɔu bu, wu wu gulɛi hinda gbɔugbɔu bu mato a Ngewɔ liima hindei wiela.
Mahoungɔ wu yɛ a ndoma gɛ a wu mbaa Kristimableisia kpɛlɛɛ, tawao mahoungɔe wu lo a numui gbi.
Mahoungɔe makɛi jisia ti yɛ wu hu tawao ti yɛngaa a mato wu hu, ta pielɔ wu gu a mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi gɔɔla pandawanda.
Kɛɛ Kristimamɔi na makɛi jisia tii ngi hu ngi wiengɔe kia numui na i na pumui i ngi yaama ɛɛ hinda lɔ, tawao i lemanga kɛ Kristi i ngi jumbu wovei gbi wuanga fo ngi ma.
Faale, nya mbaa Kristimableisia, a lapi a wu sɛmbɛi gbi wu wu lolilei kɛɛ wu wumbulei yɛ a hinda waa; wu na wiengaa wuɛɛ gbe a lala a Kristi.
Wu lapingaa a wu sɛmbɛi gbi wu kɛ wu luvayii gbi hu kɛ Ngewɔ vulii lɔ i wu lolini i wu wumbu, Ngewɔ a lumalɔ wu wɛ liva mia mu Lemɔi kɛɛ mu Bawomɔi i mahayɛi ma na kunafɔ va.
Faale, nga yɛlɔ a hindei jisia hitɛ wu wɛ watii gbi kia bɛɛ wu ti gɔɔngɔ tawao wu hɛlɛngɔ a tɔnyɛi na ti wu gaani la.
Nya langɔ la mahoungɔe nya va ngi yɛ a pie waa lema hindei jisia ma a ji nga yɛ a ti hitɛ wu nɛmahu kia lɛ ndɛvui i nya hokpala.
Ngi kɔɔlɔ kɛ nya haala hugutungɔe naa kia mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi i ndeni la nya ma leiŋ.
Nga nya sɛmbɛi gbi wielɔ pieva hindei jisia ti gu a hitɛla wu wɛ kpema gbi lekee nya haangɔi wooma.
Gbamaile ndɛɛ dɔmingaa ii le mua hugbatɛ nɛmahu maa kpua wu wɛ ji mu hugɛni a wue muɛɛ mu Lemɔi Yesu Kristi a yamalɔ mbei a kpaya waa. Mua mu ngi wɔlɔyei hulɔilɔ a yaama.
Mu yɛ nalɔ mu Kɛkɛ Ngewɔ i ngi wɔlɔyii kɛɛ ngi gabandeyii gɛni kɛɛ ji ngoi i gbuani Ngewɔ gama ngelegoohu i wani ngi gama yɛ, “Nya liima Hindoloi lɔ, ngi hinda i nya liilɛlingɔ waa!”
Mua vulii mu ngoi ji mɛniilɔ i gbuani ngelegoohu ji mua tieni mu yɛ Ngewɔ nda yiyei na hu.

Faale mu lailɔ na vulii waa a ngowili na kpɛlɛɛ Ngewɔ lutuisia ti ndeni. A yɛ a kpɔma lɔ wu va ji wa la a ngowili nasia Ngewɔ lutuisia ti ndeni ajifa ti wiengɔe kia lamboi na a lo voma kpindi-kpindimɛi haaŋ ngele i wo, Kristi voofoi na yeesawulɛi a ngenda lumbekei i voo wu liisia hu.
Na hu gbi, na tewengɔ hindei gbi ma ta lɔ a ji: numu gbi ɛɛ gu aa Ngewɔ lutuisia ti laayiɛi na fasai i Ngewɔ Gɔlɛi hu a ngi wuma wee ina Ngewɔ Yafei ii gbɔni ngi ma.
Ajifa Ngewɔ lutuisia tii ti wuma yɛpɛ lɔ leni, kɛlee Ngewɔ wowili na ngi Yafei i yɛ pu ti lii hu ndeva.

Kɛɛ ndɛɛ Yewɔ lutuisia ti yɛlɔ a gbɔku wɔɔ Isrɛlbleisia lia kia lɔɔ ndɛɛ kaamɔisia ti wama gbɔkuma wu lia. Ta wu gaalɔ a hindangaa bi tɔaa bɛɛ tɔnyɛi mia kɔlooni Ngewɔ ma kɛɛ tii lɔnyani kulo bɛɛ tawao ta gulɔ a piela nungaa ti la a hindei nasia tii lɔnyani kɔloongɔ Ngewɔ ma; tawao ta gbelelɔ Kaamɔɛi Yesu Kristi vulii bɛɛ ma na i ti wumawoni tawao ji a pielɔ ti jukulu fulo.
Na hu gbi, yeemanɔhɔ luvei nasia ndɛɛ kaamɔisia ta pie Kristimabla gboto ta pookɔɔlɔ tawao ti wiehindei na a pielɔ nasia tii lani a Kristi ti njia nyamungaa le Ngowili Yekpei na ma.

Jifa ndɛɛ kaamɔi jisia ti hanimaningɔ, ta ndɛisia lɔ guala wu wɛ kɔɔ ti gbatɛ wu hu. Ngewɔ i ti lɛɛnga wɔɔ kpɔɔ tawao i hugbatɛnga wɔɔ kpɔɔ ti waava. Ngewɔ ɛɛ yii tawao kpaalɛi na i ndeni yɛ a nda ti ma, hu ɛɛ nyani.
Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ ii manuni malikei nasia ma ti jumbu hinda wieni; i ti wiliilɔ jahama, jɔwɔi gulangɔ ti ma ti heini kpindi hu ta Kpɛmbo Volei mawulo.

Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ ii manuni wɔɔwɔɔmablɛi nasia bɛɛ ma tii yɛ ngi gɔɔ, i njave waa yeilɔ ti ma i ti gbi waa; nasia lekee i ti bawoni tia mia a Noa kɛɛ numu weka wɔfila, Noa na i yɛ a pɔɔna welei na gɛ Ngewɔ longɔ nungaa ti jia la.
Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i taa waawa fele, Sɔdɔm kɛɛ Gomɔra, lɛɛlɔ i ti mɔ kpae a ngɔmbui, i ti yɛ a tɔmaseli kɛva gbɔɔ i wama peima a nasia tii lani a ngie.
Mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Ngewɔ i Lɔt bawoilɔ yeengɔmbui na hu; numu yekpe lɔ wɔɔ a ngie tawao folo gbi ngi lii i yɛ nyanilɔ waa tuva nyamui nasia va nungei nasia tɛɛ sawa hou ti yɛ pie.
Numu yekpei na i yɛ heini ti lia lɔ, tawao folo gbi ngi lii i yɛlɔ a nyani waa ti hinda nyamui nasia va i yɛ hulɔ kɛɛ na i yɛ humɛni.
Ji kpɛlɛɛ a kɛlɔ kɛ nasia ti langɔ a Kristi, Ndemɔi bɛɛngɔe a ti bawola ti hinda gbɔugbɔisia hu; kɛɛ a numu nyamuisia liima belɔ kpindi-wɛlei bu haaŋ Kpɛmbo Volei i hiti,

kakayee nungei nasia puegbuala gɛwɛ hindei na a numu nɔhɔ Ngewɔ yaama gungɔ ti hu, ti lɛɛngɔ Ngewɔ lemayɛi hu. Ndɛɛ kaamɔi nasia ti yaama bengɔi tawao ti yongangɔ, tii baa gɔɔ malika gbayangɔi nasia ma ti ngelegoohu; kia taa baa gɔɔ ti ma, ta ti bɛlɛ lɔ nyani.
Malikeisia vulii bɛɛ, kia bɛɛ ti wɔlɔngɔ tawao ti gbayangɔ tewengɔ yeendɛɛ kaamɔi nasia ma, tɛɛ ti bɛlɛ nyani ji ta ti lɛɛ Ndemɔi gulɔ.

Kɛɛ ndɛɛ kaamɔi jisia ti yɛngaa hinda gbi wiema tɛɛ gili, ti wiengɔe kia ndɔgbɔ huangɛisia ti na, ta ti le lekee ti houva ti ti waa; yeendɛɛ kaamɔɛi jisia ta baa gbualɔ hinda gbi ma tii yeembui gɔɔ. Ta ti waalɔ kia nungaa ta ndɔgbɔ huangɛisia waa la,

tawao ti pawɛi a yɛ a kpaalɛ lɔ a la ti ma kpaalɛi na va ti ndanga nungaa ma. Ti liima hindei lɔ a hinda gbi weila foofo hu a ti luwui liilɛli; ti hinda mawufengɔe tawao mbɛlɛnyani le ji wua tieni wa loko hitɛ wu mɛhɛɛi hu, ti goohu nɛngɔ jifa ta wu wɛlɛ.

Ti longɔ nyaha gbi ta tɔ tia tieni ti la; jumbu wie-manii ɛɛ gu a tie. Ta pielɔ nungei nasia ti layii a Kristi ii gbayani ti yaka ti wili jumbui hu. Hanimani lewengɔe ti hu tawao ti bɛɛngɔ waa le a na majɔɔla ti longɔ la. Ngewɔ i ti jondunga tawao ta jukululɔ huɛɛŋ.
Ti gbuanga pelei yeepɔnɛi ma ti yakanga; ti na lɔ wieni tutui Belam, Biɔ hindoloi, i pieni. Belam lumɛilɔ jumbu wuliva aako i navoo majɔɔ.
Kɛɛ ngi jakasi i ngi lahouilɔ yɛ aa kpowa hinda wie. Fuuhani na i yɛpɛilɔ kia nuuvu, i yia Belam ma ngi jumbui va.
Ndɛɛ kaamɔi jisia ti wiengɔe kia njɛi na a bɛɛli, ɔɔ njagbili na viivii a lewe la; Ngewɔ i hinda gbatɛnga ti va kpindi yeenilinilii hu.

Ta ndawo waawaangaa lɔ wie gbama ngeleya, ta kpowa yɛpɛngaa le, tawao kia tɛɛ sawa hou, ta lapilɔ pieva nasia ti tɔɔtonga a wounvela jumbui nasia ma ti heini ndia, ti gbɔma ti wokɔɔ ti luwui liilɛli hinda nyamuisia wiela hu kɛɛ puegbua gɛwɛ hindei.

Yeendɛɛ kaamɔi jisia ta Lahei wumbulɔ tɛɛ ta pielɔ yeenungeisia ti gbua jumbui luwɔyɛi hu kɛɛ tia vulii nduwɔngaa lɔ a tie jumbui nasia bu ta numu yafei jukulu gbamaile hinda gbi lekee i wɛlɛni numu maahu, ngi luwɔ mia a yeenumui na.

Mu Lemɔi kɛɛ mu Bawomɔi Yesu Kristi gɔɔla i piengaa nungaa ti bawo jumbui nasia yeya ta numu yafei jukulu, na wooma yeejumbui nasia ti gbɔma wɛlɛ ti maahu, yeenungɛi nasia ti yɛyii a yɛ nyamuni kɛlɛmɛi i lewe tɔɔtomɛi ma.
Aa fesalɔ polouŋ ti va ina tii yɛ pelei wɔɔni na gɔɔni Ngewɔ longɔ mu jia la, i lewe ji ma ti kɔɔngɔ ti wounvenga Ngewɔ jawei nasia ma ti kɛni a wue.
Na i ti wieni a kɛlɔ kɛ tɔnya lɔ a salei nasia ti ndeni tɛɛ, “Ngilɛi lɔ yamama gbɔma hani na gama i balini la” kɛɛ “Ndondɛi na ti nguanga fo, taa yamama gendebelema patɛi hu.”
Nya liima ndiamɔisia, kɔlɛi yeefeleyei lɔ naa ngi nyɛinga wu gama. Ngi lapinga yeekɔlɛi veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ hu pieva wu kili sɛwɛsɛwɛngaa wie a ji ngi hindei jisia hitɛma wu nɛmahu.
Nya longɔ kulɔmayiɛi nasia Ngewɔ lutuisia ti ndeni wɔɔ ti yɛ wu nɛmahu, kɛɛ mu Lemɔi, mu Bawomɔi Kristi jawei na ngi looblɛisia ti kɛni a wue Ngowili Yekpei hu.
Baama hinda waa le wu va kɔɔva kɛ kɛlɛma voleisia ma, nungei nasia ti longɔ a ti liima hinda nyamuisia lekee wiela, ta wu gbafalɔ jifa wu langɔ a Kristi,
tawao ta wu mɔlilɔ tɛɛ, “Ii Lahei wumbuni yɛ a walɔ gbɔma? Taa na mindo? Mu maadani ti haanga wɔɔ, kɛɛ hindei kpɛlɛɛ lɔ wiema kia lɔɔ wɔɔ i wiema i hiye dunyei gbatɛ-gbelei ma!”
Ti wounveilɔ tɔnya wai ji ma kɛ Ngewɔ i njɛpɛ lɔ wɔɔ leni kɛ ngelegoohu i gbatɛnga kɛɛ dunyei. I pieilɔ dunyei i gbua njɛi bu tawao i kpatɛni a njɛi lɔ,
tawao njavei lɔ i gbɔma yeedunya wovei na gbɔyɔila.
Kɛɛ Ngewɔ laayia yakpei na lɔ i ngelegoohu lamagbatɛnga kɛɛ dunyei yeeji i na kiahuna aako ngɔmbui i ti nyani. Ngewɔ i ti mahugbema folei na va a nungei nasia lɛɛ ta gbele ngi ma, i ti nyani.
Kɛɛ waa lema hinda yila ma, nya liima ndiamɔisia; folo yila kɛɛ foo tauji yila tii gba ti nyɔunyɔu ma Ndemɔi yaama, ti veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ ti yakpe ngi wɛ.

Ndemɔi hulɛlingɔ ii le hinda gbi wieva i Lahei wumbunga fa, kia nungaa lɛɛngaa ta nde la tɛɛ ngi hulɛlingɔe, kɛɛ a ngi liilɔ hou wu va, ajifa ii loni numu gbi i jukulu, ngi longɔ numui gbi ti wounve ti jumbuisia ma.
Kɛɛ Ndemɔi wa-Volei a weilɔ kia humamɔi a guala numu ma. Yeefolei na ma, ngelegoohu a lolɔ hu a yelewoo waa, ngelema hanisia gbi ta mɔlɔ ti nyani tawao dunyei taa hani gbi ti ngi hu ta gbɔyɔlɔ.
Jifa hani kpɛlɛɛ dunya ti wama jukulumaa hii, nungaa yeegbɛngaa lɔ mahoungɔ wu yɛla? Mahoungɔ wu wua yekpe loko wuaa Ngewɔ yeya, jumbu gbi ii wu ma,

kia lɛ wu yeefolei na mawuloma Ngewɔ a dunyablaa gbi gbɛmbo, wu lapima a wu sɛmbɛi gbi lɔ aako yeefolei i humbu a wa, folei na ngɔmbu waa a ngelegoohu mɔ i na gbi nyani, nduenduei i ngelema hanisia gbi gbandi ti wu ti wote a njɛi.
Kɛɛ mua mu Kristimableisia, mu hani na lɔ gulɔgbema Ngewɔ i Lahei wumbuni feva mu wɛ; tamia a ngelegoohu nina kɛɛ dunya nina, mia numui gbi ta pɔɔna hindei lekee wie na.
Faale, nya liima ndiamɔisia, kia wu hindei jisia ti wiela mawuloma, a lapi a wu sɛmbɛi gbi wu yɛ sɛwɛsɛwɛ, jumbu gbi aa yɛ wu ma Ngewɔ yaama Folei na ma tawao wua tieni wu hei ndiilɛli hu.

Mu Lemɔi a ngi lii houlɔ huguhangɔ tawao mahoungɔe wu kɔɔ kɛ wua mia i wu mawuloma hitɛva pelei na ma ta mbawo majɔɔ la. Mu liima ndewei Pɔɔl i kɔlɔ nyɛilɔ wu gama kɔlooni yeehinda yakpei ji ma, a nɛmahulewei na yayenge Ngewɔ i feni ngi wɛ.

Ndemɔi walɛi ji lɔ a nde ngi gɔlɛi kpɛlɛɛ hu ji a kɔlɔ nyɛi kɔloongɔ yeenjɛpɛi ji ma. Hinda lɛɛnga Pɔɔl gɔlɛisia hu kpaukpaungɔe yeembui gɔva tawao nungei nasia tii hinda hugɔɔ kɛɛ nasia ta wotewote ta fasailɔ a ndɛɛ, kia lɔɔ ta pie a Ngewɔ Gɔlɔ wekɛisia. Ji ti piema tamia a pie ti jukulu Kpɛmbo Volei ma.

Kɛɛ wua, nya liima ndiamɔisia, wu hindei jisia hugɔɔlɔ kpɔyɔngɔ. Faale, wu valangɔ i yɛla aako waa gbua toma yekpei na i wu looni na tɔnyɛi gɔlɛi hu, waa wili kpulangei nasia hu sawa nyanibleisia ta wili hu.
Mahoungɔe wu luvayii i pie ngauwandei na mu Lemɔi kɛɛ mu Bawomɔi Yesu Kristi piengɔ a mue maa i yɛ a to tawao mu li gulɔma tuu a ngi gɔɔla, Ngɔlɔya i yɛ ngi wɛ kiahuna kɛɛ kunafɔ. Amiina!
Mua kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama kɔlooni ndɛvu ve Yiɛi ma, na i na wɔɔ gba i hiye hindei gbi lɔto-gbelei ma. Mu yee-Njiɛi mɛninga, mu tɔnga a yaama, mu kpenga, mu jaanga la a loko.
Ji yeendɛvui ji i gɛni numu a gu a tɔla, mu tɔilɔ; famia mu seli wuaama fa, ma kunafɔ lɛɛvui na gona wu ma i yɛ Kɛkɛi gama i gɛni a mue.
Na mu tɔnga tawao mu mɛninga, mua konama wua bɛɛ ma kɔɔ wu gbɛɛ mu ma ngoyilɛi na hu mua Kɛkɛ-ni mu hu kɛɛ ngi Hindoloi Yesu Kristi.
Mua kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama aako mu goohunɛɛi laa i ve.
Ngowili a ji lɔ mu mɛninga a ngi Hindoloi, mu konama wu ma, kɛ Ngewɔ i yɛni a foofo lɔ, tawao kpindi gbi ii ngi hu kulo bɛɛ.
Mu ndengaa hɔɔ muɛɛ mua tieni lɔ ngoyila hu kɛɛ ma jia kpindi hu, kɛ mu ndɛɛ gualanga, tawao kɛ muii jiama a tɔnya welei.
Kɛɛ mu jiangaa fofoi na hu Ngewɔ i hu, ma yɛlɔ ngoyila hu a mu nyɔunyɔ, tawao ngi Hindoloi Yesu ŋamɛi a jumbui gbi wualɔ mu ma mu yɛ sɛwɛ.
Mu ndengaa muɛɛ jumbu gbi ii mu hu kɛ mu mua yekpe wɛlɛnga tawao kɛ tɔnyɛi ii mu hu.
Kɛɛ mu gayengaa Ngewɔ gama muɛɛ mu jumbu hinda wienga, Ngewɔ ɛɛ wotewote tawao ngi wɔnangɔ: a manulɔ muma mu jumbuisia va, i mu nyamuisia kpɛlɛɛ wua mu ma i mu yɛ sɛwɛ.
Mu ndengaa muɛɛ muii yaa jumbu hinda gbi wieni, kɛ mu Ngewɔ yɛnga a ndɛɛ gualamɔ tawao kɛ ngi laayiɛi ii mu hu.
Nya leengeisia, nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama aako waa jumbu hinda wie; numu gbi i jumbu hinda wiengaa, pɔɔnamɔi Yesu Kristi lɔ mu yeya a Kɛkɛi manɛnɛ mu va.
Tawao Kristi vulii lɔ i yɛni a sabu Ngewɔ i manuni mu jumbuisia ma, tawao mu jumbuisia lekee ii le, dunyablaa kpɛlɛɛ ti jumbuisia bɛɛ.
Mu Ngewɔ jaweisia houngaa kɛ mu langa la kɛ mu ngi gɔɔlɔ.
Numu i ndengaa yɛ, “Ngi ngi gɔɔlɔ,” kɛɛ ɛɛ ngi jaweisia hou, ndɛɛ gualamɔ mia a yeenumui na tawao tɔnyagbi ii ngi hu.
Kɛɛ numu gbi lekee a Ngewɔ laayiɛi hou, ta lɔ ngi layii a Ngewɔ ndavengɔ. Ji lɔ a pie mu gu mu la la kɛ mua Ngewɔ-ni mu wilingɔe hu:
numu gbi lekee a nde yɛ taa Ngewɔ ti wilingɔe hu, mahoungɔi i jia kia lɔɔ Yesu i jiani la.
Nya liima ndiamɔisia, sawa nina ii le ngaa yɛ nyɛima wu gama; sawa wovei na le wu majɔɔni i hiye tɔto-gbelei ma. Sawa wovei lɔ ngowili na le mu humɛnini.
Na hu gbi, sawei ji ngi nyɛima wu gama ninangɔe, tawao numu a ngi lɔnyala gɔɔ Kristi luvayii lɔ ma kɛɛ wua bɛɛ wu ndɛi. Ajifa kpindi lɔ gbɔyɔma, tawao fofoi yeekpekpei lɔ na vooma.
Numu gbi lekee a nde yɛ taa fofoi na hu kɛɛ ngi lolongɔ a ngi ndewei, kɛ taa kpindi hu kiahuna bɛɛ.
Numu gbi lekee ngi longɔ a ngi ndewei kɛ taa fofoi hu, tawao kɛ hinda gbi ii ngi hu a pie numu weka i jumbu hinda wie.
Kɛɛ numu gbi lekee ngi lolongɔ a ngi ndewei, taa kpindi hu; a jia yeekpindii hu lɔ tawao ii kɔɔ mia i lima na ajifa kpindi i pumui wɛlɛnga ngi yaama.
Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, nya leengeisia, ajifa Ngewɔ i wu jumbuisia lufenga Kristi sabui hu.
Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, kɛkɛ-ni, ajifa wu numui na gɔɔngɔ i yɛ na wɔɔ i hiye hindei gbi lɔto-gbelei ma. Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, kɔɔngɛisia, ajifa wu temaya majɔɔnga Seitana maahu.

Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, nya leengeisia, ajifa wu Kɛkɛi gɔɔngɔ. Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, kɛkɛ-ni, ajifa wu numui na gɔɔngɔ i na wɔɔ gba i hiye hindei gbi lɔto-gbelei ma. Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama, kɔɔngɛisia, ajifa wu gbayangɔ; Ngewɔ laayiɛi lɔ wu hu fɔ tawao wu temaya majɔɔnga Seitana maahu.
Waa wu lii wu dunyei yeehindei hu ɔɔ hanii gbi lekee i yeedunyei ji hu. Wu longaa a dunyei, kɛ ndoma ii wu lii hu Kɛkɛi va.

Hanii gbi lekee i dunyei ji hu na jumbubleisia ti haamingɔ fa, na nungaa ta tɔ ti lo la kɛɛ hanii kpɛlɛɛ lekee i dunyei ji hu nungaa ta mata gbua la, yeengila bɛɛ ii gbuani Kɛkɛi gama, kpɛlɛɛ a gbɔku dunyei ji hu lɔ.
Dunyei kɛɛ hanii gbi nungaa ti hamingɔ fa ti gbɔyɔmaa; kɛɛ numui na a Ngewɔ liima hindei wie a yɛlɔ na kunafɔ va.

Nya leengeisia, hanii gbi ti gɛlɛmɛi i lukpenga kpla. Ti hugɛnga a wue kɛ Yesu juwui a walɔ; tawao kiahuna na Yesu juwu gboto ti wilanga bɛɛ a gbuala nga, faale mu kɔɔlɔ kɛ hanii gbi ti gɛlɛmɛi i lukpenga kpla.
Nungɛi jisia tii yɛ vulii mu lia a ti lii, na vamia ti vayani mu ma; kiaa mua tieni yɛla ti yɛ lolɔ mu lia. Kɛɛ ti vayɛilɔ mu ma aako i gɛ leiŋ kɛ ti yilayee bɛɛ ii yɛ mu ma.
Kɛɛ wua, Kristi i Ngewɔ Yafei yeinga wu ma, famia wu gbi wu tɔnyɛi gɔɔngɔ.
Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama ajifa tii yɛma wuii tɔnyɛi gɔɔ, kɛɛ jifa wu kɔɔngɔ, tawao gbɔma wu kɔɔngɔ kɛ ndɛɛ yiɛi ɛɛ gbua tɔnyɛi hu.
Ye lɔ na hɔɔ ndɛɛ gualamɔi le? Tamia a numui na a nde yɛ Yesu ii le aa yɛ a Ngewɔ Maha Heingɔi. Kristi juwui mia a yeenumui ji ngi gbelengɔe Kɛkɛi tia ngi Hindoloi veenjɔɔ kpɛlɛɛ ma.
Gbamaile numu gbi lekee a gbele Ngewɔ Hindoloi ma, i gbeeleni Kɛkɛi bɛɛ lɔ ma; numu gbi lekee a loko hei Kɛkɛi Hindoloi bu, i loko heinga Ngewɔ bɛɛ lɔ bu.
A tɔ vulii ngowili na wu majɔɔni tɔtomɛi i yɛ wu liisia hu. Na wu mɛnini tɔtomɛi ina wu ndama gbatɛilɔ wu liisia hu wa yɛlɔ ngoyila hu wua Ngewɔ Hindoloi-ni kɛɛ Kɛkɛi.
Tawao ji lɔ Kristi vulii i Lahei wumbuni feva mu wɛ kunafɔ lɛɛvui.
Nyaa kɔlɛi ji nyɛima wu gama kɔloongɔ nasia ma ti lapima wu yakava.

Kɛɛ wua, Kristi i ngi Yafei yeinga wu ma. Ina lekee ngi Yafei lɔ wu hu, wuii gbeweni numu gbi va wu gaava. Ajifa ngi Yafei lɔ a wu gaa kɔlooni hinda gbi ma, tawao na a wu gaa la tɔnya le, ndɛɛ ii le. A golo hɔɔ Ngewɔ Yafei gaai bu, wu yɛ Kristi hu.
Hii i na, nya leengeisia, a yɛ ngi hu, aako ndiilo waa i yɛ mu wɛ ji a gbuanga, maa lɔwu ngi ma a ngufe folei na ma a wa.
Wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Kristi wɔnangɔe; mahoungɔe hɔɔ wu kɔɔ kɛ numui na lekee a pɔɔna hindei wie Ngewɔ loi mia a ngie.
A ndomɛi na lɔ lɛɛ Ngewɔ piengɔ a mue! Ngi lomɛi wɔlɔngɔ waa le na hii ta mu loli a Ngewɔ leengeisia, tawao a tɔnya hii mu na. Sabui na va dunyei ii mu gɔɔ, tamia a ji ii yaa Ngewɔ gɔɔni.
Nya liima ndiamɔisia, Ngewɔ leengeisia lɔ naa a mue, kɛɛ ii yaa gɛni lɛ leiŋ mu wama yɛma a gbɔɔ. Kɛɛ ma kɔɔlɔ kɛ watii na Kristi a gbuanga ma gbualɔ a ngie, ajifa ma ngi lɔlɔ kia i na vulii.
Numu gbi lekee a liilo hii Kristi ma, a ta yekpe yɛlɔ sɛwɛ kia Kristi sɛwɛsɛwɛngɔ.
Numu gbi lekee i jumbu hinda wiengaa, kɛ ngi lɛɛ le Ngewɔ jawei nyaniva; ajifa sawei nyanila lɔ jumbui le.
Wu kɔɔlɔ kɛ Kristi i wailɔ dunyei hu aako i nuuvuisia ti jumbuisia gbua ti ma, tawao ta vulii jumbu gbi ii ngi ma.
Faale numu gbi lekee i Kristi hu ɛɛ nɔɔ jumbu hinda wiela ma; kɛɛ numu gbi lekee a nɔɔ jumbu hinda wiela ma ii yaa Kristi lɔni tawao ii ngi gɔɔ.
Numu gbi aa wu wɛlɛ, nya leengeisia! Numu gbi lekee a pɔɔna hindei wie, pɔɔnamɔ lɔ a ngie, kia lɔɔ Kristi wɔnangɔ la.
